112.title: Discworld

1122.content:
So, in the usual canon, a coach crashes down a mountainside and Death arrives to do his duty for the people killed by it. He then finds a young baby in the carriage and feels an unusual moment of empathy. The first of many to come. He takes the girl away to his home in Death's realm (a nice little cottage where he keeps bees) and 'allows her to have lived her life' (meaning that she becomes the girl she would have been if she had lived sixteen years of life, which is to say that she is wistfully romantic but unfortunately much too plump for the role of the typical gothic romance) then stops her aging or maturing anymore for a few millenia or so, till he realises that she should go back and live a normal mortal life. So he hires an apprentice and 'arranges' things so that they fall in love and elope, becoming the ruling nobility of the country of Sto Helit. They have a daughter, Susan Sto Helit.

In the usual canon Susan then 'inherits' some of her grandfather's traits magically. She becomes very slim, unlike her mother, and her hair is black with a single, prominent white streak and it moves by itself. Her skin is pale and her face even has stripes on it (right where her mother slapped Death) that stay utterly pale even when she gets flush with anger.

So, does her mother never get adopted by Death?

Or does someone else give birth to Susan?

Or something else?
1122.title: What if Susan wasn't Death's Grandaughter

115221121.content:
Catti'Brie walked the caverns of Mithril hall. She had recently finished a training session Drizzt, that handsome Dark Elf, and was rather bored. She was getting used to her magical sword's constant hunger for blood, and was controlling it, but he didn't make good conversation. She decided for target practice with her bow, Telmarril, the heart-seeker. She went up to the cliffs above the cavernous halls, and set up some dummies of cloth and straw. Twang, twang, twang! Crash, crash, crash! All three dummies went down, arrows placed squarely in the bulls-eyes in their heads. "This will get old fast...." Catti'Brie said, and went back down to the alchemist, to see if he had something new he'd like her to see.

(I'm going to make up the alchemist, since I don't know any alchemists beside one gnome whose name I cannot remember.)
"Hello, old Fizzlewick!" Catti'Brie called happily as she stepped into the alchemist shop. A wizened old gnome turned from a shelf of potions to smile broadly at the young woman as she stepped into his shop.

"Why 'ello there, Catti!" The gnome said, in an odd cross between a gnomish accent and a dwarven one, probably from spending so much time with the dwarves.

"Anything new you wanted to show me?" The young girl asked, a glint in her eye. She looked to old Fizzlewick Graydraught like a grandfather, a very friendly, potion-making grandfather.

"As it just so 'appens, I've got a potion 'ere that may just 'elp you fall in a bit wif that elf friend o yers." Fizzlewick said, pulling out a small pink vial from a shelf.

Option 1: What if Catti'Brie was a bit more 'voluptuous'? This could be her just gaining weight from the potion, or getting a nice hourglass figure. Either way, there's more up top and down below. This is just whether there's something in the middle or not.

Option 2: What if Catti'Brie and Drizzt fell more in love than they already were? Perhaps throwing caution to the wind and outright dating, and perhaps marrying?

12.content: Okay then let's start with a few of the more popular series of comics.
12.title: Comic

choices: Justice League in the Hundred Years' War
121.content:
In Elseworlds, heroes are taken from their usual settings and put into strange times and places — some that have existed, and others that can't, couldn't or shouldn't exist. The result is stories that make characters who are as familiar as yesterday seem as fresh as tomorrow.

The Justice League of America - when evil threatens Earth where one Super Hero would fail, the Justice League - with heroes such as the Man of Steel, the Dark Knight, the Fastest Man Alive, the Amazonian Warrioress and Power Ring Bearing Lantern - combine together to protect America, the Earth and at times even the universe from a horde of Super Villains and threats.

But what if the Justice League existed in another era, past or future? Pick betweeen one of these three new Leagues...

Hundred Years War - Europe is in bitter conflict as the Kingly Houses of England and France battle to become rulers of the continent with vast armies of Knights, Archers and Peasants. In the midst of this conflict a team of mysteriously enpowered individuals on both sides of the battlefield will appear. Will these warriors put aside their differences and defend the realm of man through a team of heroism not seen since the time of the great King Authur?

USSR - Red Son showed the unthinkable as Superman became a loyal ally of the Soviet Union! But what if he hadn't been alone? What if he forged a team of Super Heroes to uphold the principles of the Common Worker under Conrade Stalin, Socialism and the international expansion of the Warsaw Pact? Would Earth's greatest heroes also be its greatest enemies? You decide here!

Justice League of Extraordinary Gentlemen - A storyline which explores what would have happened if Victorianised versions of Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and others, rather than that of the Alan Moore League seen in his award winning comics, were formed together for the first time to help defeat the enemies of the British Empire and beyond within a world in which anything from the realms of fiction can and does exist!
121.title: Justice League Elseworlds

122.content:
The Avengers - Earth's mightest heroes. When the evil god Loki attempted to trick his brother Thor in battling him he mistakenly brought together the Incredible Hulk, the Invincible Iron Man, pint-sized duo Ant Man and Wasp and Thor himself to create the Mighty Avengers - a team of warriors whose roster has changed many times but always the heroism and bravery of their kind has endured. Only in the breakdown of one of their own did the Avengers finally step down... only to see a new team of 'New Avengers' take up their mantle, have Iron Man forge the 'Mighty Avengers' from the ashes of Civil War, and perhaps most terribly Norman Osborn assemble his twisted brand of 'Dark Avengers' in the rise of his Dark Reign to power.

So, before we can decide on the possibilties these teams provide, we must know upon which you wish to look at.
122.title: Earth Mightest Heroes!

131121.content:
*Hunger*

It sniffed at the air. It's next meal was close as it it raced off to find it.

*So Hungry*

It moved faster than any animal and more silently and stealthily than any ninja. Not just because it could not be seen either. Fueled only by the gnawing feeling it could not be rid of.

*Must feed*

It Jumped from street to building to tree to street and so on as quickly and fluidly as if it were moving in a straight line. Yet doing so to avoid the notice of it's latest victim. A fat bald man in a buisness suit who had a bleeding hole between his eyes and a chain in his chest. It licked its white mask as wqould a hungry man his lip's.

*Food*

His prey having not seen him could barley make a yelp as he was tackled from behind and pinned to the ground in the busy street by what he thought to be a child.

"What in the...?" He stopped as he saw the 'child'.

A small body of about nine years old but all white with red markings and completly naked as well as lacking any genetalia. Razor sharp claws where his fingers and toes should be. A long lizard like tail with red markings on the tip. Spikes jutting out of his shooulders and orange hair wildly flowing down his back. The teo most prominent features however were the hole in the dead centre of his chest, and the grinning mask with the piercing black and yellow eye's.

"Wha-wha-what do you want?" The dead man stammerd as the hollow gazed at him with what could only be described as 'hunger'. It opened it'd mouth and said in a childlike voice mixed with a demon's the last word the man would hear as a human for a very ong time.

"Food."

A quiet shreik and then silence as the young hollow that was once Ichigo Kurosaki began to devour the man right there on the sidewalk as the human's around him walked by completly un-noticing.
131121.title: Ichigo the Hollow

1311211.content:
The kurosaki clinic and household was a very differant place since the 'passing' of Ichigo.

On the outside they looked like an ordinary family.

That was the problem.

Without Ichigo to spar with Isshin had no-one to to be rough and tumble with. With only women around the house who weren't all that interested in fighting he'd been forced to let himself go a little. Not to the degree that he looked fat but if you'd known him year's before then you'd notice that his once solid muscle gained from year's of something which he couldn't really discuss were now softer and less defined. His attitude hadn't changed that much but that didn't mean he didn't miss his son terribly and could only hope that he had been sent to soul society rather than bear the 'other' fate.

Yuzu and Karin were both too young at the time for the lose of Ichigo to really effect them. Since they were both twin's and girl's they mostly spent time in each other's company or with their mother and mabye their father unless he acted silly. Although they did at the time ask where Ichigo was every so often causing their parent's to make something up until they were old enough to understand what had happened.

Masaki by far was the worst. She was their the day Ichigo died. He was running down the hill toward's what he thought he saw rear the river when he suddenly passed out for no reason. By the time she had reached him he was dead and lifeless.

She threw herself into taking care of her remaining family. Putting up a false smile to try and black out th pain and shield the twin's from the truth until they could understand. Though every night for a year without fail she'd go into his room which had become a shrine to her late son and cried for hour's until either Isshin came in or one of the girl'd did and innocently asked her what was wrong. Even year's after this terrible event she couldn't help but think.

'Why couldn't it have been me?'

If only she knew.
1311211.title: With his Family

13112111.content:
Back with our Hollowfied friend, Ichigo had just finished his meal and still felt rather hungry and procceded towards what he formally knew as the Kurosaki clinic.He landed on the roof and smelled the framilair air as if he was a dog and then let out a loud cry as if he still had some shred of humanity left inside him. Isshin was now awake inside the house and quickly headed outside to find the hollowfied Ichigo which suddenly stirred something in the hollow "DAAAAAAA" it roared and rushed at Isshin to his suprise, he readied to fight the hollow off but instead to his suprise he found the hollow just standing there and watching him. It spoke with a cry but tried it's best to speak clearly as he was never good at it "Da? Moe? Fam?" the hollow ichigo smelled the air and then smiled a wicked yet non-evil smile. "Wait could you be" Isshin asked still suprised "Ichigo?"

The hollow knew only a few things from before he was a monster, when he was human. He remebererd the face of his mother, the cheers of his father and even the cute looks of his little sisters. "Daaad?" Ichigo asked then Isshin hugged him and began to cry "Ichigo how we've missed you" Isshin cried. Then the two walked along the streets, Ichigo trying to resist eating all the (what he thought) delcious souls. Isshin told him no every time Ichigo would try and then the two would contiue to walk to a framiar shop know to Isshin.

"Hello is any one awake" Isshin yelled? "Uh can't this wait til morning when every one is awake" yawned a blond haired man with wooden clogs. The man looked at Isshin and said "Why hello Isshin! Haven't seen you in ages what brings you here at such a late hour?" "Take a look for yourself Kisuke" Isshin stepped aside to reveal Ichigo who just had a strange look on his face which ment happiness if hollows could be happy. "Wait is that..." "Yes Kisuke" Isshin replied with a smile "It's my son, Ichigo!" Ichigo hearing his name approuched his father and hugged him "Hm this is...well i can't really explain it" Kisuke said slightly amazed by the sight. Kisuke invited the two inside and the three walked through the shop to the underground room where Ichigo would in another reality train to re-become a soul reaper.

"Alright Isshin what is it that you want me to do" asked Kisuke as he took a seat on a stone. Isshin gulped as he knew what he was about to say might be imposible even for the mighty Kisuke Urahara "Kisuke I want you to turn my son back into human!" Kisuke gasped at the reply as if the wind had just been knocked out of him "Well now that was something I should have expected but none the less I'll try but..." Isshin leans in so Ichigo doesn't hear. Kisuke begins to whisper something into Isshin's ear and his face turns to a all business like look. "Alright Kisuke if that's what it will take" Isshin says as he backs up to Ichigo and then crouches down to his level "Now Ichigo i'm going to leave you with Mr. Urahara for a bit but don't worry I'll be back to get you in no time." Isshin brushes Ichigo's hair and Ichigo smiled his same hollow smile then hugged Isshin. "Now, now don't worry you'll see him again in a week so no need to worry about a thing" Kisuke said for reasurense. Isshin nods and hands Ichigo over to Urahara before leaving.
13112111.title: That's no Hollow that's my son!!!

1312321.content:
Every year On this day is the single greatest event in the Joketsuzoku village.

Each year the young girl's (because men were forbidden to be warrior's) who had reached the age of maturity by this time would compete against each other for the honour of being named the strongest young warrior to date. A title which they would hold until they were defeated by another amazon.

This year the favourite to win was the many times great granddaughter of village elder Cologne, Shampoo.

Her years of tutalage under the ancient warrior woman had made it all to easy for the purple haired young beauty to sweep away the compitition. Even the giant she faced in the last round toppled off the challange log with a single blow from the girl who was at least 2 times smaller than her.

A roar overcame the crowd as she was declared the village champion like she knew she would be. Not only was this a great honour, but now she could get her hand's on the second half of her prize. A feast prepared by the tribe's greatest cook's. Cooked only once a year and made with the finest spice's, freshest ingrediant's and the meat's of animal's which they had been fattening up since last year for such an occassion. Her mouth watered in anticipation.

She turned to gaze upon her feast. Before her vision turned red.

Sitting in 'HER' seat. Eating 'HER' well earned banquete was a foriegn 'male' in a dirty gi and what appeared to be his pet panda. Half the plate's which had taken the cook's hour's to fill up were empty already.

She leapt of the challenge log and raised her Bonbori (melon hammer) before bringing it down on the table and roughly splitting it in two before pointing the mace dangerously at the 'male' who to add to the insult looked at her without any hint of fear at what she just did. Didn't he know to fear a mighty amazon warrior?

"You there Panda and Boy. Why did you eat my prize?"

The boy looked at in confused before turning to the jusenkyo guide who had accompanied them who she could only guess translated for her.

"Prize?" He said. She kicked herself for just understanding what he said. All those hours of learning japanese had paid off like her great grandmother had said when she herself said it was pointless. Anyway it was now apparant that this boy had no idea what he had just done. She was to angry to speak his language so she blurted in chinese.

"Every year on this day is the martial art's show. I am now it's champion."

The guide translated for the boy before he stood up and grinned. Wiping the food stuff's away from his cheek's she now got a good look at him. Right before blushing along with several other amazon's. Despite never being picky about their choices of men since none in the village or nearby could really be called attractive (Mousse was passable but those coke bottle lenses ruined it) they did know what a handsome man looked like.

Shampoo shook her head lightly to banish 'certain thought's' she was having and listened to what the guide was telling her about the male challenging her for the food. She looked at the japanese boy before cracking her knuckles and making her way onto the challange log followed second's later by the boy. She took up her Bonbori stance while he arrogently stood their with no stance.

A voice called out 'BEGIN'

Shapoo charged him ready to turn his head into pulp but just as she reached him a sharp and powerful pain explodedin her jaw as his foot shot up and nailed her on the chin causing her to drop the hammer's and go flying off the log.

The audiance watched with eye's wide and jaw's dropping. This, this MAN had just defeated their newly crowned champion with only one move.

Shampoo was equally shocked. She never expected this man to beat her at all let alone so easily. No male expect those hybrid abomination's of the 'musk' were supposed to be even remotly skilled in combat. It was a disgrace, it was shameful it was......................perfect.

She stood up shakily and made her way over to the handsome and 'strong' man with eyes full of anything but anger. He was about a head taller than her so she had to look up into his deep blue and confused eye's. She turned to face the audiance and shot a look which silenced their jealous murmuring before turning to face the boy again and before wrapping her arm's around his head.

Ranma's eyes fluttered open......well ok maybe 'fluttered' isn't the best word. More like creaked open, his desire for more sleep fighting with his desire to wake up making rising for the new day most difficult.

He didn't remember much about last night, he didn't remembe much of anything after that purple haired girl jammed her tongue into his mouth and tried ripping his tonsils out. He remembered cheering, unusual because nobody ever cheered when he won a fight, only yelled at him to bring back their money. She...she took him somewhere, probably her house or hut or wherever it was she lived. Well that was nice of her, then again she was obviously into him if she was bold enough to kiss him 5 seconds after he booted her in the face.

He smirked slightly at the thought of all of his idiot fathers talk of making him the 'manliest man alive'. Maybe it wasn't such garbage after all, well until he could find a better reason for all of this.

Not being used to a bed (it's cushiony softness a pleasent change from the folded tissue Genma called a sleeping bag) Ranma knew he really wouldn't be able to think straight if he stayed in it. So with monumental effort he tried to rise.

He got about a fifth of the way until an unknown mass on his chest forced him back down.

Confused the teen pulled the covers down further and almost choked on his own breath.

That girl from yesterday was lying on top of him chest. Peacefully snoozing away while gently nuzzling into his bare chest, her arms wrapped around his mid section like a teddy bare with a six pack, he flushed red as he felt her own abundant chest press firmly against him right down to their rock hard points. Going down further he could feel a supple leg intertwined with his own but fortunatly nothing else.

She moaned slightly when his movement woke her up, the sensation of her own movement as she pulled herself up, dragging herself slightly against him made his body react in slightly embarressing ways. She opened her eyes and looked up at him, big brown eyes filled to the brim with something he'd only ever seen in couples he'd pickpocketed in the park. She moved herself again much to the aggrivation of a deepening blush, which went nuclear as he saw the only thing seperating her from indeceny was a lacy pink nighty.

She looked deeply into his eyes, her all consuming gaze divertng attention away from the clear smirk she had as she continued to tease her new husband.

"Wo ai ni." She said before pulling herself up further to bringing the neon red boy into another kiss. Her other hand sneaking down the covers towards his boxers

13123222211.content:
"Push."

"AAAGGGGHHHH!!!" Screamed a woman trying to squeeze a melon through a straw.

'Today was the day' Genma Saotome thought giddily as he sat just outside the delivery room. The day his son would be born. He thought about all the things he'd do with little Ranma. Training the boy to become the worlds greatest martial artist. Traveling all over Japan as he molded the boy. Then when his training was complete they'd be off to the Tendo Dojo where the boy would marry one of Souns daughter's, teach at the dojo and let his father live off his sweat for the rest of his life.

"I can see the head!"

Genma was brought out of his day dreams by those words.

"One more PUSH!"

"AAAGGGHHHH!!!!!"

"WWWAAAHHH!!!"

Genma whipped around to face the door and bolted out of his seat. He couldn't get into that room fast enough.

He opened the door just to see the nurse taking the baby from the doctor and wiping it down. Genma went over to his sweat plastered wife and gave her a smile. "Sorry I couldn't be in the room with you."

She smiled "You know it's not proper for the husband to be in the room when their wife is giving birth."

"I know. Doesn't make me feel better though."

They were interupted as the nurse handed his wife the baby. He looked down and smiled. The red hair and blue eyes were definetly his mother's. He'd have no trouble with the Tendo girl's when he was older.

"Isn't she beautiful Genma." His wife said adoringly.

The visions in Genmas head shattered as he heard the 'she'.

"S-she?" He said prying he misheard.

"Yes mr Saotome." Said one of the doctors as he cleaned up in the nearby sink. "Your wife gave birth to a healthy baby......Girl!"

*CRACK* The sound of Genma's dreams being brutally murdered with that one word

His wife just continued to look lovingly at the squirming bundle in her arm's. "My precious little girl." She kissed the baby's brow softly.

In his mind Genma feel to his knees. The mindscape littered with the body's of what had once been his hopes and dreams. He fell to his knees and cried out to the heaven's

"NNNNNOOOOOOO!!!!!"
13123222211.title: Dreams hanging on a single word

The unmoving lump suddenly jumped back as a sword passed through the air where he had been sitting. Nodoka glared at her husband. Pointing her sword threateningly at him.

1313322222111.content:
Seconds Densuke Mifune was more or less an average student,

He was at the kind of level in school were no-one would jeer and bully him like the unpopular kid's, but they didn't look up and pay attention to him like the popular kid's. He was happily Neutral. Doing neither bad nor good in anything he was average. It was this averageness that had him completly off the radar to even his teachers. Like he was invisible.

Of course it was this invisibility that ensured that he had few friends. It was also the reason that on school club day that he was 'unlike the rest of the student body' both not asked to join any club's and rejected by any he wanted to join. Even his 'friends' were picked for club's.

His whole life of being ignored had changed in seconds as he now felt he had practically the entire body of 50,000 students looking at him with shocked eyes.

The reason? A bananna peel.

A bananna peel that caused him to slip, fall, hit someone and land on not concrete but rather something very soft.

He knew in all liklihood what he probably landed on but that didn't mean he wouldn't fear it any less when he opened his eyes.

He was right.

Lying below him was an amazingly beautiful girl that looked a year or so older than him, a second or third year mabye. She was much taller than quite a few students at the school and had grey/brown eyes and long purple hair spilling everywhere. However he was more concerned by the fact he was correct that he should be afraid of where he had landed. Namely her large (big to the point of ridiculous) chest.

If he'd stayed focused on her face he would have noticed that she didn't look embarressed or scared like an ordinary girl would in this situation. Instead she was grinning from ear to ear.

In an instant he moved to run away from this situation less the guy's beat him out of jealousy and the girls beat him for being pervert.

"I'm sorry I..." But as he moved to get up he felt a pair of hands wrap around his wrists and not only hold them where they where but actually made them press down harder on the things he really knew he shouldn't he touching.

"Where do you think your going Densuke? I've been looking for you"

That statement stumped the boy enough for him to almost forget the girl was practically forcing him to grope her.

"I just wanted to say..." She said right before he suddenly felt his wrists being twisted and the next thing he knew he was the one on his back with her sitting on top of him. Her breasts pressing into his chest and her face inch's from his. "...Welcome to the Eiken club."

Thats when their lips met.

The doors to the clubhouse flung open as it's Amazonian leader walked in.

The other members, being only a blonde girl in a Chinese dress and a small bluenette at the moment looked over for a moment to see their leader, before turning back too their normal duty's.

“So you got that guy you were after.” It wasn't a question, it was a statement from the resident midget genius Kyoko Morooka.

Kirika's cat with cream grin widened. “Yep. How'd you tell?” She asked in a poor innocent voice.

Grace, the blond responded. “Well 1 because you wouldn't be smiling otherwise. 2 we've never known you to fail at anything. And 3 you have a boy wedged between your breasts struggling to breath.”

It was true enough. Kirika had (like so many other things) crammed the boy between her breasts before dashing off to the club, wrapping her arms around his body (and her hands of his behind) while burying his head between her mammorys so deeply that he couldn't breath.

“Oh.” She said simply and let him down. He took a deep breath as his ability to breath returned once more.

“Oh thank kami. I thought I was going to die in there.” Densuke wheezed out

“Don't act like you didn't like it.” Purred out Kirika as she lowered herself to circle him from behind, making sure to pull him back as much as possible tinto her cleavage without repeating his near death.

She wasn't expecting to jerk away violently. “What the heck is going on you big boobed giant? Why did you bring me here?”

She ignored the 'big boobed giant' comment. It wasn't like she didn't consider it a compliment anyway.

“All I did was bring you to your new clubhouse." She grinned before spreading her arms wide.

He turned around and saw the clubhouse, it wasn't all that different from an ordinary house, if you ignore the giant robot in the corner that is.”Welcome to the Eiken club"

'Eiken club.' He thought. “Hey wait I've never heard of this club. It wasn't on the school club list anyway?"

Damn her grin was getting annoying. “Oh that's because were a very exclusive club. Only the best, brightest and most 'talented' individuals get to join.” She hefted her frontal area to show what she meant by talents. “And now I'm proud to say your a member.”

His brain was scrambled for a few instants before he could say anything. “H-how? I'm not exactly good at anything, I'm average in all my class's and I'm not good looking or anything. So why did I join?”

Turns out she had been serious about that 'training'.

Kirika, his supposed girlfriend seemed dead set on turning him inito as big a deviant as she was. For the remainder of that day yesterday she had whisked him all across campus. Taking him to every spot couples gather around the school and proceeded with rather extreme versions of romantic acts. Hugging him hard enough into her bosom to choke him again while staring out over the amazing view of the academy island. Forcing enough food down his throat to fill up a horse using and touching every bite to her mouth before she feed him it to give him an indirect kiss. She had never let his hand go once as he was pulled about and always made sure to be as public as possible. Calling him 'her Den den' and kissing him in front of crowds so everyone knew he belonged to her.

(Note: This story starts in chapter 8 of the Eiken manga and continues on from there.)

Kirika was definitely a strange girl. The leader of the Eiken club, Kirkia was a young girl with over sized breasts and a very mischievous personality. She had no inhibitions, often teased her fellow club members and would grope their large breasts as well. She also treated Densuke like a boy toy, often crushing him in her breasts, or dressing him up in girl outfits.

But the strangest thing about Kirika were her allergies. Whenever she got sick or her allergies acted up, Kirika's personality would become sweet, innocent, and childish. Apparently, whenever she got sick, her brain would become altered slightly, resulting in a different personality. This had happened so many times now that the Eiken club was used to it and just waited for it go away. But the episodes became more frequent, and the switching of personalities started to have a strain on her mind.

Once again, Kirika got sick and changed back into her nice girl persona. While she was like this, she encountered Densuke, and spend some time with him before she passed from her fever. But this time was different. After so many times of changing personalities, her mind became stuck on its nice persona. The mind could only handle some much personality switching before it finally gave up and had one of the two personalities of Kirika become the dominant one, in this case the nice one. This was the start of a brand new Kirika, and a whole new life for her.

But none of that was going through Densuke's mind at that moment as he was watching Kirika, sleeping in a hospital bed. The other Eiken club members had explained to Densuke about Kirika's different personalities on the way to the hospital. The doctor had assured them that Kirika would be find, but she would need plenty of rest. the other Eiken members had already left, leaving Densuke to look after her.

As Kirika slept, Densuke recalled all of the days events. He remembered how sweet Kirika was, how she cleaned and washed, and made snacks for him. he enjoyed Kirika acting like that, and for the first time he realized how beautiful Kirika was. She had a great body, a pretty face, and to him, she was beautiful. She was even more beautiful then Chiharu.

That started an argument in Densuke's mind. For months, he had been crushing on the shy and beautiful Chiharu. But when Kirika started acting sweet to him, it reminded him of Chiharu, except even more beautiful. Densuke didn't want to admit it, but he was developing feelings for Kirika. But wouldn't lead anywhere, he decided. any minute now, Kirika would wake up and be her old self.

"Huh? Where am I?" Densuke was snapped out of his thoughts by Kirika waking up.

"Your in the hospital. You fainted, remember/" Densuke was confused at how Kirka was acting. Wasn't she supposed to be back to normal?

"And you brought me here?" When Densuke nodded, Kirika started sobbing tears of joy and and Densuke a big hug. 'Thank you so much, Densuke!" I didn't know you carried about me so much!"

Dnesuke, who was being smothered in Kirika's giant breasts, was startled by what was going on. According to what the others told him, Kirika should have started acting like her old self, but she still acting different. Even the way she hugged him was different. Instead of forcibly stuffing him into her breasts, Kirika was gently pushing him into them, making it more enjoyable then before.

"Hey, Densuke..."

"What is it?" Densuke, trying but failing not to blush. The way she sound so nervous was cute, and didn't help that he was in her breasts.

"When I get out of the hospital... do you want to hang out sometime?" Startled, Densuke pulled himself of her cleavage. Did Kirika just ask him out? Kirika, upset that she may have said the wrong thing started panicking. "It's okay if you don't want to..."

"No!" Densuke was becoming upset after seeing tears in Kirika's eyes. "I mean, of course I want to hang around you. I really like you, Kirika." Densuke found himself in another hug by Kirika, who was giggling happily. He had no idea what was going on, but decided to let thing work themselves out.

Meanwhile, outside the room, the other members of the Eiken club were confused. ""What's wrong with Kirika?" Komoe voiced the concern of the entire club.

Kyoko just shrugged. 'Whatever. I'm sure she will be back to normal soon enough." The other members agreed with Kyoko on her opinion.

Except Chiharu. When she heard Kirika ask Densuke out, she felt a rush of jealousy. She hoped that Kyoko was right and that Kirika would start acting like her old self again soon.

“So your not suddenly gonna just leave?”

“Not if you don't want me to.” The Pokemon replied.

As and Darkrai stared at each other for a long while, then coming to a conclusion Ash nodded. Darkrai did the same, he turned his back to Ash to look over at the Pidgy in the field still happily digging up breakfast.

“Now let us catch another.”

“Right. Darkrai use........” Ash lifted up dexter to check Darkrai's stats and attacks

Level: 1

Base Stats: 600

Attacks: Disable, Night shade, Ominous wind

“Use disable on one of the Pidgy!” Ash called out.

Darkrai's eye began to glow as one of the Pidgy suddenly found themselves frozen in the middle of pulling a worm from the earth.

“Now use nightshade.”

A ball of purple black energy struck Pidgy head on, knocking it back and into unconsciousness.

“Go Pokeball!” The starting trainer cried out before throwing the red and white ball at the Pokemon, on contact the bird turned into light and was pulled into the poke ball. Their wasn't even a sign of struggle of the Pidgy trying to free itself from the ball as it locked itself, securing his capture of the bird.

Ash ran over and picked up the ball proudly. Looking over to Darkrai who had what he could only guess was a pleased expression as well.

“YES! I caught a Pidgy!”

Darkrai looked at his trainers display of merriment.

He could tell that things were going to be very interesting for the foreseeable future.

====

Oak wallowed in despair in his lab, sitting at his desk while half lying across the table.

“Great.” He said sadly. “A once in a lifetime chance to study a darkrai up close and I just give it away. And it's not likely that any trainer worth his salt will just hand back a legendary pokemon in exchange for a Pikachu.”

“Pika-chu.” Said the electric rodent sitting on the desk, absently patting the scientists head in a comforting manner.

“You know you'd be more comforting if you didn't....”

*CCCHHHUUUU*

“...Shock me every 2 minutes.” He coughed out.
13133222222222122111.title: Darkrai listen's to Ash

choices: A girl carrying a mangled bicycle glaring at Ash
131332222222221221111.content:
It had to be the single most uneventful trip to Viridian city any trainer from Pallet ever had.

'Well not uneventful' Ash chuckled in his mind. His hands passing over the 6 full pokeballs on his belt.

The pidgey was easy enough to capture with legendary power at his disposal.

Next came a Spearow from a flock that had tried to attack the boy when he had tried to single one of them out for capture. He'd had Darkrai use disable to render them statues before picking out that one Spearow he wanted in the first place. The one with the unusual and rare colouring.

Next was a Caterpie followed shortly by a Magicarp when he caught the little green bug by a river. He decided to use one of his new bird pokemon for these two relativly weak pokemon. He couldn't rely on Darkrai too much after all, no matter how tempting it was.

His last and most surprising capture was not one of the many common Pokemon that litter the path between the towns. No instead he'd come across a Pincer! An honest to horned, rare as can be in these parts Pincer!

Fortunatly for him the Pokemons physical attacks had no effect on the phantom like Darkrai. A single nightshade had taken the stubborn pokemon down like it was a Smochum.

What made the trip uneventful was that there had been no challange. He'd heard the professor tell storys all the time about when he was starting his first journey, along with tales of other trainers. Working hard to catch their first pokemon, to gain the trust of the starters they chosen and proving themselves to their friends and themselves. Catching a full belt of pokemon on the first day as a trainer with little effort left Ash feeling like he'd cheated somewhat.

He entered the pokemon centre with a crude mix of a cocky stride and a shameful shuffle. He felt pleased about his aquisitions but felt that he didn't really deserve them. He walked up to the front counter and had his first encounter with a face he would meet again and again in the future.

"Hello. How can I help you today?" The pink haired pokemon nurse said cheerfully. The ever present smile making the boy blush slightly before unclipping his pokeball belt and handing it to the pinkette.

"Can you heal my pokemon please?" He said politly.

She smiled and took the belt, unclipping each ball and putting them on a special tray so they didn't roll all over.

"I just need to take these into the next room for a checkup and any care they might need. You should get them back shortly." She said before turning and heading into the backroom.

Ash sighed and went to sit down on a nearby chair.

He couldn't believe he was here already. Even his dad took a few days to get to Viridian (Or so his mom told him) but then again Dad probably took that time to train his starter and any pokemon he caught. Ash on the other hand caught them almost without stopping to do so.

"HEY YOU!!!"

He was pulled out of his musings when a loud female voice rang through the centre. His and a dozen other heads turned to see.....
131332222222221221111.title: Viridian city

131332222222221222222222221.content:
"Mismagius: the Magical Pokemon. Mismagius chants incantations, and while some cause misery, some give happiness as well."

A purple, robe-like shadow floated above the makeshift camp formed by Ash and his friends, having noticed their campfire, unseen by any of them. Many saw Mismagius as a sinister Pokemon, due to it's pure Ghost-type. But some weren't malevolent; just playful. And this was one of them.

The witch-like creature watched as the group, consisting of two boys, a girl and a Pikachu, got up and headed to their respective tents. The taller boy looked over at his two friends.

"Ash, Dawn, you guys go to bed. I'm gonna put out this fire; we don't want to attract any wild Pokemon in the night."

Mismagius silently chuckled at this. Too late, it thought to itself. After watching the group, it floated over to one tent, close enough to here what was happening, but not enough to give itself away. A yawn was fairly audible.

"Boy, Pikachu, I'm beat!" It was the second boy's tent. Mismagius waited until it was certain the two of them were asleep, before poking it's head inside. It floated over to the boy and giggled. Her mouth opened and a lilac coloured powder drifted from it, over the boys body, before dissipating. At this, Mismagius left. She couldn't wait to see the boy's reaction in the morning!


The next morning, Ash awoke and stretched. He had a really wierd dream last night... like something was in his tent with him and Pikachu, and that something happened. "Eh... not important." he dismissed it. He looked around; Pikachu must've already gotten up, as his spot was empty.

Ash stripped of his pyjamas, and pulled on his usual outfit: his white t-shirt, his black and yellow waistcoat, his blue cargo pants, his red shoes, his dark gloves and his prized hat.

As Ash began to leave his tent, he failed to notice the changes happening to his outfit. His cargo pants tightened and shortened, become a pair of denim short-shorts. His waistcoat opened by itself and split down the back, becoming two parts and shrinking down into a pair of red suspenders that went over Ash's shoulders. His white t-shirt's sleeves vanished and it slowly shrank until it exposed his midriff and turned yellow, becoming a crop top. His shoes changed as well, becoming a pair of red and white girl's sneakers. Finally, his hat became a small blue hairtie, and it pulled his unkempt black hair into a side ponytail, which was far longer than it should be regarding his hair's length. Ash's outfit and hairstyle not resembled that of his old friend, Misty of the Celadon Gym.

Ash, completely oblivious to the change, exited his tent and looked around. He spotted a small note on the ground:

"Dear Ash,

Gone to town to get supplies. Dawn is at stream, getting washed with Pikachu. See you when I get back.

Signed,
Brock."

Ash nodded and crumpled up his note. He decided to wait until one of them came back, and sat near their extinguished campfire.
131332222222221222222222221.title: Ash Ketchum, the Crossdresser

131332222222222222222121.content:
"Oh no, this can't be happening!" shrieked Momoko.

"Well it is." Hinagiku replied.

"But we defeated the demon who cursed the rice." said Momoko.

The three girls were watching every single one of their fellow female students waddle their (still) fat bodies to school. Each girl walking with her head down, no longer possessed with an insatiable hunger, was now aware of her own blubber. Each girl was now aware of her thick wobbly thighs, of her fat belly hanging over her skirt, of her widened butt, of her flabby arms, her new rolls and folds which adorned her body. Not to mention these girls were unaccustomed to a heavy chest from their blimped breasts. Many of the girls were turning red as they struggled with their tight uniforms becoming quite flustered as they tried to manage their clothes in vain. Buttons popped, shirts untucked exposing their cute bellies, skirts rode up, and small panties produced wedgies which the fatties would have to deal with in open sight much to their humiliation.

"Jeez! They're still very fat." said Hinagiku

"Unfortunately it appears as though exorcising the rice didn't return the girls back to their initial weights." said Yuri.

"So you mean.." Momoko began

"Yes the weight the girls acquired won't magically go away." said Yuri.

The fat girls spent the rest of the day facing all the struggles of a fat girl and coming to realize that this was they're new life. The next day...
131332222222222222222121.title: yes

1313322222222222222221211.content:
The following day the fatties repeated their heavy waddle but with a different attitude than the previous day.

"Oh you've got to be kidding!" yelled Momoko.

"But they're already so fat." Yuri pointed out.

"Just look at them stuff themselves." said Hinagiku

"Wha! But they're not even eating the cursed rice." shouted Momoko

All of the fat girls were stuffing their faces, but not with cursed rice, rather with anything they got their pudgy hands on. Girls were munching on candy, cupcakes, cookies, gleefully furthering their fattening. Surprisingly the girls accepted their fat over night, and embraced a gluttonous lifestyle, probably due to the fact that every girl, except for three, had become fatties.

"This is crazy. Hey you come here." Hinagiku said pulling a girl over. "Hey why are you eating so much don't you want to be thin again?"

"Eh not really." the tubby girl said with a mouthful of cupcake.

"Huh? But you're so fat." said Yuri.

"So is every other girl." the chunker said licking her fingers.

"But don't you miss your thin body?" Momoko interrogated.

"Well at first I hated all this fat, but than I realized what a pain maintaining a thin body was. Now I can eat all I want." she said reaching in her backpack, pulling out a bag of chips. "Plus being fat isn't bad at all. I never realized how soft it was and its fun to play with." the fat chick said grabbing her belly and giving it a jiggle.

"Don't you care about you're appearance?" Hinagiku asked.

"I do, and looking at all of the fatties, I've grown to think that fat girls are pretty. I mean just look at my body, my cute belly, my chunky tush, my squeezable boobs, all of my jiggly fat, it just makes me a dropdead hotty." said the heavy girl grabbing various parts of her body to demonstrate its jiggly softness. "You know you three are the only thin girls here, maybe you should put on some weight." the fat school girl suggested.

The three girls' reaction was....
1313322222222222222221211.title: the fat girls accept their weight

1313322222222222222221212.content:
The next day was just as arduous for the girls as before. Their unfamiliar weight constantly hindered them even the simple task of walking proved troublesome. The girls hung their heads low as they looked upon one another's ruined body. The girls tried to find solace in their equally fat friends. The sporadic wailing of a girl breaking down from her clumsy girth became very common at the school. Girls would hold each other in their fluffy arms, their fat flesh squishing against each other in the process. At least when they were under the spell, they were distracted by a relentless hunger, now their fatness was unavoidable.

"Those poor girls." Momoko spoke.

"Its all that Omamba's fault, cursing the rice to make all the girls fat." Hinagiku growled.

"They look so uncomfortable." Yuri said staring at a girl bursting from her uniform.

"Is it really going to be like this from now on?" Hinagiku pondered.

"Maybe gym class will slim the girls down." Momoko hoped.

Unfortunately Momoko's light of hope would become dim at what transpired at gym class. Yukiko the most athletic girl at school, also the first victim, was desparately trying to shed the weight. Yukiko stood there in a tight tank top and a pair of undersized shorts. Yukiko's face was red being aware of her belly hanging out from underneath her cumbersome tank top which once hung loosely on her slim figure. Her gym shorts which had fit her perfectly merely days earlier were painfully tight, riding high on her wobbly thighs as they dug deeply into her soft flesh. The other girls were in the same conundrum as poor Yukiko. Further frustrating Yukiko was the fact that she was the fattest of the lot, being the formerly ideal girl this weighed heavily on the lass.

"Look Yukiko's going to jump hurdles." stated a surprised girl.

"That's Yukiko for you, even fat she still gives it her all." added an impressed girl.

"Come on you can do this." Yukiko said to herself looking at the hurdles ahead of her.

Yukiko began to run immediately burdened by her weight. Her fellow hefty peers cheered her on. Having only begun, Yukiko was already sweating and rapidly losing her breath. 1313322222222222222222212122222121.content:
Goku was preparing for the Omni-King's Tournament, which was happening the next day.
Man, I can't wait for the tournament tomorrow! Goku thought.
"Oh yeah, I should probably tell Chi-Chi..." Goku said to himself.
He walked to the kitchen and saw Chi-Chi there, washing dishes.
"Hey Chi-Chi, tomorrow-"
"Oh, I forget to tell you!" She cut him off. "I planned a day for us since Goten is staying at Capsule Corp!"
Goku hesitated. "Uh, I need to go to a tournament tomorrow..." he replied.
"WHAT!?" Chi-Chi yelled, dropping the dishes. "Goku, we never spend ANY time together!" She scolded. "You're always off saving the world and I'm always sat here making dinner for when you get back! Have you ever even kissed me before?!"
Goku thought about it, then shook his head.
"Exactly!" She responded. "We're supposed to be married, yet we spend more time apart than you and Vegeta! How can we be married if we're never even near each other?!"

"Man, Mom's really laying into Dad." Said Goten, who was watching from outside the house.
After 10 more minutes of yelling, Goku finally agreed to talk to The Grand Priest about postponing the tournament, and they went to bed.

1313322222222222222222222222122111.content:
It was the day that the Leaf team of Yamato, Sai, Sakura and Naruto were going on a mission to hunt for their missing teammate/friend, Sasuke Uchiha, from the clutches of one of their main enemies, Orochimaru. They received info from the fallen Akatsuki member, Sasori of the Red Sand, that he was meeting Kabuto to construct a meeting at the Tenchi Bridge. The team went there and Yamato disguised himself as Sasori to get the info from Kabuto about the whereabouts of Sasuke. However, Orochimaru interrupted the meeting and Kabuto revealed that he's with him the whole way through after learning that it was Yamato in disguise. Yamato signals that the team to come out and face the evil duo. Naruto was angry to see them and want to beat them senseless for taking Sasuke. But that's when he felt a strong negative chakra from right next to him. He sees Sakura growing very angry and she seems to be snarling at Kabuto and Orochimaru.

"You two bastards give Sasuke-Kun back right now! I want him now!" Sakura said in pure hate.

That's when the shocking part comes in. Sakura was then covered in a red bubbly cloak and her form seems to be changing. Her gloves were tormed a little because of her nails becoming claws. Her teeth becoming sharper than before and her eyes starts going red with anger.

"GIVE HIM BACK NOW!!!" Sakura screamed in rage as she launches herself to Orochimaru and clawed his face to throw him and he hits tree after tree after tree. After the attack, Sakura slowly looks behind her at Kabuto and her team. Naruto looks at her in absolute shock at what he's seeing before him.

"I know that chakra, but that's impossible!" Naruto thought in disbelief at what's happening to his friend.

Yamato keeps himself calm as he's aware of how Sakura got the chakra of the Nine-Tails.
1313322222222222222222222222122111.title: During their fight against Orochimaru

13133222222222222222222222221221111.content:
It was at the hospital after the mission to rescue the Fifth Kazekage, Gaara, from the Akatsuki went well. Kakashi was recuperating on the hospital bed while Tsunade, Jiraya and Yamato were with him. During the conversation about Naruto's rage over their near loss of Gasra, Tsunade revealed that it could've happened to Sakura too. The men were confused about what Tsunade is referring to until she said that Naruto is not the only Nine-Tails Jinchuriki of the Leaf Village.

"What?! That can't be true!" Kakashi said in disbelief.

"Trust me. I wished it wasn't." Tsunade said.

"How long have you know this?" Jiraya wondered.

"During the days that you and Naruto were out of the village." Tsunade answered.

"Can you tell us how this could happen?" Yamato suggested.

"Of course. It was during one of our training sessions. Sakura was so determined to bring Sasuke back to the Leaf along with Naruto. She was thinking about what Orochimaru was gonna do to him and that's when her anger starts to take effect." Tsunade started.

________________________________________

Sakura and Tsunade's Training Session.

Tsunade was showing Sakura about the use of her healing abilities and her new found strenght. While doing so, Sakura had a flashback on what Sasuke said before he left the village.

"Sakura. Thank you." He said before knocking her out.

Sakura then grow infuriated about what could be happening to the one she loves by the overgrown snake in the grass, Orochimaru.

"Sasuke. I won't let that psychotic bastard use you like this. I'll rip him to shreds if I had to." Sakura thought in anger,

That's when the cloak starts to come out and Tsunsdd looks at her in shock. The cloak took the form of what it appeared to be a fox and Sakura's form turned more animalistic. Tsunade sees her student's transformation and looks into her eyes as they are red and cat-like.

"The Nine-Tails chakra?! It can't be!" Tsunade thought in disbelief.

Sakura then launched herself at Tsunsde to attack her. Tsunade moved out of the way and goes on the defense. Sakura got more angry and a second and third tail grows behind her. She continues on the the attack on Tsunade and she hits her with one of her tails. A fourth tail comes out and Sakura roared as she's now covered in blood. Tsunade gets back up and looks to see Sakura in a second form of the Nine-Tails chakra.

"Looks like I got no choice. I'm gonna have to fight." Tsunade thought as she stands her ground.

Tsunade runs towards Sakura in an effort to bring her back to her senses.

__________________________________________

Present time

"I managed to bring her back to normal and knocked her out long enough to bring her here. I run some test on her and I put a special seal on her just in case it might happen again." Tsunade finished explaining.

"I can't believe you knew about this the whole time and never said anything." Kakashi said in disappointment.

"I know and I'm sorry. I don't want the pressure getting to you having to deal with Naruto and all." Tsunade said.

"Which reminds me. Does he know about this himself?" Yamato wondered.

"I don't think so. If he did, he would've said anything about it to me by now." Jiraya said.

"I think we should keep it that way for now. He'll go insane if he finds out." Kakashi said.

"Agreed. That's why I'm placing you as Leader of Team 7, Yamato. You're the only one in the Leaf that has the ability to keep the Tailed Beast in check." Tsunade stated.

"I understand. Where's the seal on Sakura, by the way?" Yamato wondered.

"On her core. The same place where Naruto's seal is placed." Tsunade said.

"Got it." Yamato said.

"We're counting on you, Yamato. Good luck and keep my student alive." Tsunade said.

131332222222222222222222222212211111.content:
Back at Tenchi Bridge, Yamato remained behind everyone and watches how this will unfold. Sai keeps his emotionless expression on him while Naruto tries to wrap his mind on what's going on. They then hear footsteps coming towards them and they all turned to see Orochimaru coming back to the bridge with his face sliced to reveal another face. Orochimaru fixes his own face by putting his skin back on him and looks back in at the team.

"I must say, I am intrigued by you, my little pink flower. I'd never thought that the Leaf would be possessing two Jinchurikis of the Nine-Tails. Looks like you found yourself a fellow Jinchuriki sister, Naruto." Orochimaru chuckled.

Naruto was infuriated by that comment while still trying to figure out how Sakura has the Nine-Tails's Chakra too. Sakura was looking straight in Orochimaru's eyes with blood lust in hers while crouching on the bridge.

"You know, I wonder how Sasuke would feel if he sees the pink kunoichi holding such power and never realized it before? Maybe we'll put her against him so he can stretch his wings for a bit." Orochimaru suggested with a chuckle.

"Stop it." Sakura said in anger.

"Hmm?" Orochimaru thought in confusion.

That's when two more tails grew behind her and Sakura looks like she's ready to unleash Hell on Orochimaru.

"Stop talking about Sasuke like that!" Sakura demanded in rage.

Everyone, except Orochimaru, was then shocked as Sakura realised more of the Nine-Tails Chakra and the aura around her gets more bubbly as her anger grew. Orochimaru was impressed that Sakura can handle such power like this. Her eyes glow even more red as she looks at Orochimaru.

"Well, if you want to see Sasuke, you'll just have to force that information out of me. Though, I don't think that's possible for someone like you." Orochimaru challenged.

"Get over here and I'll prove you wrong!" Sakura said as she goes after him.

Orochimaru decided to play a game of cat and mouse with Sakura as he retreats into the forest with her following him. Naruto looks at the forest in shock at what he had just witnessed. "Naruto! Where are you going?!" Yamato called out.

Yamato wanted to tell him not to go, but he knows that once he's made up his mind on something, nothing is gonna change it. So, there's no point in arguing with him.

"Fine. But I'm coming with you. Sai. Keep an eye on Kabuto for us until we get back." Yamato ordered.

"Understood." Sai said.

Yamato goes with Naruto to go right after the angry Sakura fighting Orochimaru.

1321121.content:
Ron Stoppable was an extraordinary child.

In case you didn't know that meant their was something unique about him right from the beginning.

Even as a child of kindergarten age he was able to grasp concept's far more difficult than even some adult's. Reading at a grade many time's his year group and coming up with idea's that to most adult's upon hearing it would mearly sound like the humourous rambling's of a child, if you actually thought about what he said you would realise he had a great idea.

Unfortunatly this intelligence would fall into disuse. Surfacing only as a flash of inspiration and a stroke of genius. Why? Well it's because of the first day he went to pre-k. The day he met Kim Possible, his first real friend.

His intellectual growth began to slow when he became the red head's freind. No longer did he have to pass the time by learning and studying. Not when their were games to be played. Another factor in his stagnating intellect were Kim's family. Alway's telling her that 'anything's possible for a possible'. Alway's helping her along and encouraging her. While at the same time unintentionally sending Ron who at this pint was though still highly observent if not naive a message. In his young mind he deduced that 'If anything was Possible for a Possible. Then since he was not a possible then he was capable of nothing.'

It didn't go exactly like that but it was pretty much th same thing. This new lack of studying coupled with this naive realisation stuck with him and ended up turning him into the high potentialed slacker he was today.

Now then. Let's see what would happen if Ron met someone else if pre-k. Someone like, Oh I don't know, how about....Bonnie Rockwaller.

===========================

Young Ron Stoppable looked out over the playground looking for something to do. His parent's hadn't let him bring that 'the return of the king' book he'd been reading and insisted he try to make some friend's.

He saw a bunch of boy's playing soccer. That was out since it was already 3 against three.

Some girl's playing jump rope. He was a kindergartener and even he knew that would brand him a girl for a considerable period.

Let's see. Girl's playing jack's. Some kid's hanging from the jungle jim. A red head girl getting piked on by bully's. Boy's playing with acti....what was the last one.

He looked over to the tree near the corner of the yard and saw a red haired girl getting picked on by three, rather strange looking boy's. The girl looked like she was going to cry. If his parent's had taught him anything that he hadn't already learned himself it was that making people, especially girl's was wrong.

He steeled himself and took only two step's when a cry broke over the playground. He saw one of the kid's that had been holding onto the jungle jim had somehow got herself stuck. Well not so much stuck as she was hanging from the highest point and looked to scarred to jump down.

In Ron's mind some one who was already crying was more in need than someone who has yet two so he rushed over to help the girl on the climbing frame and called up.

"Jump." The girl hanging on for dear life shook her head furiously. "Uh uh."

Ron just said back. "It's alright. I'll catch you."

The girl looked at him for a few second's befroe replying."Promise?"

He nodded and held his small arm's out.

That seemed to be good enough for the girl as she let go and fell down to be caught by him...actually not caught by him as much as him grabbing underneath her just before she hit the ground to cushion her fall which wasn't all that big to anyone who wasn't a small child.

"You saved me." The girl cheered happily as she gave the boy his first non familial hug. She pulled away and said to the boy with a wide smile. "Wanna be friend's?"

The boy looked at her for a few moment's. His mom and da d did say he needed some rel freind's instead of just Rufus. He nodded.

"Come on. Let's go play on the tetter totter." The girl said pulling him in a demanding way.

"I'm Ron." The boy said as the girl pulled him. The girl turned again to face him.

"I'm Bonnie." She said before continuing to drag him to the yard toy.

Back with the young red head it was not thank's to the help of a young blonde boy that saved her but a small african american girl. The two quickly became friend's.

Outside the playground an older redhead looked into it in confusion. That was not how thing's were meant to happen. She hoped this wouldn't effect her own timeline before she disipeared in a swirling vortex.
1321121.title: Ron's first friend

choices: Let's stick with this for a while
13211211.content:
Now I know what your thinking. Won't Ron growing up with Bonnie instead of Kim just make the problem of his growth being stunted worse?

Well no.

If weve learned anything about Bonnie from the show through her rivalry with Kim that she like to be the best but from her little speech about the food chain that she believe's that the best should only associate with the best.

So a Ron Stoppable who act's more like a comic bumbler would most certainly not count as the best.

==========================================

From the day they met Bonnie Rockwaller and Ron Stoppable were the best of friend's. They'd do everything together they could. Even when it was something girly like a tea party Ron just gritted his teeth and smiled. Likewise when Ron would say or do something that was beyond the young girl's understanding she would just smile and nod.

Both of their parent's thoght it was wonderful that the two had become friend's. The Stoppable's because it got the boy out of the house when he went to play at Bonnie's or was allowed to sleep over. (the kid's were young so they had no problem with it.)

Bonnie's father Alex Rockwaller howeever had a differant reason. Well of course it was good that Bonnie was making freind's. What really caught the author's eye though was that the boy was far more intelligent than even some adult's. Three thing's were obvious to him one was that this boy had an enormous amount of potential. Second was that his parent's didn't seem to notice or care and third was that it seemed to be rubbing off on Bonnie. Which was exactly what he wanted.

Bonnie was alway's trying to follow what Ron was trying to say or do. He would explain it to her and she'd try to copy him. Even after he went home the boy's intelligence and mannerism's were starting to show in his daughter.

As time past however he noticed that Ron was exibiting less intelligence as Bonnie got moreso and older. He realised that she was starting to act like her mother and bratty older sister's which she was left to when Ron wasn't around and he was researching for a novel. This had the side effect of pushing around the blonde boy and giving him less and less room to speak or do what he want's. If this kept up then he might turn into a repressive. Someone with a genius mind but almost an idiot on the outside.

He couldn't let that happen. The boy was to smart and had too much potential for him to become his daughter's sidekick.

So whenever she started acting like her sister's or mother he always made sure to admonish her, then immediatly afterward's try to give Ron a confidence boost in the hope's the boy wouldn't repress his genius.

He sighed in relief when it started to work. Ron came back full force and his daughter was saved the horror's of becoming like her sister's and mother.

Honestly he loved the woman but she was to much of a perfectionist for his liking and alway's acted like her daughter's wouldn't harm a fly even if they were pulling off it's wing's right in front of her. He loved his older girl's as well but he hated the way their mother's attitude had ruined them. They literally did whatever they wanted when he wasn't around and if he knew what they did and tried to punish them that was the only time he'd ever see his wife get angry. Those girl's could kick a kitten in front of her but she'd just comment how nicely they were playing with the cat.


So it continued this way. Where he would stagnate with Kim Possible as his best friend he would now continue to grow. His ability and intelligence would skyrocket in the upcoming year's. He became particularly skilled in the field of engineering which was discovered by both his parent's and the Rockwaller's when he was over one day and fixed Mr Rockwaller's car in only ten minute's. He also became a whiz at cooking. His mother had more than willingly handed him her apron when she tried a cake he'd made with her help. Of course she was still their to help him with the more dangerous stuff. Just because she wasn't all that intersted in her son didn't mean she didn't love him and wanted him to get hurt.

Both family's had been struggling to fit their pant's until the boy started making healthier foods that were no less mouth watering.

As he planned Bonnie also benifitted from her friend's mind. Alway's scoring in the top 5 in school. She had yet to show any specific interest's in an intellectual subject but was quite good at the thing's she did do. She was doing very well in her ballet lesson's and he was proud when she aked him about his writing and chuckled when she looked like she was trying to understand what he was talking about yet failing miserably.

Now. What's say we skip ahead a few year's to middle school were Bonnie met's Kim when she tries out for cheerleading.

1321122221.content:
If you'd have asked Ron Stoppable's parents what they'd thought of their son, they'd answer that he was there special little boy.

Of course that would be if you asked them together.

If you asked Mrs Stoppable the question she'd say that he was special alright, but not in the good way. It was clear that all she saw when she looked at the boy was the girl she never had and that was the end it for her.

If you asked Mr Stoppable he'd say he was special in the essence that they're wasn't anyone quite like his son. Again that wasn't meant positively but he wasn't nearly as bad as his wife. He had wanted a son after all. Of course not quite like Ron.

The boy was a walking eccentricity. His mannerisms, seemingly inbuilt perpetual frustration and boredom and his fixations with things to the point of obsession made his parents believe he had some form of handicap.

The doctors could find nothing wrong with him physically so they suggested a child psychologist, much to Mrs Stoppable's dismay at the money they had to pay for it they sent him for a session the next day.

When they came to pick Ron up the therapist said he had found the source of Ron's apparent 'condition'. They were stunned that it had been found so quickly... (with Mrs Stoppable only reinforcing the feeling that money had been wasted.) … and asked him what it was.

He smiled before leading them inside and pointing to the couch their son was on. Giving them the shock of their lives.

Their in the middle of a pile of toys sat Ron. For the first time since they could remember he looked to be enjoying himself. Which was strange since he already had as many toys as any other child. He was playing with the colourful cube in his hand, effortlessly matching the....colours..in ...se-conds.....?

Realisation hit them like a freight train as they got a good look at the toys. No, not toys, puzzles. Ron was surrounded by just about every puzzle game you could get your hands on. The rubik's cube he had just picked up and finished, a jigsaw that they would take hours to complete themselves, a chain link game that sat scattered about the room. Puzzles of almost every size and difficulty lay about their son each showing that they had been completed.

“He's a prodigy.” Said the therapist. “The reason he's so bored and frustrated is because the environment he's forced to live in doesn't present enough challenge for a mind like his to properly push itself.”

The stoppable's minds kicked into high gear. This was actually the furthest thing from their minds.

While Ron continued with his games the Stoppable's talked with the therapist about what they should do. He explained that if left alone then Ron would eventually conform to the world around him, his genius would suffer greatly though and leave them with a son with a repressed genius, one who would most likely be prone to only fits of brilliance in between long periods of laziness, prolonged childishness and feelings of inferiority.

Their second option was to capitalise on his genius. If they encourage him and get the right education for him then they're was no limit to what Ron could do. This option might cost them now but it will 'definitely' pay off in the long run.


To the Stoppable's this was the silver lining they'd been looking for. One that took the silver lining right out of their pockets and then some.

Its name was the 'Zavier' pre-school for the gifted.

(I know, bad joke.)

It cost them a pretty penny. Six hundred thousand pretty pennies they couldn't argue with the school's apparent results. Within the relatively short period of the 2 decades the school had been running every graduate had went on to prestigious schools and the first few class's when it first opened ended up in the ivy league.

So this is where we find Young Ron Stoppable. In a pre school for the gifted on the other side of town to the one he 'would' have been going to. One where a certain young girl was being rescued by a dark skinned young girl from three 'weird' looking little kids.

Outside 'that pre- school a teenage redhead looked puzzled at the scene.

'Where the heck is Ron?'
1321122221.title: Prelude to genius

13212.content:
Ron Stoppable was what many would call a 'born genius'. Since early childhood was able to grasp concepts some adults let alone a chilld his age should be able to understand.

His parents though did not seem to notice their young prodigy. They were to caught up in their own lives and happiness to notice when their son was able to read his father's advanced algebra books as easily as reading 'green egg's and ham'. They never asked his opinion about anything even when it was something to do with him like most parents do to develop their childs social skills and made those decisions without even telling him. They alway's found a way to not be around him even on day's important to him like school play's and the like. Usually leaving him with a babysitter while they went out to enjoy the life that they believed was cut short because of their son.

His intelligence was also a subject for ridicule by children his age who thought the big words he used or they way he talked about things they couldn't understand was strange so they left him alone. His only friend was an imaginary one he created named Rufus. It was one of the best days in his life when he met Kim Possible and the two became best friends for life.

It was neglect like this along with several other key traumatic experiences that scarred the little genius to such a degree that it changed him from a prodigy into the lazy seemingly dim witted slacker that he was today.

However what if we remove the key Trauma from his life that was most likley the breaking point for him?

What if Ron Stoppable never went to Camp Wannaweep?

That means no fear of bug's. No bullying from both the campers and the camp counciler's. No ignored phone calls from his mom as proof she didn't care and most important of all no fear of monkey's.

So he stayed at home. His mind in tact and untouched by the many fears that would encompass him and hinder his intelligence to such a degree that he would be known as the school loser.

Now. Let's see the un-traumatised Ron in action shall we?

1321321.content:
Kim moaned in an annoyed tone which she couldn't help but be at the scene happening just next to her.

Her best friend since pre-k and formally voted the most undatable guy in the school since softmore year suddenly had nearly every single girl and several attached girl's sighing over him. The only one not doing so was herself and her the recent entry into the small group of friends Monique. Who she still found stealing glances at the boy as much as she could.

It was her own fault. She admitted it. She had forced him to get a haircut. Who knew it would take the guy at the bottom of the social food chain and put him right to the top. Then when he decided to change his cloth's he went from dating material to practically worship material if the entire cheersquad except her following him around like puppy's was anything to go by.

She finally got sick of it when his new vanity nearly cost the success of a mission involving the new villian Senor Senior Senior and his son Junior. When she saw him after he dealt with junior he had his old hair back and decided to go back to his old cloth's and with it his old non caring about his appeance attitude. She smiled at that. He may lose the girl's but at least he could be his true self again.

Or at least that's what she thought before she saw the girl's continue to fawn over him like nothing had changed.

It didn't make sense. Old cloth's, haircut and sttitude yet they still acted as if he was still dressed to impress. Even Bonnie was there in the gaggle of girl's with a dreamy expression and she'd called her best friend a loser ever since she met him. So what was so different now?

She slammed her locker shut and before grabbing the boy by the back of his shirt as he was booking dates for the next 'THREE MONTH'S' and dragged him off to class. The girl's moaning and booing her as she left.

One way or the other she'd solve this mystery.
1321321.title: Ron the girl magnet

13213211.content:
In the classroom things were a 'little' bit better. Of course better was only defined by the decrease in girl's in the room to openly ogle her best friend from their seat's.

She'd sank down in her chair from mental exhaustion after trying to think up a reason for all of this but nothing added up. He was back to being the school lay about who'd never had a girl so much as have a romantic thought about him (except Tara but that didn't make sense to her either). He hadn't been exposed to anything on a mission that she'd known about and his 'devil may care' attitude hadn't changed. So why was the schools female population so interested in her best friend now.

Relief from the comments and sighing came moment's later in the form of the school's constant substitute. Steve Barkin.

This man was yet another one on the 'Possible' weird list tight up their with Drakken's skin, the content's of mystery meat and Ron's...everything. For the past year since Barkin had first subbed for her math's class he had somehow subbed for every other class she'd had since then. He was even the coach for the school football team and cheer squad. Stranger still was from what she heard in the halls and from other kid's were no mentions of any other teacher except Barkin.

Now she thought about it he was the 'only' teacher she'd ever seen even around the school. Next to him, the librarian, the janitor and the lunch lady there were no other adult to be found.

Strangeness aside his presence did it's job of focusing the attention of of Ron and onto himself. He began Barking order's like his namesake and terrorising the student's out of any other thoughts except the one's he wished them to be thinking.

Kim used this time as a momentary break from the craziness of today and just started doing the assignment Barkin was handing out. Hopefully Wade could solve the Ron thing. She didn't know how much longer she could take the constant sigh's that followed him everywhere without clocking one of them
13213211.title: The permanent substitute

choices: Kim tries to relieve Ron of his 'device'
132132111.content:
A beeping in her pocket alerted her to an incoming message from her personnel genius.

Turning the Kimmunicator on she was greeted by the visage of Wade Load.

"Wade, 'Please' tell me youve found the cause of all this?" She pleaded.

The boy genius cocked an eyebrow. "It getting worse? you weren't nearly as stressed a while ago."

"That's because I didn't think it would last this long. Wade even 'Bonnie' is head over heel's for him. I saw her squeling like a little girl when she smiled at him. He has two girls on his arm at any time and Tara actually 'fainted' when he kissed her."

"Whoah." Said the boy simply. "Well I did all the test's I could using the scan's you gave me and the feedback I got from Ron's tracker chip."

"I thought that just told you were he was?"

"It also tell's give me info on your health and conditions just in case." He explained.

"Oh then...wait. Do you have 'me' chipped?" She said with a voice that could turn hair white.

He coughed into his hand nervously "Anyway, I looked over all the info and from what I could tell..."

"Yeah." She leaned in.

"There's nothing different."

She stared at the screen for who knows how long.

"What? That can't be right. What about some kind of ray?"

The boy shook his head "No energy signiture."

"Some kind of chemical, an airborne pheremone."

The boy shook his head again "His system's clean and no pheremones detected."

She was getting desperate. "Hypnosis, his Monkey magic is hypnotising them?"

The boy looked at her like she was crazy but shook his head. "Even 'magic' gives off an energy signiture Kim, if he'd used it I woulda known, besides his brain signiure is actually 'under' normal parameters, you'd need at least 50 times the normal parameter to even try to use hypnosise without a device."

"That's it! He's using a machine!"

"No kim I..." But the kimmunicator was turned off before he could explain.

"Okay Ron." She sid with an edged tone. "Time to end this nightmare."
