13213221.content:
In retrospect carrying 99 million dollars around with you was a rather stupid move.

Then again those where the kind of moves that Ron Stoppable was famous for. It was for his new money which he didn't have the sense to leave with his cash concious father it was all to simple for Drakken to take it for himself. Or he would have if he'd rembembered to pick up the cash on the way out of his exploding lair.

Kim and Wade were still wondering about Ron's claim about carrying the cash everywhere on his person. His cloth's didn't bulge from the bill's. None of his new posse carried a case or anything which might contain the money and Ron had no card or cheque book to make transactions with. He just seemed to pull the money out of thin air. Yet another thing about him that defied the law's of science.

When they'd gotten back to middleton Ron had made several realisations about his big headyness that occoured every time something cool happened to him. This time though he'd managed to make the discovery 'without' losing the thing that made him big headed.

First of all he'd broken up with Bonnie when he realised that a girl who was admittedly going out with him just for his money could never work in the long run no matter if she is one of the hottest girl's in school. She'd tried to get him to change his mind using her 'girlish' charm but he'd been adamant and she'd immediatly fell back into calling him a loser.

Next was the posse. Though they did make him look cooler all they did was live off his money and make him buy things he didn't need. He was down to 64 million as it was including the pricy 15 million dollar jet and robot pilot that got scrapped. They'd been surprisingly cool about it and went off to be the posse of 'some other rich dude' as they called him.

After all that he'd talked with his parent's who took it well..........okay well was not the word.

His mom had fainted at the prospect of her son being rich. His dad though had turned so red from anger he almost turned into a redhead before exploding. He was an actuary and worked with math and money for a living. He couldn't believe that his son could blow so much money in such a short time.

After the scolding of a lifetime (see bleeding out of ear's from ceaseless talk) he agreed with his parent's to put some of the money into investmant's for the future to make up for the money he 'wasted' and most of it into a secure account that requiered both of them to access. He also got two week's grounding. It was three month's but he'd cut it down considerably when he offered to pay of the rest of the mortgage on the house.

He was also allowed to use the money for several other purpose's.

Let's find out those purpose's shall we?

choices: Love." Ron doesn't know whether to scream in terror or smile.
132132222221.content:
Today had been one of the weirdest day's of Ron Stoppable's life.

Now take into account the fact that he was sidekick to a teen hero who flew around the world fighting super villians, he had mystical monkey power's, a talking naked mole rat for a pet and that was just the tip of the iceberg.

They however where nothing compared to what was going on now.

Kim Possible. With whom he had been best friend's since Pre K. Who had never even made a joking comment about dating him, had today all but declared that she was completly and totally in love with him.

Earlier she had ben all over the place. One minute happy and the next angry then crying her eye's out. Now he knew that some girl's had mood swing's but he was pretty sure that those didn't occur every 5 second's.

So somehow he'd ended up taking her to the fair on a date. It was here that she'd ran off crying after he had to reject her. He'd thought about this sort of thing for a long time but this really wasn't how he'd pictured it.

Almost immediatly after she ran aay he ran into Dr Bortle. A scientist who specialised in mind manipulation who told him that his Moodulator chip was controlling her. Unfortunatly that's all Drakken needed to here as he attached a device that supercharged machine's to the moodulator controller and fried it's circuit's.

"You fool do you have any idea what you've done?" Shouted Bortle.

"Yes I've taken control of Kim Possible." Sneered Drakken in triumph.

Bortle snatched the controller away and went slack jawed in despair.

"Oh no. It is as I feared."

"What's as you feared?" Asked Ron.

"The incredible surge of power resulting from when this blue skinned idiot..." "Hey." "...attached the supercharger to the controller has resulted in the chip amplifying her current emotional state a hundred fold."

"Well we can just you know, get the chip off right." Asked a nervous Ron who grew more nervous when Bortle shook his head.

"I'm afraid not. The power surge also blew out the chip. However since the chip was working with the brain it has merged the programme with the girl's mind leaving no chance bar brain surgery to corect it."

Bortle then looked away from the controller and up too Ron and showed him the image on the small screen indicating Kim's current emotion.

"Unless treated with that surgery. Youre friend in now permanently trapped in an uncontrollable state of....
132132222221.title: Moodulated

choices: Ron and Drakken try to hide
1321322222211.content:
The boy's face twisted into an un-namable position. Trying to show both fear and joy at the same time.

His head snapped to the right and his face made it's decision. Shock.

People where flying left and right as something made it's way through the fair crowd until it threw the last person seprating it from Ron to the curb.

It was Kim. Standing their with a look 10 times more prounonced than what she had been giving him all day. Her breathing was laboured though she was not tired and if theyre was any more love evident in her eyes he feared they might take the shape of hearts.

"Ronnie..." She sayed slowly and filled with intent. She began taking the last few step's toward's him with a gate to her walk fo emphasis.

He gulped audibly. It 'was' every hormonal teenage boy's dream to have a girl come on to them like this but not like this. Not because of mind control.

"Kim I don't think..." He was silenced when the girl pressd her finger to his mouth.

"Shhh. Nothing you say will get me to stop." She said as she reached for his arm only for him to yank it away.

"Sorry Kim but I can't. Your not you right now and it wouldn't be right. We gotta go see your mom to get you fixed." He said calmly. Too which the response from the red head was for her to quickly grab his arm and force him into a wall and pin him down. She looked into his eye's. Were their was once gentle admiration in them there was now crazy love. Like the people who stalk someone they like and collect their hairs and garbage in a shrine to them. They had the same love in them but now their was more than a hint of anger and what scared Ron most. Lust.

"Your going to accept my feeling for you Ron Stoppable." She pressed him harder to the wall. Her face inch's from his. "Even if I have to force you too!" She said seethingly before forcing her lip's onto his in a powerful to the point of painful kiss.

Ron was caught off guard when this seemingly angry girl forcefully pressed her lips to his into a very 'unenjoyable kiss. If she pressed any harder he felt like if and when she pulled away that his lip's would be blue and bruised.

Mustering all he could he managed to give one mighty twist of his whole body and shoot down between the girl's arm's to escape them before breaking off into a run.

Kim was surprised for all but a few second's before chasing after him.

As the two ran away the too older scientist's who had been gaping a moment ago regained control of their jaw's. Drakken smiled his toothy grin before laughing maniaclly.

"This is even better than controlling her. With Kim Possible too enamored with her buffoon to care about anything else my global conquest is assured. HA HA HA!!!" He laughed wickedly while Dr Bortle just looked at the moodulator's controller in a confused manner.

"If Kim Possible has moodulator number 1 then where is number 2?"

"...HA HA HA H- wait. Number 2?" He said slightly scared. Flashbacks of how Shego had been acting today came to mind and he suddenly realised where number 2 was. "Uh oh."

The sound of people crying in terror filled the air as once more people where roughly flung to the side by a powerful force.

"Ohhh Dreeww." An all to known voice called out in a 'come hither' fashion.

Not even bothering to turn around he ran in the same direction the Bufoon and his most hated enemy went. Soon followed by a now psychotically in love with him Shego.
1321322222211.title: Crazy girl's

13213222222111.content:
"Dibs!" Drakken said

"Double Dibs!" Rom said at the exact same time.

"Gah! Curse you and your superior dibs calling. But I am still not moving." The evil genius said adamently, curling even tighter into his hidey hole under the floats paper mache.

"Neither am I. You saw what Kim was like out there. The Ron-man isn't out to die suffocate from a kiss."

Drakken covered his mouth to stop himself from laughing out loud. "Alright whats so funny?"

"Nuh,nutj-nothing. It's just amusing that you think all they'll do is 'kiss us' to death."

"Well that's what was happening wasn't it. I think my cheeks are still bleeding from Kim's tongue goin round it like a bee."

Drakken scowled "You ignorant buffon think! Those women are trapped in an unending frenzy of amourous feelings for us! Do you honestly think they will be satisfied with a little making out?"

"What are you..." Drakken wiggled his eyebrows. "...No."

"They are more hormone driven than a hundred bridesmaids whove just watched Titanic! If they catch us everything below our waistline WILL BE IN A CAST FOREVER!!!"

*RRRRIIIPPP*

"What makes you think I'll let you get a cast Drewybear." Shego purred before throwing the paper product over her shoulder. Right behind her Kim stood over Ron, licking her lips slowly and moving her legs just enough to flash the boy beneath her.

"Uh heh heh Hi KP." The blonde chuckled. "Any chance Drakken was overreacting a wee bit?"

The two raging bags of lust above him shook their heads in unison.

"I see..........NINJA VANISH!!!" A cloud of smoke erupted from Ron's cloths, and when it cleared mere seconds later the boy was gone.......only the boy.

"YOU LITTLE WEAS*MMPPHH*" Drakken cry at the cowardly act was halted as his assisstant shoves her tongue down his thoat, her plasma claws ignited and with one deft mothion wore of his jacket and undershirt.

Kim gnored the unwillingly amorous couple and scanned the crowd. Most ignoring the scene thinking it just a part of the fair and totally ingormant of the hanky panky that would soon be happening just shy of their sight. Just one sign of someone frantically running through the...THERE!!!

She jumped off the float and with years of practiced martial arts effortlessly flowed through the crowd. Powered by the pounding in her heart and the heat in her belly she chased after her one true love, intent on making ssure he could never leave her, in any capacity again.
13213222222111.title: THIS IS A GOOD HIDING SPOT!!!

choices: The two talk after 'celebrating' their step up from friendship
Ron taps into his inner monkey and escapes
132132222221111.content:
"Gotta hide. Gotta hIIIDEE!!"

Ron darted through the crowd as quickly as he could. Head shifting from side to side as he tried to find somewhere to vanish from Kim.

"Tilt a whirl? Nope banned. Fun house? Took three days to get out last time? Petting zoo? Baby goats ate my pants....AHA!" He had a eureka moment and ran for the Ferris wheel. Pulling some money out he flashed enough at the guy to stay on for an hour and dived into the little room. Pulling the door behind him.

The box slowly moved up as he slid down into the floor away from the window. He saw the lights fade from view when he hit the top of the ride and sighed in relief. With any luck Kim would give up and grow.

*KRUUUCKKK*

With a bone jarring movement the ride stopped. Up in the corner a little box sounded with static.

"Do not be alarmed. We are experiencing technical difficulties which prevent us from returning you to the ground. Keep calm and your ride will resume shortly.

It would have been bad news if he wanted back down on the ground at this point but he was in no hurry.

"Huh. Wonder what the problem is?"

"Could be that iron rod I shoved into the cogwheels." A muffled voice said.

"Yeah it c...." He turned and there was a click. A sultry looking Kim Possible was standing in an open doorway which she pushed shut behind her.

"Aw you bought us a private room. Oh you shouldn't have." Sjhe said before dragging him up onto one of the seats and planting herself right next to him. Hip to hip contact and a hand placed on his leg.

He gulped at the look in the one eye not hidden by hair. It was the kind of half lidded expression any teenage boy had seen on the 'after hours' channel when his parents were out. Plus the hand that was not very subtly drifting upward towards his crotch.

"Kim I...."

"I love you Ron Stoppable." He said and used her other arm to pull his head in and kiss him, far more assionatly than her last one. Her tongue stabbed between his teeth and wrestled with his own. Leaning more and more foward he soon fell back and she was laying on top of him. Moaning both soft and loudly but refusing to let him up until she was the one running out of air. "I love you so much."

Gasping for breath Ron tried to reason with her. Which was hard considering....he was hard.

"Kim...It's not you.....It's the...moodulator."

"Moodulator?" She said playfully. Rolling her hip deliberatly from her seat on his pelvis.

"A little chip on the back of your neck. Made you feel all those crazy mood swings today. It caused you to fall inlove with the first dude you saw. Which was me."

"Huh." He brushed the back of her neck and found no bump. She smiled and leaned down til her face was directly over his, her hair cascading over his face and bliccking out everything else but her beautful eyes "Nope no emotion chip. Guess what I feel is genuine...."

"No Kim It uh, guh uh." He lost language when she reached down and 'patted' him.

"....and what I feel is genuinly hard."

With that said she traced her fingers up....and his zipper down.

"Kim don't...." He pleaded with her. This was one of his wet dreams brought to life, but he couldn't do it. Not when it was because of some brain washing tech. He'd never forgive himself.

He tried struggling, but was quickly stopped when she grabbed him other arm and pressed herself fully on top of him capturing his lips again hungrily.

"This is happening Ron. Whether you want it or not..." He said with an edged tone "...So I'd get wanting it soon. With what I did to this thing before I climbed up we've got a good hour before it's fixed. And I mean to make it the best hour of our lives."

She pushed him onto the larger space of the floor. Following soon after....

In the tiny booth of the Ferris wheel, still trapped at the peak of the ride, Kim Possible and her Ron Stoppable were lying in each others arms. Theyre cloths beneath and atop them but most certainly not 'on' them.

The girl nestled her head further into his shoulder and looked up at him.

1321322222221.content:
"Well that day could have gone better." Came the voice of a male teen from the female teen sitting on the bed.

"Severe understatment." Came the feminine voice from the male body which was reclining in the bean bag chair.

Long story short Kim Possible and her sidekick Ron Stoppable had their mind's switched into each other's bodies thanks to Drakken's machine forcing them to live an oh so 'Freaky Friday' and walk a mile in the other's shoe's. Which was kinda weird since earlier that day they'd been arguing about who had the easier life like it alway's started out in those movies.

Oh sure they'd been able to reverse the switch between the mad scientist and the soldier he'd switched with and foiled his scheme. However their was the teeny tiny problem of the same machine 'EXPLODING' before they could get to it. Resulting in their current problem.

When they got home both their parent's were there. Mr Possible had hardly been happy that a boy, even if it was Kim's best friend was parading around in his daughter's body. Then the tweeb's butted in asking Him/her what it was like to be a girl before their mother shushed them off.

It got progressivly worse as the day continued. Neither of them had so much as went to the bathroom during the whole change for fear of seeing 'far' more than they should have and as previously mentioned Mr Possible was quite against Ron and to a lesser extent Kim seeing what they shouldn't.

They did eventually get to relieve themselves without them feeling anything. How exactly It's best not to say.

After dinner Ron said he needed to get home to his parent's but that was out of the question since yet again. So they ended up having to bunk with each other until they could get their hand's on another brain switching device.

Worst of all. Despite the complete insanuity of the situation they were 'still' expected to go to school the next day. A little more Kim style in Ron's life would do wonder's for his position on the food chain.

Ron in Kim's body however....

The girl/boy rubbed her/his temple and just hoped that the hours of brutal cheer practice she'd/he'd forced Ron to go through for hours all weekend would at least save some of her 'rep'.

Stage 1 of depression - Denial

13213222222222222.title: Shego wants Ron

choices: Much later....What? I'm not 'that' kind of writer.
132132222222222221.content:
Falling unconcious was a funny sort of thing.

When we go to sleep we don't actually realise weve lost conciousness do we? All we remember is laying in our bed and suddenly finding ourselves in situations so fantastic that we realise it has to be a dream, which usually ends results in us waking up. Or sometimes we feel like our heads have only just hit the pillows since we have no knowledge of our time asleep.

Of course it's not always like that, when we lose conciousness through unatural means like fainting or in our protagonists case a fist to the head they can actually see darkness spread across their eyes until they see no more and all sense of hearing vanishs. Finding themselves in akward positions once awake once more.

(That was based on my own single time fainting in my life. Why do schools have to keep the windows closed and trhe heating on all the way when its the middle of freaking summer?)

In the case of one Ron Stoppable he had a pretty good idea of when he blacked out, and sadly found himself in a place he'd never been before.

The room looed like it had been carved out of rock, and I mean the walls themselves not the furniture or anything, that was much more stylish. It looked minimalist. A vanity of square dimensions rather than the round ones like he'd seen in Kims room told him this was a girls bedroom. The single dresser and relativly small wardrobe told him this was a girl that probably didn't care much about fashion....or colour since it was all black and green..............uh oh.

"This is Shego's room." He said.

"Riight you are." Came a female voice.

Room turned his head, he couldn't do much else since he was apparently tied down to whatever he was lying on.

It was Shego, wow! He knew she was evil and all after their first encounter mere hours (or days) before but hot damn she was fine, physically he had seen other girls who had similiar figures or even better so he wasn't to blown away by that, and the pale green skin while a definite plus to her sheer exoticness, he'd been friends with Kim long enough to have resistance to a pretty girl.
It was just the 'aura' she exuded. It...it was hard to describe. The way she moved, the way she talked.

Everything about her just gave off the vibe that said "I'm bad, I'm better than any other girl,and you know it.'

She wasn't wrong.

"Shego? What the heck am I doing here?” He asked.

She snorted but walked closer to him, swaying her hips slowly until she was standing right over him.

“So Princess doesn't find you of course.” She said as if it should be obvious.

That made him jump, if he could that is. “Kim! What did you do to her!?”

She sat down on what he now realised was her bed....gulp. She picked up the clock at the side of the bed and showed him.

2:12AM

“Nothing. No one knows your even gone. I decided to hang around Middleton until you were alone and took you. Kimmy won't even know your missing til she wakes up hours from now. And by them I'll have gotten what I wanted.” She purred out while holding his face.

“A-and Wha-what would that-that b-be?” He stammered while her face drew closer.

“Did I mention earlier how cute I thought you were?" She whispered close to his ear. She was now sitting on his stomach and slowly unzipping her costume.

He tried to get something out. But being a typical teen boy in this sort of situation he was barely able to mumble out “16.”.

Shego eyed him for a moment before smiling.

“Should I care? And besides....” She said with her faces inch's away from his. “....I'm 17.”

He couldn't talk for the foreseeable future.

(au: De-ageing her a little makes it seem less 'wrong sick' as Ron would put it)

1321322222222222222.title: Ron believes in animology?

13213222222222222221.content:
Animology - A test involving a series of questions that tell you a colour and animal which defines your personality with surprising accuracy. Through this test you can determine who to be friends with and even determine who is your 'perfect match'.


blue fox: a born leader who can't resist a challenge.

pink sloth: a socially inept outcast and follower, who smells of overripe fruit

Now Kim of course was a blue fox, she totally bought into the fad. That is until she found that 'her' perfect match was the narcissistic Senior Senior Junior. If the book said someone like her had to spend the rest of her life with someone like him then it was just a total crook.

Of course Ron was the pink sloth, right down to the old fruit waste in his pockets. No one likes being called a sloth of course and from the beginning said the test was bogus, but Kim ignored him until the whole Junior thing. He was never more relieved.

Ron smiled as he watched Kim throw her book in the trash.

"They're is no way a book that tells me Junior us my perfect match is something I should follow." She told her best friend. Although she had to admit she was digging the flowers, candy and other things the billionaire playboy was sending to win her over.

She'd tell him no later, after he sent a car that is.

Ron was pleased with his best friends statement.

"Right on KP. Who says we should follow a book just because it says your a blue fox and I'm a pink sloth. Ron Stoppable I....'

'Your the pink sloth. *Sigh* finally.' Came a exasperated female voice.

Ron turned to face the voice and almost tripped despite standing still.

It was Amelia, 'the' Amelia. The hottest and most popular girl in school despite not even being a cheerleader. Even Bonnie went out of her way to tey and be this girls friend. She 'swayed' over to the two friends, parking herself near Ron to the point they were almost in contact.

'Uh, H-hey Am-Amelia.' He stuttered as the girl looked right into his eyes.

'So your the pink sloth huh? I guess that means were dating now.' The girl stated.

If anyone else was in the hall at that time you would have heard all become silent, instead you have to settle for Kim's jaw hanging lose and Ron's heart stopping for a second.

Kim found her voice first.

'Wait wait wait. dating? You mean the pink sloth is your....'

'Perfect match? Yeah it totally is.' She said while taking Ron's arm and snaking hers around it.

'And your okay with letting a book tell you who you could be with?' The teen heroine said heatedly.

The older girl nodded. 'Sure, it's got like a 99% accuracy rate. Besides I heard from this guy who heard it from this other guy that if you 'don't' date who the book says tothen you'll be cursed to never find anyone and be alone forever.'

Kim thought for a minute, unsure what to say since that argument pretty much negated the whole 'the book isn't always right' speech she had been about to use.

Ron on the other hand was starting to come out of his trance. Of course feeling his crush holding his side nearly put him back into one but he was just barely able to stay focused.

'You seriously plan to date me? For real!?!' The boy said in an increasing tone.

'Sure. I mean the book did say that the pink sloth was my perfect match. You are the pink sloth right?'

Ron had to think about that. He looked at Kim who seemed to want to say something but wouldn't say it. Then he looked back at Amelia who looked ready to leave as soon as he denied it, but also ready to go with him should he accept it.

The answer was obvious.

'I Ronald Stoppable and the pink sloth.' He said proudly.

Amelia smiled. 'Perfect.' Then with no warning she moved in and kissed him.

Ron tensed up, like he'd been hit with a freeze ray.....again. Kim just stared at the scene with saucer eyes.

About 10 seconds later Amelia broke the kiss and let go of her new boyfriend.

'Since were dating now, how bout you come by my place tonight and pick me up? we'll go to the movies.' The girl said.

'Y-y-y-y-y-y-yh' The boy stammered in shock.

The girl smiled. 'Great, come by around 7. See you later....Ron.' She pecked the stupified boy on the cheek and walked away. Putting a little extra swing into her hips and looking over her shoulder smiling as she did so.

The hero duo just stood they're. Too far into their own states of disbelief to do anything.

It wouldn't be until a while later that a 'WOOOOOO HOOOO!' would erupt in the halls.

Pleeke's ultra flexible body structure had let him quite literally fill every nook and cranny of the small building before his gangantuan fat reserves had grown too stupendous to contain him and he'd simply demolished the place so that he could continue growing without restraint. Something the little chef basically living on one of his many jowls was taking advantage of, glutting the helpless cyclops as much as he could as fast as he could, causing him to visibly swell out even further, expanded by inches in seconds.

"Sigh....Bon Appitite." The little experiment said in a bored tone, shoving a dozen or so doughnuts into the food hole he'd forced to stay open with some deliberatly overcooked baguets haphazardly. Sadly looking out into the yard were a much smaller blue blob and floral patterned blob were. Neither moving, neither speaking, or seeing for that matter as both were so peposorously obese that the build up of lard had made their eye lids heavier than shot puts. Even with his super strength Stitch with 13,000 pounds restricting blubber hampering his every move was able to do little more than squirm ever so slightly, and only out of desperate hunger as all of his victims were beyond starving at the moment as a result of his zero nutrition, all fat food. The human girl he'd actually 'had' to stop expanding at a mere 2 tons since the weight would crush her frail bones if He made her any bigger. Hed need to fix that before going on again and heck if he knew how.

"Api te ppit Bo Bon. *Sigh* Wi" 'Am I seriouusly starting to get bored of turning these three into theri own land masses? *Sigh* Yes'

Jumba had stopped him before he fattened the scientist to his third ton. His biggest past victim had been from a meta-physical race where body mass did not constrict movement in any way whatsoever, and could run and fight back as easily at 150 pounds as it could as 150,000. French Fry had to admit he 'd never actually had a victim rendered this helpless for this long. It was starting to get a little stale.

He moaned a little, casually flicking eclairs into Pleeki's maw like a teenager would flick cards into a hat.

Maybe go after another victim? Nah if the girl was the standard for the planets life forms then he couldn't make them even half as big enough to wash away boredom.......what to do what to do.

When did they say Jumba was getting back?
132231211.title: Fatter and fatter and fatter and fatter

choices: Feed Gantu Slowly. Revel in the Steady Expansion.
Feed Gantu Rapidly. The Excitement is Too Much
1322312112.content:
As French Fry mulled around in his head about his current stagnation, a light bulb shone above his head; an idea that he couldn't believe he had forgotten. 'The birthday boy!' He remembered how Gantu had come by earlier to catch him and his efforts had failed when the chef had spun up a birthday cake to inflate the creature up. Preoccupied with Lilo, Stitch, and Pleakly, the whole affair was irrelevant to him until now. Cackling in his french tone, he pushed the bread loaves holding Pleakly's mouth open, sliding down the gelatinous yellow mass until he got to the ground with a thud. It was a shame he had to leave his three trophies behind but he knew full well he could come back and play with them later. Not to mention when Jumba came back, he could try and get the scientist to increase the girth capacity on Lilo so she could reach Pleakly's size. But for now, there was no time to waste.

Even though they were on an island, it took French Fry a while to locate the hidden ship base of Gantu deep in the jungles of the inland. Rubbing his hands in delight, he knew there would be more fight to Gantu as well as since he loved watching his victims destroy their homes with their fat, a space ship would be a challenge to burst out of. Sneaking aboard, he began his search for the bloated shark alien as Gantu was distraught at the weight he had put on.

"It's impossible for a creature to cause this in less than a few weeks." Gantu bellowed, poking his stomach gingerly as he still was retaining the fat from the birthday cake earlier. "I'll have to go back and make that annoying experiment reverse these effects." He began to waddle and bounce his way to his equipment locker, the added pounds making it harder for his mass to move properly. Even holding his ray guns and capsules in his thicker hands was cumbersome. However, he didn't have to go far as the moment he turned around, Gantu found his mouth at the end of a pie the size of a manhole cover being pushed into his mouth.

"Bon Appitite!" French Fry cheered out, tackling Gantu to the ground as the pie was shoved in to his maw, swallowing the mess as he felt his body surge with a new coating of blubber. Sitting on Gantu's puffy chest, French Fry began his new onslaught with vigor, shoving more and more sugary items into his new victim's mouth.

"Ergh..ppffttt...I hate...sweets!" Gantu sputtered out from the parade of food being tossed in him, his body rapidly growing thicker and wider with each moment he had French Fry on top of him. Grasping the situation, he got a thick arm around the chef, pushing him aside as he headed for the door. "I have to get out of here. Get the security system lock down initiated!" Gantu yelled out, knowing full well his alien acquaintance Experiment 625, or Reuben, had shut it off since it drained power from his useless television and sandwich making devices. There was a problem though as the door slid open and Gantu exited: he couldn't move. To be more precise, his width had outgrown the parameters of the door and caused him to be wedged tightly in similar to how Lilo was thrown through the sky light of her room.

"I'm...stuck...Reubun! Get out here and help me!" Gantu yelled out, pushing hard on the walls to un-pry himself, his fat legs kicking the air behind him. He felt something brush against his stomach as he saw French Fry crawl through the space between his gut and the floor with relative ease. Gantu cursed the experiment with a passion as he struggled more in his surrogate prison.

"Vile trog! Get me out of here before I blast you to ashes!" Were the idle threats that were spewed as French Fry was loving this scenario. There was plenty of fight and resistance left in Gantu but stuck in the door, he could milk the helplessness for all it was worth. Still thinking it was his birthday, French Fry retrieved a cone party hat, tying it around the rounded face of Gantu while tying loosely around his neck a table cloth sized napkin as he whipped up a few dozen cakes with ease. Gantu's eyes widened, now knowing full well what was about to happen. "No...please, it's not my birthday!"

"No no no... Joyeux Anniversaire." French Fry spoke happily, shoving a fudge cake right into Gantu's pleading mouth. "Bon Appitite!" He was going to enjoy this. Letting the fun take hold of him, French Fry decided to...
1322312112.title: A Very Massive Birthday

choices: Let Gantu "free" before capturing him easily.
Come up with new ways to feed. Earth may have some ideas.
13223121121.content:
Gantu was doing his best to struggle in the gap of the door but the strong steel frame of the walls wasn't willing to compromise with his blubbery body as he involuntarily chewed whatever he was forced to eat. French Fry was soaking up the fun to be had here, not rushing it like he did earlier as he let Gantu chew what was in his mouth, swallow, resist some more and then playfully feed him more much to his chagrin. Repeating the cycle again and again was perfect for the mad feeder, watching as the space between Gantu's drooping gut closing the gap between his body and the floor; doing the same with his rolls of back fat and the ceiling.

"Gulp..stop it...gulp...I demand it...gulp...stop!" Gantu cried out between every forcible swallow he had to endure in order to get the message across. French Fry laughed, humming his usual cooking songs as he whipped up a few dozen cookies the size of dinner plates, flinging them like frisbees into the giant maw as they traveled down his gullet and straight to his thighs, and rear, and stomach, and any other place that required the obligatory fat rolls French Fry loved to see pile up. Gantu, of course, was still determined to unwedge himself, shutting his mouth to the barage of candies in order to focus on squeezing out of his predicament; which was getting harder now that he could feed the cold plated floor brushing against his belly.

"Hmmm..." French Fry pondered on what to do as he wanted to check on Gantu's progress but not at the sacrifice of the feeding stopping. Getting an idea, he set up a gerry rigged hose from a bowl the size of a kiddie pool filled to the brim with ice cream. Priming the pump, he tried to get Gantu to open his mouth, tickling the plentiful chins of the alien.

"Haha...knock it off ullp!" Gantu was plugged up with the hose, the ice cream flowing in to him like a water balloon as the force didn't allow him to spit it out. Feeling his stomach fill with the cold treat, he tried to protest once more of his disdain for sweets as French Fry let out a blissful sigh, watching Gantu hit his first ton as his top fat was bulging out of the sides of the door on this end. Taking the opportunity before the gap closed, he slipped under the flab that was pressing down on the floor, wiggling with enough room to get into the bigger control deck that Gantu's giant rear was sticking out in, closer to the ceiling than before as the spheres of blubber jiggled madly. Watching his thick legs kick in the air from the tube feeding, French Fry teasingly gave them a tickle and his butt a slap just for his own entertainment.

However, while taking it nice and slow, he knew that it would take much longer than before to have Gantu break out of his prison in the door as well as the whole space ship, metal not being as pliable as wood. French Fry wanted to have some additional fun but was unsure how to go about it. Thinking about it, he decided...

132232111.content:
(This is obviously going to go different from how the show went, but basically, Phoon - http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b143/z... - is an experiment that can suck in air and send it out rapidly. In this case, she'll be using it to inflate victims instead of causing massive windstorms... There was some stuff in the episode about Lilo joining some kinda weird hula club, but I think we can leave that out for the sake of this 'cause it'd get in the way of the good stuff.)

Up on top of a tool shed of some sort, a capsule with the number '540' on it was precariously balancing on a weathervane. A slight gust of wind knocked it off its perch, into a rain gutter, and down the drain pipe into a water barrel... whereupon it released its contents, destroying the barrel. A small, red, elephant-trunked creature clambered out of the barrel wreckage excitedly, as if searching for something...

As if on cue, a woman walked up and saw the wreckage of the barrel, and the little red creature. "My goodness, what is that thing?!" she exclaimed... which quickly drew the creature's attention. The little thing began hopping towards the bewildered woman, who simply stood there in a state of shock... As the creature reached her, it clamped its snout over the woman's mouth, and took in a very deep breath, puffing itself up. The woman blinked in surprise, but didn't have long to react as the creature released the air inside it through its snout and into the woman's mouth. The poor lady found herself expanding rather suddenly and quickly, her body becoming round like a ball, leaving just her head, hands, and feet sticking out of her body, with her clothes straining upon her.

The little creature, satisfied with its work, giggled mischeviously as it scampered off elsewhere, leaving the woman to bobble helplessly in shock...
132232111.title: Enter the windmaker.

1322321111.content:
As our little ball of air was inflating anyone and everyone it saw. Lilo was walking home with her alien superdog Stitch.

She had decided today to attend a differant type of dance school other than her hula school. (Which is the only school seen or even mentioned in the series) It was like a hip hop fusion dance school which for the moment had nearly all of her attention in place of catching the experiments. Something which the others were non to pleased about.

As she was walking through the main street dressed in a basketball top and a cap to compliment her neww school she couldn't help but notice that the street's were surprisingly empty. She heard people shouting but couldn't see anyone.

"Where is everyone?" She asked no one in particular.

She turned and saw her dog looking straight up. She joined him and gaped a little at the sight.

It was the missing people. Well more like ballons with people heads. Dozen's of people shaped like violet bueregard with round bodies with only there hands feet and heads sticking out. Those who were wearing loose or buttoned clothing had their belly's visible which looked tight and kinda shiny. Like they were about to pop. They were all bobbing around in the air. Either holding onto something to anchor them to the ground or bobbing about in the air several feet higher than those holding onto something.

"If this isn't an experment behind this then I'll eat this hat." She said as she tugged on her cap lightly.

a strange sound caused the two to crane their necks back down. Several feet in front of them was a round ball shaped creature with a trunk.

"Cousin." Said Stitch.

"Good now I don't have to eat my hat." The girl said in mild relief. She waved over to the creature and smiled. "Hello. Did you do this."

Phoon's response was to lunge for the girl. Trunk aimed for her mouth.

13223211112.content:
Just as Lilo was about to become much lighter and rounder all at once. Her trusty alien dog/koala pushed her out of the way. Phoon's trunk latched over his mouth as the inflation experiment began pumping it's cousin up like a ballon.

Lilo watched in sick facsination as her best freind swelled up like a blueberry in a famous film. His arms and legs began to sink in a little as his torso expanded in all directions until it was ball like. By the time Phoon was done Stitch was even rounder than when he was fat. His leg's useless and his arms flailing about and slapping his air filled gut witch made a sound like a drum being hit when he slapped it.

Lilo stared at her friend for a few moment's before she noticed that the elephant experiment had now turned it's eyes on her.

It lunged once more intent on making her a ballon. It was almost upon her until Phoon felt it's tail being grabbed in mid air. It looke around and saw it's blue ballon cousin holding it who with a mighty swing lauched the lighter than air experiment far across the island.

"Phew thanks Stitch."

The experiment nodded. The little hawian girl quickly got behind her friend and began to roll him back to their house.

"We better find out from Jumba about that elephant cousin of yours before he makes the whole island into ballon's

===================

"I am taking it from your large size yet lack of increased weight that you meet experiment 540?" Said the alien genius in more of a statement than a question.

"Yeah. It made everyone into ballon's that float in the air. Though I don't know why Stitch isn't floating." Said Lilo.

"Simple enough. 540's purpose was to inflate enemy's like ballon's making them helpless in mid air." Said Jumba as he typed away on the computer.

"What about Stitch?" Questioned the girl.

"Material's that stop 626 from floating in water also stop floating in air. Is like how you say 'lead ballon'." Jumba stood up from the computer and pressed a button on the table. The floor gave way and a steel wall shot up lined with weapon's and what appeared to be one of Lilo's normal dress's.

"These will help you capture 540." He reached and handed her a few gun's. "This ray will render any gas inert. Including special helium like chemicals that 540 use's."

"That'll make it easy." She said with a smile.

"Ho ho not easy. To make work you must do it from inside not out. Must shoot ray up 540's nose or it will not be working."

"Okay then that make's it harder. Anything else."

The scientist nodded before handing her another few weapon's of good use and then her normal dress. "This might look like clothing that Lilo wears all time. Is actually specially made protective experiment catching armour. This will stop you from floating away if you are being effected by 540's power."

Lilo nodded and took the dress. She had a feeling that she was definetly going to need it.

132312.title: Jake the american...human?

1323121.content:
To most people at first glance you'd think that Jake Long was an ordinary teenager. You'd be right of course.

Mostly.

He was a fourteen year old new yorker of half chinese descent and half....whatever his dad was. He enjoyed extreme sports, video games and spouting street talk that more often than not sounded like complete gibberish. He had to best friend's, Trixie who her friends and family secretly thought was better at acting like a boy than being a girl. They never tell her that though. his other friend was Arthur Spudinski who on the outside was a kid strange enough to be commited was actually just covering up the fact that he's one of if not 'the' smartest person in the city so that he could enjoy being a kid. The only thing about Jake that people wonder is why he dyes his hair green.

The answer would be, It's not dye.

You see Jake has a secret that 'no'one' know's about. He comes from a family of dragon's.

Magic exists you see. All over the world is a hidden comunity of magical creatures hidden in plain sight and it's dragon's job's to defend it from the force's of evil. A job that would have went to Jake as the American Dragon.

If he'd been a dragon that is.

For some unfathomable reason Jake had been born without the magical gene that allows people to turn into dragon's just like his mother. His family except his unknowing father had waited with baited breath for him to show any sign's. Smoke from his mouth or accidental partial change's were the usual signs but he'd expressed none of these traits by his 14th birthday which is the latest you could get it. He couldn't understand what his grandfather looked so disipointed in until he saw Haley turn into a mini dragon before his very eye's.

He'd been shocked to find out the family secret so say the least. He'd been told by his grandpa that he was supposed to take the mantle of american dragon. However since he didn't have a dragon form that mantle had went to his sister.

At first he'd been somewhat jealous. Not because of the whole 'save the day' thing Haley did cause he shuddered at some of the situations she got herslef into. No he had been jealous that his siter had yet 'another' thing she better at doing to lord over him.

That soon changed when he found that while he had free time to do as he pleased she had to focus all of her free time and some of her other time to being a magical crime fighter. Her grades slipped while his improved since less of the focus of the family was on him now. He still did all the things he enjoyed but without haveing to rush off after a call from gramps he foubd a 'lot' more time to study while she was becoming a nervous wreck.

Still sometimes he looked at his sister and wished that he was the one saving the world on a daily basis. That grampa and the rest of the family paid all their attention to while they all but forgot his name. That he was the one revered by the magical community that he'd barley even seen for 'his own safety'.

Sometimes even if it's just for a second he wished he was the 'American Dragon'
1323121.title: American human Jake Long

132331221.content:
A cargo plane passed over the great expanse that was the amazon rainforest. It wasn't anywhere close to landing, but unknown to them they would soon be lighter of cargo.

In the vast cargo bay were only two living creatures. One was laying rather comfertably in a lavish doggy carrier that just screamed expense. The other........was in a burlap sack tight enough to stop air from getting in.

Brandy Harrington ('Of the florida Harringtons' if you asked her) was the occupent of the carrier. She was a dog with sandy blonde fur all over and a lighter shade on her head. Her eyes were blue including what would normally be her whites. She was dressed in a pink t-shirt, pink/red ankle length jeans and open toed sandles she was taking advantage of by painting her nails pink. Her collar had a flawless diamond where there should be just a tag.

She hummed an off key tune as she thought gidily about her destination. Sure the flight wasn't something she enjoyed but the thought of her spa vacation made it all worthwhile. She just couldn't decide what she'd do first.

Mabye she'd have better focus if her 'neighbour' would be quiet. All that gasping and begging for his life was getting on her nerves.

*Bang*

Her carrier rocked as the idiot banged into it. Incidently freeing him.

"AIR!!! GLORIOUS AIR!!!"

"Okay that does it." She said irked. She forcibly kicked the door open and stepped out. Stretching a little as it was satill a little cramped in there.

She shuddered, there was a reason she preffered to stay in the carrier. This plane was filthy.

She shook her head. Getting her priority's straight she spun on her heel to face the one she'd be telling off.

"Okay. What did you thi....." She trailed off as...
132331221.title: Whiskers the dog

choices: The carrier falls down into the jungle below
They 'don't fall'. And Brandys opwners are surprised to find her new friend.
1323312212.content:
"Klieeble gabdal fliblle bing dop wa." The words came out as complete gibberish as soon as she caught site of him.

He was in a word 'Gorgeous'.....and in a string of words he was a 'burning hunk of canine that the gods had carved out of marble and brought to life just so she might die happy knowing she had seen utter perfection'

However the words she was thinking right now came out as 'WOW!!! WOW!!! HUBBA HUBBA YOWZA AHOOGA HUMINA HUMINA HUMINA AAAAWHHHHOOOOOOOOO!!!!'

He was easily two heads taller than her. His light grey fur looked so silky soft that it was only the fact her legs were numb that prevented her from going over and petting him. An orange set of overalls stretched over him outlining his every perfectly delicious muscle, every pec and line of his 6 no 8 PACK and it still needed to be partially unzipped so it would fit. A long tail swept from side to side quickly but looking to her more like it flowed as wind it's phantom grace entrancing her.

His brilliantly white perfect teeth would blind her if she hadn't moved her gaze into his perfect forest green eyes, challenging her to come deeper into them, deeper into his embrace.

This was the dog she was going to Marry. This was not a desire, this was a fact.

He chuckled in a deep, powerful voice that made her go weak.

"Heh sorry about the noise. Manners aren't the first thing ya think of when your in a burlap sack."

"Skli..." She shook her head. "S'alright." She managed to slur out.

"Anyway pleased to meet you. My names Whiskers." The six defined black whiskers at the end of his short muzzle twitched in response to his name. "Who might you be?"

"I'm yours forever."

"I'm sorry what?" He said rubbing his wolf like ear.

"I said Brandy Harrington. Of the Florida Harrington’s." She said proudly and clearly expecting her dream dog to recognise it.

"Huh. Never heard of em."

Oh who cares it was just a name. "So what brings a.....strapping dog like you aboard a dinky plane like this?"

He blushed a little at being called strapping before quickly answering. "Oh I'm going on vacation, same as you I guess what with the fancy carrier and all."

She would have agreed instantly with what he'd said if she hadn't noticed the tag on his arm and immediately saw an excuse to grasp at his muscular arms.

To: Ring Ding a Ping Ping Carnival
Item : One guard dog, former championship show dog
Price: 75 cents

"75 Cents! For you!" She looked him up and down (several times) unbelieving that someone like this was no longer a show dog let alone being sold do cheaply.

He scratched behind his head, looking anywhere but her "Yeah well the old 'pony' show ain't to forgiving, even when a little 'noodle incident' left me a bum leg." He patted his right leg, thick padding clear underneath the cloths. "Morice weren't too forgiving and packed me off to the first place that aasked."

"Oh you poor hunk of I mean poorly thunk of guy" He hugged his waist and put her head on his partially exposed pecs. Inwardly giggling like all her Christmases had come early.

He grinned cluelessly and just patted her head to the other dogs delight "Thanks but it's ok. I was never really into the whole thing anyway. Got into trouble plenty when I went off with other dogs instead of laying bout getting waited on hand and foot."

"Heh heh yeah those lazy pampered pooches are the worst." She laughed nervously, she pulled away but still held onto his arm. "Hey I've got a crazy idea. Since you can't go back in the sack and this place is kinda gross why don't I invite you to stay in my place for the flight?"

Ok this time he did properly blush, cluelessness only got you so far after all "N-n-no t-thanks I HEY!" She ignored his denials and simply pulled him over to the carrier. Ducking his head down and gently pushing him into her ultra girly pet carrier without even the slightest bit of effort. Ducking in moments later herself and closing the door behind her.

"Are you s-s-sure bout this." He muttered. "It's kinda cramped in here."

"I don't mind." She said in a sing song voice. "I'll just shift a little and....ah there we go.

"Uh Brandy your heads lying on my ch..."

"I said I don't mind."
1323312212.title: Canine god

choices: A rival of Brandy decides to claim Whiskers herself
13233122122.content:
"Wow I haveta say Brandy it was sure nice of your human to let me tag along to this place." The muscular canine said as he got out of the pool. The wet fur clinging to him showing off his physique making guest and attendent alike stop and stare for a moment.

"Oh it wasn't anything really. They like you." She made a 'dismissive' gesture with her hand.

Actually it wasn't quite that smooth. Mrs Harrington was not exactly pleased to find a grown male dog in the same carrier as and being held like a teddy by her Brandykins. Despite having a physic that most would associate with the american stereotype taking up to eleven the woman was in actuality all muscle and after ripping the metal dog carrier apart like tissue paper she made to do the same to Whiskers.....until Brandy bit her.

The woman was thick skinned, her childhood having been spent doing things that would put hair on any mans chest so a bite from a spaniel mix was nothing, but she still reeled in shock when her pride and joy who she had hand picked from the family litter as her personnel companion, who she had spoiled and raised like a daughter had actually bit her.

She watched when Brandy almost immediatly returned to the huge white furred male, wrapping her arms around him again and nuzzling the exposed fur on his chest with open affection just as the blurry eyed pooch was still half asleep.

Now the woman wanted to do nothing more than tear Whiskers away from Brandy but the overwhelming need to pamper and spoil her little pooch soon overtook her, and she was filled with dread at the idea of Brandy atually attacking her again, hating her even for taking away a companion she so clearly desired.

So 4 hours later and we arrive here. Relaxing in a 5 star luxury spa with aolmost every female in sight following his every moment, the diamond studded collar dangling around his neck which unfortunatly read 'Lawrence' clinking slightly when he lay back on a deck chair next to Brandy in her polka dot swimsuit.

"So what was that about 'laying around' and 'been waited on'?" She said while drinking a cocktail with more colours than the rainbow.

"EH I like roughing it like camping, great from time ta time but I still want a roof and a bed ta go home to." He picked up his own drink from a try given to him by a winking waitress which only the growling Brandy noticed. "Besides it was either this or the circus.....clowns." He shuddered before upending the entire glass into his mouth in one gulp.

"Aww is the puppy scared of clowns." She reached up ad scratchd behind his ear, causing his leg to kick drawing looks of jealousy from other girls that she just drank up. Grinning smuggly she reached down to hug an arm around his head.
13233122122.title: Girls don't share candy, especially eye candy

choices: Champagne continue to try and steal Whiskers away
132331221222.content:
Brandy was really glad she wasn't a cat right now, otherwise the hunk those head she was holding to her chest would be asking why she was so happy.

He wouldn't notice her tail wagging like a metronome set to high gear without breaking her firm and loving grip.

She sighed deeply. Nothing could spoil this moment.

Cue spoiled moment in 5...4...3...2....

"Well, well, well Whiny Hairy-tonne...." A nasily voice sneered out.

Brandys formally blissful expression instantly turned hard as steel. Her grip tightening on Whiskers head.

"*Guh* Bran-dy. Yo-ur ch-ki me."

The girl who he would one day call his wife (if she had her way) ignored him and focused on the new shark in the tank.

Champagne Wisterfield the III.....of the Florida Wisterfields was Brandy if you filtered out everything that made her 'tolerable' to be in a room with for more than 5 minutes, leaving behind the epitome of the spoiled heiress. A poodle with shining silver fur save for the short curls on top of her head, the puff on her tail and ends of her ears which where darker grey, dazzling green eyes and small black nose.
While brandy wore a pink bikini with black spots she wore a blue one with sea foam green wavy stripes, which many other pampered male pooches and serving stewards took notice of as she swayed over to her 'friend', her eyes locked onto the male the blonde was squeezing to death.

"Champy!" She said with a Stepford smile in a voice that made the great Dane heading in their direction turn 180. "Surprise to see you here. I thought they stopped Mongrels at the door?"

Champagne waved her off "Funny I see you every time I come here for my annual beauty treatments. Though I suppose with the amount of work you need you can't afford to ever leave."

Brandies hold on Whiskers tightened all the more.

Smiling Champy lowered herself to sit on the lounger Whiskers was occupying. Without skipping a beat she raised a hand and started running her manicured paws through his fur. "And who are you big blue and yummy?" She punctuated the last word with a flutter of her extra long lashes.

Brandy growled "Hey paws off you.....wait blue?" Looking down and cringing slightly she released her mans (once again if she had her say.) throat, returning him to normal.

"*Huff* Thanks." He gasped out while taking in air like it was going out of style. The poodle sitting next to him enjoying the look and feel of his chest rising greatly.

"Just like you to try squeezing the life out of a man Harrington. Afraid he'll run away if you let go?"

"I'm warning you Champagne. Back off Whiskers, he's mine!" Her growl as low and menacing as a junkyard pitbull.

"Whiskers? Oh how cute." The silver poodle coed over the male and reached for one of the namesakes at the end of his nose, his tail wagged happily at the feeling, which rendered him oblivious to the look of death Ms Harrington was giving the two.

"ENOUGH!" Suddenly the massive former show dog was ripped from his position and his silver would be seductress fell onto the tiles of the poolside. Brandy wrapped her arms around Whiskers perfectly chiseled bicep and dragged him inside, allowing him no more than a confused expression and a friendly wave goodbye to her.

Champange looked over the two as they vanished from sight with some interest. Thinking things over for a few moments before a cruel sneer marred her otherwise pretty face.

"Challenge accepted you mongrel bitch."

13233211.content:
Linda Flynn Fletcher did not have the greatest relationship with her daughter......okay that was stretching it. She outright thought her daughter was a stark raving lunatic.

The insane laugh, those 'unbelieveable' stories she made up to get the boys in trouble. Even the way she obbessed about that Jeremy boy she liked was more like that of a stalker than an actual girl interested in a guy. She put serious thought to having the girl commited.

Then she went into the backyard.

An enormous structure, reaching over a hundred feet in height jutted out of her back yard casting everything in shadow. All of the neighbourhoods children, soon teens and even a few adults were swarming over it, a gigantic slide complete with loops, bumps, coffee stops and a member of the american Luge team at the top giving pointers to riders while using it as a training course.

She stared wide eyed at the structure. Suddenly all those 'mad' stories Candace told her came rushing back.

'Phineus and Ferb made an elevator to the moon'
'Built a giant roller coaster'
'Giant carwash'
'beach in the backyard'

It......it was all true. Her 10 year old sons were able to build such things beyond the scope of any one person daily with absolutly no effort.

Candace stood next to her. Giggling madly and wringing her hands. Eager to see the massive punishment they would get.

The boys shot out of the slide to land at their mothers feet. Scoring perfect tens from the judges.

"Hey mom." Said the triangle head boy. "How do you like the slide?"

She opened her mouth to speak but her daughter jumped in front of her "AHA! BUSTED! You guys are in so much trouble. All summer, every day of being thought of as crazy was just building to this moment! Go on mom! Punish them! Hehehehehehehe." She once more laughed insanly.

Linda looked at her boys. Looking for all the world like they didn't think they'd done anything wrong, like they hadn't been hiding these projects all summer. When she thought about it she realised that they hadn't, they'd told her and she past it off as their imagination.

She put her hands on her hips and and looked at them sternly. "Well boys. Now that I know about what youve been doing all summer. I have to say that......"

'YES!' Candace screamed in her mind.

"...I..."

'Here it comes! Lifetime grounding. All their stuff taken away!"

"...am..."

'No wait! Even better, camp! Their going away to camp all summer!' Candace daydreamed about a relaxing summer.

"....very..."

'HERE IT COMES!!!'

"...Proud of you boys!" The red head mother reached down and gave her sons a group hug.

1323321211.content:
The back yard went oddly quiet for a moment.

It wasn't just a lack of people speaking that made it so. Birds stopped singing, cars stopped passing buy, a plane passing low overhead suddenly went silent. Even the strong winds of the day suddenly dropped to nothing. It was a complete absence of noise.

Phineas and Ferb, and Baljeet and Buford, Isabeela and her underlings (which is what they were), even Stacy who was usually a chatterbox stopped and stared.

Candace had sucked in her lips, but to keep her anger in check rather than be quiet. Her eye twitching, forehead vein bulging, cheeks inflating with words she very much wanted to scream at the top of her lungs.

Stacy, not able to keep her words in for long anyway decided to break the silence.

"Uh....."

"PH-IN-EA-S AND FERB!!!!!!" Everyone was blown back by the sheer force of the scream. The world quaked around them like the fat of Candace's 400 pounds of obesity quaked on her.

Phineas managed to look away from his massive, jiggling sister and up to his step brother with an expression that said he wanted answers. The green haired boy shrugged and tapped the gauge of the gigantifying ray they'd built, the meter on the control panel showing it wasn't even close to being fully charged.

They never noticed a thin trail of smoke rising from the tall, oddly shaped purple building in town.

She reached forward with thickened fingers and and clutched at the enormous stomach protruding a few feet in front of her. The straining candy apple red of her top making it look like she was clutching a very overinflated dodge ball. Kneading it and feeling the soft, warm flab in between her swollen palms to her horror. She was twitching like she'd taken the jar of french roast in the kitchen and downed the whole thing raw.

Stacy walked up (cautiously) to her best friend and dared put a hand on her shoulder in what she knew was a weak attempt to comfort her. "Candace, I need you to stay calm now ok? It's not a good idea to get super stressed right now.." 'At your size right now too much stress might cause a heart attack' she thought but didn't say "....Trust me everything will be o....."

"NO IT WON'T!" She violently pulled herself out of Stacy's grip "NOTHING WILL EVER BE OK! NOTHING 'IS' OK! NOTHING HAS EVER 'BEEN' OK! NOTHING'S OK!"

"Calm. Down. Candace." Stacy said gently "So your brothers zapped you and made you bigger in all the wrong places....." As well as the right places since the formally pencil shaped girl now had a chest like two soccer balls, which she would be fine with if she didn't have a stomach like a beachball "...but I'm sure with their smarts it'll be fixed in no time. Right guys?"

The kids geniuses looked at each other for a second then back to Stacy. "Well this really wasn't what the growth or 'gigantifying' ray as we like to call it, was supposed to do. But it shouldn't be to hard to come up with an ultimate weight lose ray. Ferb...."

"....You know what your gonna do today" "Aw snap." Buford grumbled when his Nerd/ Best friend Baljeet beat him to the punch in beating Phineas to the punch.

"See Candace? Everything will be back to normal in no time."

"THAT'S THE PROBLEM STACY!" The girl screamed, before all her anger left her like a deflating, overinflated balloon. She whispered out her next words. "Nothings ever normal around here."

He best friend stayed quiet and let her get things of her well endowed chest "My life isn't normal. It hasn't been normal since those two first learned to read." She pointed at her brothers. "Every day Stacy, every single day those two defy what kids should be able to do. They revolutionise the world as we know it for 'fun'. The push the boundaries of logic and expectation........and I always end up paying for it."

"All I want Stacy.....all I ever wanted was just one day that goes as I expect it to. Wake up, have breakfast..." Her huge stomach rumbled at the idea of food ".....spend time with Jeremy. Worry about regular stuff like if Mom made meatloaf for dinner or if I'm late for a date. One day where I haven't been turned into a giant or a platypus or....FAT!, or go to outer space or have submarines in my blood! One day where I get to be a normal teenager!"

"But Candace the last time your brothers didn't do anything you...."

"I KNOW! *Sigh* I know. I went totally crazy. But can you blame me." Her shoulder sagged even more and she started shuffling towards the house. "I'm not an idiot. I know I act like I'm crazy all the time. That my desire to bust my brothers make me look like a whack job in front of everyone. Maybe their right....maybe I am a nutcase." She looked over her shoulder and watched her brothers go over the machines blueprints. Her sausage like fingers curling into her ham like fist, tearing pricking at the sides of her eyes "...But can you blame me? It's so frustrating to go through all this and every time have no one believe me that....I...I just.."

She lost whatever she was going to say and just ran for the house. He immense form bouncing and jiggling and swaying with every waddled step "I HATE MY LIFE!"

"Candace stop I..."

"NO! YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT ITS LIKE! YOU DON'T HAVE TO GO THROUGH THIS EVERY DAY! NO ONE ELSE HAS GO GO THROUGH THIS ALL THE TIME! NO ONE KNOWS WHAT ITS LIKE!" With that she ran into the house, caught in the patio door for only a second before slamming it behind her.

Stacy wanted to say she did, she did know what it was like. She'd seen enough of the boys zany antics after all. However she'd always loved their inventions and plans, going along with them because they were so cool. She didn't have to live in a house with the two mega genius kids while she was just trying to be the normal kid while having her siblings intellectual superiority pushing away her every chance at that.

Candace didn't need sympathy right now. Or a shoulder to cry on. She needed someone she could relate to.

She looked at the gun. Then down at herself, a hand on her flat stomach

"Hey guys." She called to the kids.

"Yeah Stacy?"

"The gun fixed yet."

Phineas shook his head "It'll take a while."

Stacy nodded "Then I need you to do something else for me....."

"It ends now," Goliath said, standing before Puck and Demona, both bond in chains, his now human cland and the transformed gargoyle, Elisa Maza. "Change everyone back to the way they were before Demona summoned you. Do it, and you win your freedom."

"It will be my pleasure," Puck said, bowing slightly. "But afterwards, I'm going to need a very long nap."

"First the humans I'll attend," and green lightning shoot from his eyes, striking the radio tower, sending forth ripples of magic energy, transforming all the newly made gargoyles in Manhattan back to humans, including Elisa Maza.

"Then the gargoyles will I mend," Puck said as the same green lightning struck them, returning them to their rightful forms.

"If his efforts you commend, free Puck, let him homeward wend," said Puck, presenting himself.

And with that, Goliath tore the chains from Puck, freeing him from his physical and mystical bonds with that action.

Puck took to the air, laughing at the joy of his returned freedom as well as his final trick which he was ready to put in motion.

His eyes glowed green as a flash consumed him, Demona, and Goliath before anyone could react.

At the same moment, an identical flash appeared in Demona's mansion across the island.

Goliath, realizing what had happened, angrily snarled at Puck, perched atop a globe, grinning from ear to pointed ear at his latest work of mischief. “What do you think you are doing Puck?” He angrily demanded.

“Leaving my hostess with a parting gift, a way of saying thanks for all the entertainment she provided, in spite of how exhausting it may have been,” he replied with mirth, the familiar green lighting shooting from his eyes as Goliath was turned into a human for the second time that night.

“And now I leave him to you my dear, let it never be said that Puck is a poor guest,” and with that, Puck vanished, taking with him Tatiana’s Mirror.

Both Goliath and Demona were left momentarily stunned by this development, before they turned to each other as one, Goliath gazing at Demona with worry at his situation, yet steeled by his characteristic determination.

13233222221111.content:
The Mazda 3 rolled up the wooded path slowly to avoid hitting a tree or one of the many adorable woodland critters the occupant of the passenger seat would not stop fawning over.

It had been just a handful of hours ago were the Pines twins had been informed by their parents that they would be spending the summer with their great uncle Stan. When the more mature twin asked why, they'd given some cock and bull story about them needing to get out of the house and see the great outdoors.

Honestly Dipper suspected it had something to do with the tickets to Hawaii his dad had won the other day and thought his son knew nothing about, and probably didn't trust his twin sister to be able to spend that long alone without destroying the house.

He couldn't say it was a bad point, but the least they could have done is tell them more than an hour in advance before handing them luggage and booting them out the door. They didn't even get tell them were the place was. He had to google it.

Several hours of aggravating, backwoods, narrow road at the edge of a cliff face driving later and they arrived in podunk, I mean Gravity Falls Oregon.

Pulling up to the front of the shack Dipper took in what would be his new home for the next several weeks while chewing his lip. He really didn't have much confidence in a place where the sign hadn't been fixed in so long there was moss growing in the space where the S should be.

He got out of the car and went to go get their luggage, because Mabel was already running towards the shack like an overexcited 8 year old and he could already here the reasons why she shouldn't have to lift her own luggage.

"Hey there. Need any help?" A feminine voice asked behind him.

"I'd be happy for it. But I'd probably never here the end of it from my sister if I didn't do it myself."

"Can't deal with a little ribbing?" The voice joked.

"You don't have to live with her." He smiled and looked over his shoulder. He paused for a moment as he took in the fact he'd been talking to a very cute red haired girl his age. "Names Dipper."

He smiled back "Wendy. And from all that I'm guessing your the niece and nephew staying for the summer?"

"Great niece and nephew. Our parents didn't trust us to stay home by ourselves."

"At least they didn't threaten you with logging camp if you didn't get a job. though if your Stan's family then you might not be avoiding employment either way."

They laughed.

"You sure you don't need help? Those things look like their about to explode."

"Like I said. I got it." He said and started to pull himself back out of the trunk dragging the case with him. Pulling himself up and.....
13233222221111.title: Pine Trees given more time to grow

choices: Smothering her new 'boyfriend' in her head sized boobs (thicc falls)
Smothering him in the poofiest sweater she'd ever seen...or something else
132332222211111.content:
"Wow. Somebodies been eating his wheaties."

The girl blushed slightly and clamped her hand over her mouth. Kicking herself for not before just how huge this guy actually was. He was easily six feet tall or more, and built like Hercules or Samson or The Rock or something. Muscles on his muscles all hidden behind an orange t-shirt that did nothing to hid his pecs or abs and a pair of jeans so big she and Tambrey could probably fit in a leg each that he filled so well they were like skinny jeans on him. She had to shake her head a little when she realized she was staring at the way his biceps bulged like footballs as he lifted the cases.

"Oh um...yeah. I work out." He fumbled over his words. Rubbing his scruffy goatee a little.

Also really cute when he's embarressed.

"Clearly." She laughed nervously. Though that didn't stop her from looking as he carried the two loaded luggage cases to the front door like they were empty. "Now I 'know' they'res no way Stan's gonna let you relax this summer."

"I wasn't expecting to." He replied in a half joking half resigned tone. "So I'm guessing by your opinion of him that you work for great uncle Stand to?"

The redhead snorted "Work is such a strong word. I'd prefer to say that I receive money in exchange for lending my time to aid his place of business."

"Thats the textbook definition of work."

"Not the way I do it." She countered while pushing at his arm. Which she totally did as a friendly gesture and not to cope a feel of his muscles

There was a crash in the shack.

"MABEL LET HIM GO!" Came a yell from inside.

"NEVER!" Came the reply

The huge teen groaned a little and hung his head "Seriously Mabel. Five minutes and your already in romance mode?"

"Seriously? You just got here and your sister already found a boyfriend?" Wendy asked half smiling.

"Mabel's a love freak and so called 'romance expert'. She said on the drive over here she was gonna have a summer romance or die trying."

"Not much luck back home?"

"No, which is hard for anyone to believe since she's so..."

*crash*

He sighed and dropped the cases on the ground.

"C'mon lets go inside before she drives off Great Uncle Stan's customers."

"He prefers the term wallets with legs." She said chasing after him.

Heading in through the door they both paused at the sight in front of them. Though for different reasons.

Dipper's pause was from exasperation groaned. Not five minutes and Mabel had already found a new bae. Likely he'd said something nice about her, and being Mabel had taken it as a declaration of love. Hugging the boy as tightly as tourists oooo'ed and 'awww'ed and took photo's while Stan, who'd recovered from the action to start charging them for the privilage of taking photo's made round on them to take money.

Wendy's pause however was from shock. 'That' was Mabel? The girl was.........
