133231222.title: Clover Buff?

choices: Later at woohp they attempt to help her
1332312221.content:
It wasn't supposed to be a dangerous mission. Find out why a team from a tropical climate was breezing through the winter oylmpics. No people disipearing. No stolen technnology. No plot to take over anywhere or revenge on anyone/anything. Just find their secret and if they were cheating the girls should stop them.

What they didn't expect was for the coach to be impplanting them with robotic bugs that improved the teams performance through a combination of brain stimulation and chemical realese. They didn't expect the coach to be an evil maniac who was not only willing to let one of his team die but tie the girls up and send them to an icy death. Nor did they expect him to take one of them as a replacement for the dying team member.

Fortunatly Alex and Sam managed to escape the death trap. Which consisted of tying them to chairs with ski's and pushing them of in a random direction so it really wasn't much of a trap. They managed to get back to the lodge were all the competitors were staying and save the dying girl by having her sneeze out the robot bug before going to bring the coach in.

When they arrived they found him watching the figure skating match witch was being prformed by one of his own team and an 'incredibly' buff Clover. The girls gaped for a few seconds as their ridiculously muscled friend before dealing with the evil coach.

They were seriously considering that these villians just dumped a bunch of jobs in a hat before picking one and tacking on 'evil' to it.

Needless to say they caught the bad guy and got Clover to sneeze out her three bugs causing her to lose the skating talent.

Of course their was a small problem left.

"Shouldn't I be shrinking or something?" Said Clover now in her i'll fitting spy uniform. When she had sneezed out the bug's she'd immediatly lost the skill and agility to skate like she was. Though for some reason she hadn't lost any muscle.

"Yeah I mean we got all your bugs." Said Sam holding up a plastic bag containing the bug's. The girl's looked close and they could see out of the three all of them had a sort of crack along their casing or broken away parts.

"You think it's got something to do with the banged up one?" Asked Alex. She shrunk away as the girls gave her a 'duh' look.

Jerry came over for their traditional 'well done'.

"Girls I wanted to say well...Clover shouldn't you have shrunk by now.?"

She muscled girl spoke up. "Yeah I know. We think it's got something to do with these broken bugs." She said as she held up the bag.

Jerry looked at it for a few seconds before calling over the agents who had the coach restrained and motioned for him to be brought over. He titlted his head to face the man and spoke with a voice full of authority.

"You created the bugs right?"

The coach glared at him but nodded.

"What would prevent reversion if ll the bugs were removed?"

The coach looked to the side and saw Clover still as brawny as he made her and grinned." Looks like my bugs broke open inside you little missy."

Clover hit her fist into her palm. "I knew it."

The coach nodded and grinned at his small revenge. "Those bugs worrk through both stimulation of synapses in the brain to increase skill and reaction time and by releasing chemicals to induce muscle growth in the body in microscopic doses. You however took three doses of the whole thing at once when they broke open."

"So when can our friend go back to being normal instead of a beefcake?" Asked Alex in a hopeful tone.

Clover glared at her. The coach laughed.

"Revert? 'Hah hah' Mabye if the dose had been what it was supposed to be then she'd have changed back immediatly. But she took all three bugs worth of chemicals. It's completly flodded her systems. There's absolutly no chance of her changing back ever."

Jerry glared at him before motioning for him to be taken away. He turned to Clover who was frozen in shock.

"I assure you Clover that woohp will do anything it can you turn you back to normal."

The girl relaaxed a little at the comforting word's. Then Alex joined in.

"Yeah. And even if they can't and you have to spend the rest of your life musclebound I'm sure boy's will still like you. And just think of how easy gym will be now." The girl said in an excited tone.

Sam and Jerry groaned as Clover went back to being frozen like a statue.

This was going to be a long day.
1332312221.title: Blonde buff through bugs

1332312222.content: Clover never loses the weight she got from the cookies? (ep: Passion Patty's)
1332312222.title: Clover Fat

13323122221.content:
*Huff* *Huff* *Huff*

This was the sound the Blonde spy made as she used the excercise bike, blubber rippling with every movement in a feeble attempt to rid herself of the three hundred plus pound's of fat she had gained during her 'cookie' binge.

The mission she had received all this extra weight was not that much different than usual. Stop the villian with the silly theme with the stpid grudge from changing the world in some ridiculous way. This time it was doctor Inga Bittersweet who through the use of her hyper addictive and ultra fattening cookie's planned to turn the whole world into obese cookie addict's.

Clover tried one to see why they were so addicted and before she knew it was having difficulty putting on her belt after only several box's. She'd gotten fatter and fatter throughout the mission until she reach'ed the four hundred plus mark she was at now.

She mused that it was something of a pattern that she always seemed to be the one who underwent the fantastically impossible transformations, just once why couldn't Alex or Sam become the freaks of nature?

Fortunatly they stopped Bittersweet's evil plan and Whoop had created a cure that broke down all the cookie fat and returning people to their original weight.

Everyone except her at least.

For some reason her body 'rejected' the cure and any variation they made. When she screamed at Jerry who had just recently lost his own cookie induced obesity who said they were going to fix this, He pointed to the Whoop gym.

He'd run out of the room immediatly after.

So here she was excersicing her brains out for over a week and she had yet to lose even an ounce. No matter how hard she tried she could lose any weight.

She pondered on why she wasn't losing the weight as she raced on the excercise bike and took another bite of her 'fifth' candy bar of the hour.

Something's were a 'mystery'.

This wasn't.
13323122221.title: It's a mystery

choices: The girl's get a call from Jerry
133231222211.content:
The sound of a door slamming indicated to the two other girl's that Clover was home. They turned away from the TV to see the hefty girl in a much larger version of the stylish clothing she would normally wear. Only with a cap, sunglasses and a scarf so no one would recognise her. She was carrying her purse on one shoulder and her gym bag in another.

"So how was the gym today Clover?" Said Alex in a happy voice which was shoot down when the 400lb+ girl glared her down.

"Not lose as much as you'd like then?" Said Sam with her attention back to the show.

Clover sighed then threw herself onto the couch. Causing the other girl's to jump a little.

"Try nothing. I've been going to that stupid Whoop gym every day for weeks now and I haven't even lost an ounce." The girl said sadly.

"Good thing we've been bringing you your homework." Said Sam which only made the overly chubby girl feel worse.

"This is so not fair. Everyone else get's to just let all this fat melt away but I have to work at it to be thin again." She sighed before reaching into her gym bag.

"Yeah. But you should have lost something by now." Said Alex curiously. They knew a week wasn't enough time to lose a great deal of wait but their should have been some preogress. If anything Clover actually looked to be 'gaining' the weight she should have been losing.

"Nothing. I should have lost at least five pounds by now but when I went to check the scales since last week I,I,I" She sounded like she was choking."

"Yes?" Said Sam trying to coax her friend.

"I GAINED 8 POUNDS!!! I'm actually gaining the weight I'm supposed to be losing. At this rate I'm gonna be a blob." The girl said pathetically as she pulled the jumbo chocolate bar she'd beenn reaching for out of her purse and began inhaling i like it was air. "I mean *chomp* what's wrong with me." She said as she finished off a candy bar big enough for two in seconds before reaching for another.

The two other's looked at each other before looking back at thier depressed friend who was biting into her second candy bar. They both looked into her purse and found it full of nothing 'but' chocolate.

"Um Clover. This is kinda going out on a limb but mabye your not losing any weight because you won't stop eating." Said Sam trying to put it gently.

"Huh? What do you mean?" Said the confused girl as she licked her fingers.

"Wellll, Uh. Weve noticed that since youve stopped eating those cookies youve been eating everything else you can get your hands on." Said Sam.

"Oh that is so not true." Said Clover as she reached for yet another bar. Alex assumed the 'stern lecture' stance.

"Oh really. For breakfast you usually have toast and mabye a grapfruit. This morning you cleaned out the fridge of everything but the humis. And you took that for your lunch."

"Hey if I wanna cut loose once in a while I..." She was cut off by Sam who was also in lecture mode.

"Once in a while is fine. But not all week. Since you can't get passion patties anymore youve been grabbing for everything you can fit in your mouth as a substitute. You haven't went 10 minutes without eating since we got back from that mission. It's no wonder your not losing any weight. All your time at the gym is doing is slowing your weight gain down a little."

Clover stood up to give her friends a piece of her mind.

"This is ridiculous, I do not have an eating problem." She shouted.

"Uh huh. Say's the girl with the purse full of candy who's eaten 4 bars in 2 minutes. Said Sam angrily.

That did the trick. With a final angry look Clover grabbed her purse and gym bag before stomping up stair's loudly.

The other two plopped back down on the sofa and sighed deeply.

"That could have gone better." Said Alex as she reclined her head and looked up at the ceiling.

Sam didn't even need to move her head for Alex to know that she agreed.

That night as they were both going to bed they had the tell tale sign's of eating coming from Clover's room. They both shook their head's in shame before heading to bed.

(Au.I. I know the girl's didn't start living together til a later series but I liked it better his way.)
133231222211.title: Denial

1332312222111.content:
<A few day's later>

Traying to forget the conversation last night never happened Alex and Sam were studying for the Biology test they were going to have in a few day's. They'd tried to get Clover to come down and study too. They knocked her door and asked her to join them with Alex using her sweetest tone without any mention to her wait.

Her response was and I quote "Sorry but my FAT won't fit through the door." She said through the door venomously before the sound's of munching resumed.

At this stage they weren't sure if she said that completly out of spite or because it was true.

She wasn't really sensitive about her weight a few night's ago. In fact she was desperate to lose it. Now with only an observation to her eating habit's she'd done a comlete 180. She used to go to the gym as soon as it opened and stayed until the staff made her leave so she wouldn't get overexerted and injure herself on thier property. Now she just spend's all day in her room with the sound of eating the only thing they can hear. They hadn't seen her in day's.

They were nose deep in the school book's when a familiar beeping sound echoed from somewhere and one of the painting's on the wall suddenly turned to static fuzz before the face of the head of Woohp and thier boss apppeared.

"Good morning girl's. I'm afraid weve got a situation." Said Jerry.

The girl's just closed their book's before turning to face their boss.

"What is it this time Jerry."

He was about to speak when he blinked and looked side to side. "I'm sorry but were's Clover. I really don't like repeating myself.

The girl's frowned before speaking. "Look Jerry you really should just tell us. Clover's in no condition to go anywhere."

"Really. What's wrong. Flu? Chickenpox? A boy break up with her before she could break up with him?" Jerry said with a tace of a smile.

"No...It's about that weight that she..." She was interupted by an annoyed Jerry.

"That's it? Really now that's hardly something that should hinder her perforamnce in a mission. Provided she followed the weight loss routine she should be fit to...." Ths time he was interupted by Alex.

"She's not lost any weight Jer. She's gained it." The reaction from the older man was his eye's to bulge in shock before his hand's flew across his desk's computer. He looked to the left away from the moniter he was looking at the girl's through to look at another before he paled.

Their lying on her bed surrounded by dozen's upon dozen's of junk food rapper's was Clover. It was true that she'd lost not a single ounce of her cookie weight. In fact she was easily another 5 to 10 pound's heavier than when the girl's had last seen her. Probably because all of her attention was now on eating rather than losing the weight.

She also looked like she hadn't washed in day's. Her hair had lost it's luster. Her cloth's which she had bought to fit her large body were tighter than should be and had that dirty and worn look cloth's you don't wash get. The blush and eyeliner she expertly applies had smeared and dry black streak mark's rann from her eyes and down her cheek's showing she had been upset with what the girl's said.

Speaking of her cheek's they were now a rather sickly shade of brown. Not from a bad tan but from all the chocolate covering it from the way she just crammed more in even before she'd swallowd the last one.

It was sad to say but this wasn't the first time he'd seen this. Clover was like a handful of people he'd known in his lifetime. When upset they would go do something to the point of insanity. His mother once knitted a sweater for him that could cover a bull when he brought her a failing report card. A retired agent he knew whittled a tree into a toothpick when he had to be let go. Unfortunatly Clover's habit was not nearly as safe for her health as the other's were.

Sadly he didn't have time for the girl's to be distracted by their friend. He needed them now.

"Ok then It'll just be you two going then. The problem is..."
1332312222111.title: Call to action

13323122221111.content:
"What!? But we just locked her up how could she get out?" Asked Alex in a worried tone.

Jerry explained "She apparently had some cookies left over and had one of her henchmen mail them as a care package. One of the guard's ate one and instantly got hooked. From theyre it should have been easy for Bittersweet to control him with the promise of more."

"So what do you think she's planning." Asked Sam.

"I don't know. I don't plan to give her the luxury of starting a new plan to begin with." Said Jerry. "I'm sending you two girl's to track her down wherever she may be."

The two nodded. It was their past experience with the few baddies they fought more than once that they alwways stuck to their theme. If they didn't catch Bittersweet soon then the world would once again be in danger of mass obesity.

Jerry nodded back and pressed a button on his desk.

Instantly the floor opened up and swallowed the two girrl's who barely had time to scream. Really they should be used to it now.

============================================================================ ===================

Clover didn't get briefed on the mission. She was far to busy packing caramel down her throat to really care.

She had been isolated in her room for the past few day doing nothing but stuffing her face with junk. Luckily it was a holiday week so she didn't have to go to school. Or mabye unluckily it was a holiday week otherwise she would have actually had to leave the room and take a brek from her constant eating.

Originally she'd been hurt by her friend's word's. Not many people like to be called fat, which she knew she was but the fact that her friend's thought she wasn't really trying to control herself and she just ate and ate like a pig. That had hurt. It wasn't the sort of thing you pointed out.

She was still mad at her friend's but she did realise that they may be right. She really couldn't stop. She'd seen herself in the mirror a while ago and was horrified that she looked so dirty, her hair, cloth's, make up, face, everything was a mess. However instead of using this epiphany to sort herself out she just sat their and continued eating. The desire to stuff herself even when she wasn't hungry was greater than the desire to clean up her act.

Now you may be wondering exactly how someone can constantly eat while never leaving their room and still have food to scarf down?

Well if you remember Clover has been keeping a rather large supply of candy bar's in her purse. Those bar's are actually part of a stach she'd been building up since she came home fat. Almost every place in her room had at least 5 pound's of candy hidden in it. Her drawer's were full of chcolate. Her closet had nothing but bags of chip's in at and the secret Whoop comparments for all the spy stuff they had were filled with gummi's. Theyre was a lot more but let's stop theyre.

So Clover lay's on her bed with a mouthful of caramel and her hands already bringing nachos up to her mouth. She eyed them with great eagerness but a small part of her held disdain.

============================================================================ ===================

Outside the house an old woman and a rather fat man stood dressed in loose sweat cloths to hide themselves. The old woman smirked.

"Time to exact my revenge on those troublesome girl's." Said the woman in a european accent.
13323122221111.title: Can't...stop...eating!

choices: She brainwashes Clover, fattening her into Trov (head henchmen) 2.0
133231222211111.content:
*Beep*

*Beep*

*Beep*

*Beeeeeeeep*

*Krch*

The older woman grinned maniacly when the light on the 'radar gun-esque device lit up green. She turned to the gigantic figure in the back of the van.

"The alarms are down. We go now."

The figure nodded "*Munch* Uh huh."

The two got out and headed towards the house. Bittersweet dressed in a gunky green grandma sweater that stretched over her swollen midsection and inflated bosom, and long skirt with her hair down, while the walking man mountain of blubber waddled up the path with a cart holdding several boxes, one of which was open.

She slapped his reaching pork pie hand "And don't eat them all. We need every cookie for my plan!" Looking around the outside and seeing no one Bittersweet pushed the door open and walked in followed by her henchmen....who got stuck in the doorway since he was half a times bigger than her for several seconds before pulling himself in.

Bittersweet scanned the living room for a moment before hearing a loud thumping coming from right abve her, a glance at the stairs drew attention to a discarded candy wrapper.

She grinned and took one of the boxes into her own hands. "Wait here." She whispered and climbed the stairs. Growing jiggier yet angrier with each step since she felt a strain that a few days ago she would have never known.

======

Clover was still lying on her bed looking throughly glutted. A mountain of candy wrappers surrounding her. Chocolate smearing her face being cleaned away only by long tracts of tears.

*RUMBLE*

In a fit of immaturity usually saved for a ninety percent sale at a frnch sounding store she thrashed in bed baging her fists and feet against the mattress, "I just feed you 5 pounds of herssssshys! Stop wanting mooooore!"

Her stomach whined back at her, its arguement being far more aggresive and animalistic.

She clutched her swelling mid section and sobbed a little as the demands to be filled grew louder.

'So hungry.' She turned to her side and felt her blubberous belly hit the bed a moment later. She looked across her room and saw boxes and bags and parcels and wrappers and foils covering every inch of the floor and every surface, yet she knew a ton of more hinding spots in this room alone where she hid more sweets. Sweets which she was fighting herself against getting.

She screwed her eyes shut and threw herself flt on her back again gripping her sheets as it went from loud to painful to ignore her stomach. Frustration and hunger clear on her face.

"So hungry." She whimpered.

"Awe thats so sad. You poor dear you look famished." A kindly and unfortunatly familiar voice came from her door just as it opened.

Clover recognoised who it was. Te grey hair, the mole, the germanic features, the huge fat stomach tat sprang into existence in only a few seconds.

"Bittersweet." Clover said coldly and shot up......yeah right.

The evil cook smiled evily when the red spy flopped back down onto her bed with a floor shaking crash. She walked over to the bed, slowly opening the box and allowing the smell of cookies to fill the room.

Learning from her mistake the blonde swung onto her side and managed to toss herself off the bed, landing with a thump and causing shooting pains in her arms to suddenly brace so much weight. She bit her lip and sucked it up before standing in what may have pereviouslybeen a valid martial arts pose before her body became built for sumo.

"I don't know how you got out of prison Doc. But your going...right..ba...." The heveanly smell hit her like a cruise missle. The rich delicous aroma attacking her nostrils and assaulting the pleasure centers of her brain.

The 'doc' fully opened the box and held out the minty chocolate goodness. "Thats right my sweet. Passion Patties, all for you."

Clover wiped the speck of drool that escaped her mouth away and gave the doctor a hard look. "Not gonna work creep. It's gonna take more than a few cookies to beat me!"

*GGGRROOWWWLL!!*

"Your stomach disagrees with you." She held the cookie under her nose and sniffed it slowly. Her own chemically induced hunger screaming at her to forget revenge and just gorge.

Clover blushed and moved a hand closer to her stomach.

"How big....how FAT are you now Clover? 400, no I'd say close to 500 pounds?" She kicked a soda can at her feet. "I'm about a hundred pounds lighter than you and my legs feel the strain. Yours must feel like they're going to break."

'Uh huh.'Her eyed still on the cookie, I mean Bittersweet.

She took a step closer. "Poor sweety. No passion patties to fill that ever growing tummy of yours so you fill it with whatever inferior junk you could find." She looked at the patty for a second lomger before wolfing it down in a single bite, delighting in the the horrified look Clover tried covering up.

"Mmmmmmm. Wouldn't you rather have a chocolatly, gooey, minty piece of hevean. Hevean knows I do." She popped another and another in her mouth. Savouring every bite almost as much as she enjoyed the ever growing look of hunger on her enemies face. The sounds the teens belly made near constant.

She held up another and waggled it in front of her. Blue eyes following chemically drugged goodness.

"Go on. One more tiny little cookie won't do won't hurt will it." She tossed it down on the bed covers.

The spy held out for twenty whole seconds before she dove at the bed, the frame snapping in half under the sudden weight. The drawers in the sides smashing open and hershy kisses rushing out, the metal snapping suddenly and tubes of gumbools and caramels poured onto a torn open pillow with a mix of feathers and cotton candy. The girl ignored all these sweets and gobbled down the cookie with haste. Moaning with delight as she did so and looking up at Bittersweet hopefully when she'd finished.

The woman grinned evily and threw another cookie, biting into one herself with duel satisfaction.
133231222211111.title: Ply wood willpower

133231222212.content:
"Okay Clover, just calm down!" Clover says to herself. "There's probably a good reason why your body rejected the antidote and you're stuck at this weight!"
Clover finished another round of exercise when Jerry walked in again.
"Well Clover what we are going to do is take a sample of your dna for analysis, we feel that perhaps your genes have been tampered with in the last mission."
He resolved.
*Huff...Huff* "What! How is that like possible?" Clover frowned, wiping the sweat from her face.
"Alex and Sam told me about one of Bittersweet's inventions 'The Feeder'" Jerry revealed.
"Oh? now that you mention it the batch of cookies from the feeder were much more yummier than the boxed ones!"
Clover Revealed.
"Hmm... yes, maybe there was something in those cookies that has prevented you.... Clover?"-
"So chocolatey.....Mmmm.. So heavenly!..." Clover mumbles to herself.
"Clover!" Jerry shouts.
"Oh sorry i just remembered how yummy they were once you made me remember them." She says innocently
"Are you craving for them?" Jerry asks carefully.
"No! are you kidding? They were so delicious but im not hooked anymore! I just wish i wasn't this 320 pound blob!"
Clover confessed, making her arm fat jiggle so Jerry got her point.
"Okay I understand, but I just wanted to be sure." Jerry said scratching his head.
"Theres like one other thing i don't understand Jerry"- "Oh? What is that?"
"Well, When we were like tied down at the feeder and Bittersweet left, Sam and Alex both spit out the cookies that the machine forced into their mouths!
I don't know about you but the second a passion patty touched my tongue i was like so addicted like straight away! And they spat it out like it was nothing!"
Clover yelled in anger because the cookies only affected her and not her best friends.
"Really? Thank you for telling me that Clover that is strange indeed!... How about you head on home for the day and try to relax" Jerry offered.
"Relax? I'm 320 pounds Jerry how can I? Like i don't even fit into my own clothes anymore I can't go home in my spy uniform" She says confused.
"Put these back on, it's the outfit you wore at the factory, It shall do for now" Jerry handed her the outfit and smiled.
"And don't worry take this sleeping gas cookie and use it on your mother, if you are that worried she will spot you in this condition she'll wake up thinking it was a dream" He continued with his hand over her fattened shoulder.

Clover threw on the Swedish outfit only to discover it was very tight on her. She was only 280 pounds when she last wore it but had continued to gain another 50 while in the warehouse. WOOHP flies her home and she hoped her mother wasnt home so she could lock herself in her room and hide until they could cure her.
Her large body swayed and her stomach bounced every step she took, she searched for the cookie only to find it hiding in her stomach fat.

"ugh here goes..." Clover said with a little fear.
*Ding Dong*
"... Hello?" her mother answered not recognizing it was her own daughter.
"Hey..." Clover pouted.
"Clover?... Is that you!?" She says dumbfounded.
"...Nooooo! I'm a girl scout for The Happy girls and I'm here to offer you a free sample of our new cookies!" Clover spits out as a knee-jerk reaction.
"My goodness you have such a likeness to my Clover only you're more... heavyset" Her mother says in a slightly obnoxious tone. Clover went red in the face but kept her fake smile and handed her the cookie. Her mother took a bite and got a face full of knockout gas and fell almost comically to the floor.
"Oh my god that was so embarrassing!...." Clover grabbed her mother and struggled to drag her inside, she still wasn't used to being so big as she was so thin just 2 days before.

1332312222222222.title: Still Nerds?

13323122222222221.content:
Sam woke up in her bedroom and slowly made her way out of bed with her red, messy hair hanging around her neck. She made her way near the mirror cabinet to prepare for the day. She took off her pajama and revealed her naked, unfeminine body that she almost instantly covered with some nerdy clothes that included white sneakers, white socks, long checked skirt and white buttoned shirt. She finished her look by tucking her hair into low pony tail, but one thing still seemed off. She looked once again in the mirror and the image was still blurry. Her glasses, that she now have to wear, were waiting on her desk. Moment later those black rimmed, square spectacles rested on her acne covered face. She was now ready for the day.

It's been several days since the spy mission, that changed the trio into total nerds. They've stopped possessed Arnold, but even after Cat's Eye Ring was destroyed the affected people weren't changed back. Jerry and the whole agency are working on an antidote, but their efforts haven't been successful so far. He advised the girls to go back to their daily lives until they can be changed back. All affected people, except the girls, had their memory modified so they though, that they were always nerds to prevent panic in the city. Sam knew that Jerry won't let them down after everything good they did as spies so she wasn't worried about this whole situation.

Sam didn't like the changes at first, but she slowly warmed up to them. She knew, she always was a nerd inside, but didn't want to admit it before Alex and Clover. For now she just embraced and went with her true nature as the brain of the team.

When she was going downstairs to the kitchen she noticed one of her housemates in the living room.

Who was it?

13323212211.content:
Bittersweet had returned from her cookie storage facility in Iceland. She had made all the preperations for her global takeover without a single delay.

'Now the world will be a much 'bigger' place tp live in' She thought evilly.

She walked along the halls of her main base, her cookie factory, until she found the person she was looking for, her head hench woman ('Troove'?)

"How did it go doctor Bittersweet?" Said the fat woman in a happy girls uniform.

The doctor smiled. "It went without flaw. My cookie's are being sent to every corner of the globe. I trust that's because my machine tok care of those girls?"

This time Trove smiled. "Yep. The other two fought it but in the end they ended upp going the same way as their addicted friend."

"Oh so they exploded? Come I want to see the splatter for myself."

As Inga Bittersweet walked away she noticed her henchwoman didn't follow her. She turned and show the fat woman rubbing the back of her head.

"Uh yeah. About the whole exploding thing." Troove said.

Bittersweet raised an eyebrow in confusion. Five minutes later she raised the other in shock.

All three girl's were still in the room she was looking into through a two way window. They were a 'LOT' in the room.

All three gir's were now obvious;y adicted to the cookie's since they showed no resistance whatsoever when the feeder placed another one in their mouth's. They'd also filled out conderably since she left hours before.

The two who weren't addicted when they same in were now as big as their friend was when she'd been tyied to the chair. Both of them straining against the fabric of their cloths as with every eagerly awaited cookie they grew larger and larger.

As for their friend. Inga was grateful that those dress's she'd had made for her giftshop were 'deisigned' to hold in rapidly inflating people. She just didn't consider by how much.

The girl was a least twice they size she had been hour's ago. The buckle holding her their snmapped cleanly in two. The shear amount of fat in her body causing the highly durable dress to rip in several place's yet still managing to contain her. The only thing that really showed how fat she'd gotten was she had four chins whereas befor she'd only had a very soft one.

Bittersweet looked into the room in shock for a few minutes before cackling maniacly.

"Look (Troove?). This is the future of the world. Completly helpless and under my complete control. Soon every one in the world will be like her." She grinned with all her teeth showing.

Now that these girl's were out of the way nothing would stop her.
13323212211.title: Why you shouldn't eat too many cookie's

choices: They get fat enough to break the straps an they stay in control
133232122111.content:
Inside the feeding chamber the girl's were not 'quite' as under her power as Bittersweet was thinking.

Yes they were addicted to the cookie's and yes they were now immensly fat (Clover especially) However that did not mean that they were not thinking abvout escape.

"Cookies, cookies, cookies, cookies,coo..."

Well the two smaller one's at least. In between bites the girl's were talking about how to get out of the chair's and stop Bitttersweet.

"If only I put had that soap sample. I could have slid *munch* betwenn these ropes. I just had to *Gulp* put them in the trash." Said Sam

"So how are *chew* we gonna get out of here. *Gulp* I can't stop eating and I don't want to get like Clover." Said the steadily expanding Alex.

The girl she was talking about had went as far into the addiction as you could. The more you ate the more addicted you got along with the bigger you got and this morbidly obese girl was so addicted she couldn't even think about anything else but the cookie's.

"Cookies, cookies *munch*, cookies...."

"Don't worry Alex I do have a *Munch* plan. Unfortunatly it's the only one I *gulp* have and it's not that great."
Said Sam with a frown.

"What is it?" Alex managed to say clearly before another cookie was shoved in her mouth.

"It look's like were gonna *chew* have to eat until were so fat we break the *chomp* strap's."

"Are you serious? *Gulp* When that happened to Clover she was already too *munch* out of it to move." Said Alex worriedly.

"I know. It's gonna take a 'lot' of *gulp* willpower but we have no choice. You *chomp* with me?"

Alex stayed silent for a fe minutes before nodding right before she got anoother cookie.

So now the girl's only hope was to continue eating until they burst the strap's.

Though that beg's the question. When they do get that fat will they still be able to stop Bittersweet. Will they even won't to or will they be like theyre friend. A mindless eating machine.
133232122111.title: In the feeder room.

1332321221111.content:
*SNAP*

Their half brained idea had proved successful. The girl's ate and ate and ate until they were so fat that the straps holding them done had burst. They were now free to go after Bittersweet.

There was just one teeny tiny little problem.

"Alex you have to suck in your stomach while I push you." Said a red head in a muffled voice

"I am sucking. Your the one whose not pushing." Said the dark skinned girl in an equally muffled voice.

Yes while they had grown large enough to break the strap's. They had also grown large enough were even the simplist task's were proving difficult. At 500lb+ Their once flattering stereotypically swedish dress's now acted as hillbilly like brassiere shirt's and their large victorianesque shorts acting as tight short's. Their large belly's sticking out so far they couldn't even see thier toe's and their flabby arms and leg's forcing them into a waddle.

Yet despite the inhuman amount of mind beding super fattening cookie's they had consumed they still retained their free will and control.

Which is far more than they could say for their blonde friend.

"*Gulp*..........*Chomp*........*chew*......*munch*....."

Both girl's spared a glance at their beyond morbidly obese friend. Clover was now so unvbleievably fat she would not even be able to stand if she wanted to. Her dress's short now almost a thong. Her top staraining and ripping and her gut pressing down on her leg's which were as thick as log's. All in all she weighed about three hundred pounds more than the girl's making her well over 800lb's.

She had stopped saying 'cookies'. She had stopped speaking entirly. Her entire mind had all but shut down save for the most basic of voulintary function's. Namely breathing and eating anything that was put in her mouth. Right now you could put a plastic disc in her mouth and she would try to chew and swallow it like a cookie. She had become a completly mindless eating machine whose sole purpose was to open her mouth, chew and swallow.

"Don't worry Clover. Well be back for you." Said Sam who backed up and with a waddling charge managed to knock Alex through the door and crashing to the floor while getting herself jammed halfway.

Both girl's looked at each other from their ackward position's and shared the same though. The whole rest of the mission was going to be like this.

'oh boy.'

13323212211111.content:
The two girls gazed out across the frozen land towards the warehouses that Bittersweet was storing her weapons of mass obesity. The snow too heavy and the two far enough away that no one would notice two upright standing pigs in ywllow and green jumpsuits.

"I th-th-thought fat was sup-p-p-posed t-to keep you wu-warm?" Chattered Alex. The speed of her teeth matching the jiggling blubber that shivered in the almost sub zero enviroment.

"Just t-t-ttry not to think Ab-ab-about it." Said Sam who looked barely better than her massive team mate.

They 'snuck' towards the facility. Thanking whatever was listening that the other workers were too busy getting everything done so they could get more cookies to pay much attention to anything but thier tasks. The snuck in much more quietly than they expected to when every step you could felt like it should crack the ground beneath you. Climbing up behind huge piles of boxes.

"It's even colder in here?!" Complained Alex, leaning heavily on a box which almost immedialt started to give under her wait

They saw Bittersweet standing in front of what looked like a massive air conditioning system.

"Why would she need an air conditioner in a place thats alread freezing?"

"*MUNCH* *GULP* *CHEW* I uhoh."

Sam looked over to her friend and saw she was stuffing her face with the contents of the box beneath her. Shoveling Passion Patties so quickly in between her fat cheeks that the redhead could almost see her visiblty get fatter.

"Alex!" She hissed out. She tried Slapping the cookies out of her hand which she immediatly clamped tightly in her sausage fingered mitts.

"I can't help it." The cocoa skinned girl moaned "I think the addiction gets worse the more you eat." She opened her hand and.

"It melted only a few seconds in your hand?" Said Sam who examined the cookie closely.

*CHOMP*

"Hey that was mine!"

"Ok so now we know whats with the conditioner. So all we have to do is crank the heat! Ready Alex?.......Alex?

Her whole head was in the box.

"ALEX!!!"

"INTRUDERS!!!"

13323212221.content:
"Prepare yourself for death by cookie!" The evil Dr Bittersweet says pressing the button to activate her feeding machine.
The three spies from WOOHP are strapped down and seemingly helpless to stop Inga from fattening them to death.
"Yummy!" yelled Clover the only spy looking forward to the endless supply of passion patties.

"It's not yummy! It's DEATH by cookie!" Inga corrected. "Sorry..." Clover says feeling defeated. As Inga continues to rant about her plans of world domination, Clover tries to search her pockets for the homing-stick pin but she had gotten so fat in the last hour the straps had made it impossible to move. "You see, I too was once a Happy Girl but I also liked the cookies... a little too much I'm afraid." Inga explains.
"So what happened?" Alex asked trying to buy some time. "I ate the cookies instead of selling them! my troops kicked me out...It ruined my life! So now I will RULE everyone elses!" Inga continued. Clover did everything she could trying to get the homing device but she had gotten too fat, she also stopped every 20 seconds when it was her turn to be fed. "Enjoy the sweets girls they will be your last!" Inga declared walking away with her goons.

Sam waited until they were gone and used the moisturizer to squeeze out of her restraints, "That's got to be the best free sample ever!" says Alex as she is set free. "Wait! It's almost my turn!" Clover yells as Sam breaks her free. "Enough of the cookies Clover!" Sam yells back grabbing her arm fat and pulling her out of the chair. "We gotta find Bittersweet and figure out how to stop her!" Alex says very concerned. "Ugh... I tried to stick the homing-stick pin on her but I was kinda too fat too pull it out..." Clover admits with a very red face, Alex and Sam looked at each other and rolled their eyes. "It's okay Clover we know you are trying" Sam says reassuringly, "Yeah and you were just sampling the cookies for the investigation, No body knew that you would get this big" Follows Alex, Clover felt depressed hearing that even though Alex meant well the comment made Clover
feel like a burden.

"Jerry Inga got away we have no idea where she's gone" Sam admits telling Jerry on the compowder. "Very well ladies, I'll send you home and we can take a break tomorrow, and being away from the cookies should help kill the cravings I'll check up with you girls on monday"
Jerry Explains.
13323212221.title: Sure!

133232122212.content:
The Weekend goes by with out a word from Jerry and the girls spent their time punishing Clover in the gym. She was able to lose just over 60lbs leaving her chubby rather than overweight. Sam and Alex felt satisfied by their hard work feeling Clover would be her slender self by monday.
Monday morning comes and Sam makes her way through the front doors of Beverly Hills High only to be completely stunned.

She sees hundreds of empty Passion Patties boxes scattered on the school floor. She looks up and seemly 90% of the students are overweight.
Sam walks down the hallway in complete confusion looking at people that were in perfect shape, now stuffing themselves carelessly getting fatter.
"Sam! What the hell is going on here!?" Alex yells as she approaches,"I Dont understand... Jerry didnt even call us...." Sam says feeling defeated. "Oh my God!" a girl shrieks from the distance, they look ahead and see a very fat Mandy 'catwalk' her way through the crowd bumping a few people with her large hips. "Its soooo typical of you losers! you can't even keep up with the latest and greatest trends you're so pathetic!" Alex couldnt stop
staring at Mandy's face, she had gotten so fat her neck became an entire double chin. "Mandy how did you get so big?..." Sam asks completely stunned.

"Duhh.... haven't you tried a Passion Patty? They are the greatest cookies ever like created!" Mandy Declares.
"When did they get here!? They were only being sold on the other side of the country just the other day!" Alex reveals frustrated.
"Oh so you HAVE heard of them? and you still havent tried one! Hahahaha LOSERS! The Great Dr Bittersweet would be so ashamed of you!"
Says Mandy scoffing at the spies. "Hey Guys!" yet another girl screams they turn around as Mandy walks off. It was Clover with an overwhelming sense of joy pushing through the crowd. ".....Guys! *Puff....* You won't believe it! The Happy girls came to my door this morning! I bought like 8 boxes! AHHH! they're so yummy!" She screams biting into a Passion Patty.

"But Clover what about all that hard work you did to lose weight you got so big the other day!" Says a really concerned Alex
"Guys It's like what Shirley said the other day, The weight is totally worth it! Seriously Inga is an amazing person!" Clover explains.
"Clover! just 2 days ago she was going to feed you to death! how can you say that!?" yells Sam.
"It's okay girls I forgive her! I honestly do." Clover admits.
"You've already gained some weight back what happens when you don't stop? have you thought about that?" Says Alex
" I'm about 235-240 right now and I don't care how fat I am." Clover admits feeling proud of herself.
"Man... It's like I woke up in an alternate universe!" Sam says completely in disbelief.

1332322111.content:
Beverly Hills Mall, 12:40 PM

The girls were in a burger shop, having just finished lunch... well, Sam and Alex had just finished lunch, anyway. Clover was sitting back from the table, having not eaten anything.

"Come on, Clover, you can't just skip lunch. Otherwise you're gonna feel sluggish all day!" Alex said, nudging her a bit.

"No way!" Clover replied, shaking her head vehemently. "Can't you tell? I've been putting on way too much weight! I'm going on a diet - I've got to lose these extra pounds somehow..."

"You look the same as you usually do, you know. Besides, if you starve yourself, you're just gonna end up as a skeleton or something..." Sam said, as she offered over some fries, which Clover pushed away.

"I told you, I'm going on a diet, and that's that!" Clover huffed, crossing her arms and turning her head away.

"Oookay, whatever..." Sam said, rolling her eyes.

---

Later, on the way back to the condo...

"Oh, it figures that the road's closed!" Alex groaned a bit as the girls began heading into an alley.

"Isn't it a bit strange, though? I mean, there didn't even seem to be any construction work going..." Sam was about to finish her sentence, before the girls noticed there didn't seem to be anything beneath their feet...
1332322111.title: Meanwhile, back in California...

13323221111.content:
All three girl's zoomed through the tunnel's before landing in a plush english sofa.

"See!" Said Clover "I landed first. That mean's I'm heavier than either of you."

"Clover that doesn't." She was cut off by her aging boss Jerry.

"I hate to interupt girl's but we have a bit of a crisis on our hand's." He said as an image appeared on a screen behind them.

The girl's settled down as a beautiful young woman appeared on screen.

"This is Monique LeBeu. A resently discovered french model who is set to take her debut in three day's time."

"Huh?" Clover said in a confused tone. "That can't be right." He said firmly.

"Oh? Have you found something unusal in the pictue Clover." Said Jerry. Mabye she'd sen something which could help the investigation.

"I'll say. Theyre is 'No' way she could be a model. She's waayyy to chunky." She girl said as she snuck a peek a her own imaginary chunkyness.

The two girl's and one man blinked in surprise before turning back to the picture. The girl wasn't 'Chunky' as the blonde had said. Sure she had padding that the model's of today wouldn't be caught dead with but she had it in all the place's that gave her a gorgeous figure.

"Those are called curves Clover. And she look's way better than the skeleton's your trying to copy in your magazine's." Said Alex in a condesending tone.

Clover's eye's widened in disbelief at the 'absurd' comment her friend had made and opened her mouth to talk back before a masculine cough got the three girl's attention.

"As I was saying. This is how she normally look's. But she was discovered half an hour ago in a back street in Paris like this." He pressed another button. The girl's eye's widend in shock.

The girl they had seen in the last picture was now hovering 20 feet above a street and built like a ball. Her entire torso was a perfect sphere with the blue outfit she was wewaring tight and stretched to the limit. Her arm's and leg's had been pulled in to the balll and she was left with stubby hand's and feet flaining about. She appeared to be shouting for help and the girl's couldn't help but notice she had a much higher voice than anyone should nortmally have.

"She look's like she's been blown up like a balloon." Said Alex in her usual point out the obvious fashion.

"That's exactly right Alex."Jerry pressed a few more button's and other picture's came up. "Ms LeBeu and several other woman in Paris have literally been inflated like Balloon's. Test's have shown them to be full of some kind of helium that doesn't disipate. Your mission will be to discover who's been doing this and why."

He flipped a switch and his desk flipped over revealing several gadget's.

"For this mission you'll be getting the laser nail file, the tornado blast hairdryer, the eye spy x-ray lenses and in the chance you inflated you'll be getting these." He held up three thick grey shirt's. "Simply put these on under your cloth's and they'll increase you personel gravity field. They won't stop you from being inflated but they will make sure you don't leave the ground."

The girl's picked up the gadget's and put them their jet pack back pack's.

"Good luck girl's. Now as they say in france..........Bye." He said right before a hose came down from the ceiling andsucked them up.

"Forgetting the word's right in the midle of a joke. I must be getting old." The balding man said dejectedly

133312121.content:
It wasn't supposed to be like this. He was just supposed to find a priceless statue for the museum. He didn't expect for the dark hand to try to steal it. Himself to be kidnapped by a private collecter who also wanted the statue or to be fighting the dark hand thug's and the collector's thug's while a half cat Valmont fight his half cat niece.

He had quickly dispatched the henhmen with his usual way. Which when he thought about it always ended up being less serious and more comedic in nature. He'd then caught up with Jade who had managed to trick Valmont by using his new cat like thought pattern's against him. He was pleasently surprised to see that she actually knew she had to change back for once. They found the collecter - Cardif zenlo with the statue and a hiss from Jade made him hand it over smiling.

Unforunatly as they were contemplating what the riddle for the cure to the cat curse meant they were ambushed by Valmont who hoisted Jade up and threw her against a far wall were she landed in a heap. It was at this moment that Jackie realised how dangerous the Staue was and knew what he had to do.

"No. This is to dangerous to be in a museum." He sid venomously and she threw the statue against the ground and shattered it into a thousand pieces.

Zenlo shouted at him asking if he knew what he was doing and Jackie responded that the Cat of Katomb was to dangerous. Then he watched as he saw smoke erupt from the statue's pieces and covered Valmont. Almost immediatly he started getting less hairy and his claws turned back into fingernails. His fangs receeded and his slitted eyes rounded out again. By the time all the smoke was all gone he was human once more.

Jackie smiled at the revelation. "The anidote lies within. Within the statue." He turned when he heard a moan from the corner of the room his niece was thrown into. "Jade the..." He stopped as he saw her stand and raise her head.

Her hair still reached down her back. Her eyes still slitted and her nails still claws. Her top lip split, her nose a pink triangle and most obvious she was still covered in golden blonde fur.

"What's wrong Jackie?" The cat girl asked. She then noted the smashed statue and a hairless Valmont. She looked back at Jackie again. "Whoah does this mean you found the cure? Where is it?" Th girl said quickly.

"But, how, when, Why arn't you." He stumbled over his words before his eyes opened wide as he suddenly realised. The smoke that cured Valmont. It never got to Jade since she was far across the room at the time. Meaning she she couldn't be cured of the cat curse. If he wanted to cure her now he'd have to find another cat of Katomb.

Another thought entered his head. 'Their was only one statue.'

He looked down at his catty niece who was looking up at him expectedly. At her feet a white cat was rubbing itself against her leg's.

He steeled himself as he prepared for the worst. "Uh Jade...."

Minutes later Jackie was searching for bandages to cover the cat scratches that covered his face
133312121.title: Jade queen of the jungle cat's

1333121211.content:
"Jackie. How good it is to see you." Said Uncle as his nephew entered his shop. Their niece trudging in behind him with a large scarf sovering her whole head.

"Yes good to see you to Uncle." Jackie said nervously. Jade just stood behind him with her arms crossed angrily. Her hand's in glove's.

"Forgive me for asking. "Said the gentle giant Tohru. "But why is Jade wrapped head to toe."

Uncle observed this two. "Indeed. You woul almsot think that she did not want to show hert f....Jackieeee you did manage to 'cure' her of the cat of cartombs curse did you not?"

Jackie scratched the base of his neck nervously. "Wellll." He reached over and pulled off Jade's scarf. Letting her new mass of hair fall and her kitty face be revealed.

The two men had differant reaction's.

"Awww kitty." Cooed Tohru, a sucker for cat's.

"AAAAAIIIIIYYYYAAAHHHH!!!" Screamed uncle in his usual fashion.

The rest covere their ear's. Especially Jade with her new hypersensitive sense of hearing.

"Oww. Okay cat ear's, not the geatest thing about being like this." Muttered Jade.

Uncle was lready in his nephew's face. "How could you not find the cure. You want Jade to be hairy cat woman for life."

"I did find the cure uncle but...." He butted in but was swatted by the man.

"WHAT! Then why did you not use it..." Uncle continued his rant. Jackie knew if he didn't keep butting in he could stay this way for hour's.

"The cure was inside the statue and was released as gas when I broke it. Valmont changed back but Jade wasn't even close to it before it disipated. I didn't know breaking the statue would do it."

Uncle looked at him for several second's before calming down. He looked over Jade how seemed very uncomfertable. Unlike past transformations she seemed to not be enjoying it as much. Then again she always knew she could change back before. This if he didn't do something could be for life and with the disticnt lack of catfirl's in the world it wouldn't be much of a life to start.

He took off his glass''s and sighed. "In the absense of the true cure I will try to create my own. I will do research but it would be greatly helpful if you were able to bring back a fragment of the statue.

Jackie smiled. "I thought you might need it so it's in the backpack."

Uncle nodded. "Good. Then let us get to work." He and Jackie left for his study.

Tohru g;lanced over at Jade who still looked rather upset. Not being her usual self. He was her best friend so he had to try and fix that.

"Umm. Would you like something to eat Jade." He questioned.

"Sure I guess." She said sadly.

"Good. We have some tuna in the fridge and cream." He said thoughtlessly before catching himself.

"Tuna?! Cream!?" The girl perked up considerably and darte into the kitchen.

Tohru sighed in relief. He didn't hurt the girl's feeling's....

....and he got rid of that god awful fish.

1333121221.title: Evil or not?

choices: The sphere cracks...and she's not there
The Sphere cracks...and Jade is there, changed
13331212211.content:
Jade screamed out in pain as the potion came in contact with her tattoo'ed ankle. Dark blue and light green lightning spreading from her ankle and dancing over her as she ceased levitating and hit the floor.

Tohru felt a large pang of guilt at causing his friend such pain, But it was either this or letting her remain an evil demon of the shadow.

He began to grow worried however when, Rather than stretch and fade away black lightning started to spark out from the tattoo, before enveloping the girl in a sinister electric aura.

Shendu displaying his usual blend of opportunism and cowardice decided now was the perfect time to grab the archive. The younger male Chan saw this and reluctantly tore himself away from the sight of his niece to focus on the dragon wearing a man.

Shendu sneered "Thank you for disposing of the girl Chan. Now my minions are back where they belong, under my control."

Jackie grit him teeth. Readying himself to make a lunge for the book.

"Now then ATTACK MY MINIONS!!!"

Jackie braced himself

....Only nothing happened.

Shendu blinked and turned to look at the Shadowkhan. Utterly motionless.

That did not please the fire demon "I possess the book! You must obey! NOW DESTROY JACKIE CHAN!" He shouted and held the book aloft to illustrate his proof of ownership....only for a demon ninja to swoop down from the walkway above and snatch it from him. Dropping it down before skating it across the floor where it bumped into the still screaming Jade.

Much to everyones collective horror the volume of black lightning tripled. Tohru backpedaled as fast as his bulk would allow to avoid getting zapped. Jades spasming form was slowly being obscured as she and were....cocooned for a lack of a better term in shadow energy.

"JJJAAADDDEEE!!!" Jackie yelled before lunging at the closing sphere of crackling darkness. He managed to reach in and brush the tip of his finger against her brow gently before he was sent flying back like he'd been kicked by a bull. His form lightly smoldering.

"Sensei what..."

The old man cut his student off "Uncle has no idea. Removal spell should have worked."

"Clearly it did not. And clearly since I won't be getting the archive back....." The body of Valmont jumped up to the second floor "...It's time for me to leave."

He smirked when he saw Jackie's scowl "Me or your niece Chan. If I were unfortunate enough to be you. I'd wouldn't leave the child alone while she was mutating."

"M-Mutating!?" Tohru stammered out.

"Mutating. Ascending. Banishing. Or maybe your spell will just outright kill her. Difficult to say really. But you probably don't want to follow me and risk not finding out." With that the robed sorcerer bolted down the walkway and out of site. The sound of his footsteps vanishing all the faster as the dark lightnings only grew stronger.

The Chan clan looked to each other. Fear, anger and confusion all present in their expression with varying amounts. They turned back to the sphere as it continued to grow and swell. Unsure of what would happen.
13331212211.title: Jade's Tattoo removal Mishap

choices: A massive snake woman. With six arms and at least 30 feet of snake for a behind
133312122111.content:
As the dark orb expand and expanded, The scientist almost wished that the dragon had told them for definite his niece was being banished to another realm, because at least them he wouldn't have to worry about why the dark mass had grown so much if she was mutating.

.
"Uncle..." He muttered, turning to the crotchety old man, who was holding his blowfish steady. "We must not let guard down." He snapped. "No matter what may happen to niece, we cannot lose focus. Niece may emerge as monster and attack. Demons could flood in from anothoooor dimension." His gaze left the dark sphere foe a moment to look at his stunned juniors. "When time comes. We must be ready to fight. No matter what. Yes?"

The two men didn't want know what to say. Of course they wanted to argue. To tell the older man off for saying such callous things.......yet......they had just had to fight off a horde of supernatural ninjas controlled by the girl. As much as they hate to admit, t would be foolish not to...

*GGRHHGHHRLLEE*

All eyes turned to the sphere, which suddenly became less sphere like as a large bump pushed out from it, then receded. Then another jump pushed out and went back in. Then another, and another and another.

The three watched with morbid curiosity as the orb became covered with dozens of undulating lumps. Pushing out around around, which gave them all the idea that maybe dozens of hands were pushing from the inside. I grew faster, and faster, and faster and faster and faster and faster andfasterandfasterandfasterandfasterand........it stopped.

Then it imploded

The sphere began to....pull into itself for a lack of a better term. The three men watched with abject horror as the orb of darkness containing Jade Chan began to retract into the centre in an increasing amount of places.

"JJAADDEE!!!"

"TOHRU!!!"

Before the athletic archeologist could make a move. A pair of enormous hands clamped down on his shoulder. He turned to look up at his friend with a shocked and horrified expression. Tohru frowned apologetically.

"There's nothing you can do Jackie." He said sadly.

Jackie knew from experience that he could break out the large man' grip even when he was trying to kill him......but Jackie was far to rational and level headed a person not to listen to him.

Tohru let him go when he relaxed. Watchin helplessly as his nieces cocoon collapsed in a singularity.

It churned and heaved as it was pulled into a smaller and smaller space. It was as big as a beach ball, a watermelon, a football, baseball. When it reached the size of a marble a small crack barely as long as the head of a pin opened up, and sinister purple light spilled forth from it.

"JJJJJJAAACCCCCCKKKIIIIIIIEEEEEE EE!!!!!!

Here ached out towards it like he was in a trace and said "Jade" weakly.

The light sputtered, and with a final flash Jade Chan was gone

Jackie stumbled forward for a few steps, his Uncle catching him before he collapsed.

"Uncle..." He gasped out. "Is....is Jade?" He didn't want to say it.

The older chinese man looked down at his nephew, and in an uncharacteristic act, pulled him close.

"Uncle does't know." He said, sounding old as he was for once. He turned to see his apprentice, his head bowed.

Uncle closed his eyes and took a deep breath. He grasped Jackies shoulders and pushed him out to arms length. Staring into the young mans eyes with deadly focus.

"But he will find out."

=================

The first thing Jade felt......was.......sticky?

Her fingers twitched. Something went *SQELLCH*

'Uuuuhhhh hooo-k. Thas grosss' Her head felt fuzzy. Like when she accidentally downed that coke and rum last new year.

Groaning she tried pushing herself up, only to slide back when the mud gave way beneath her hands. Her eyes flung open.

"GAH!"

"Hihihihihihiihi"

Jade shot up as an eerie laugh echoed all about her. Sh looked around and took everything in.

It was a forest. A creepy, creepy first were the trees were al twisted and bare of foliage. The sky above was full of clouds coloured blood red, with deep purple lightning flashing across frequently.

Lightning that struck down at that exact moment. Revealing a bunch of child sized silhouettes hiding among the tree's. Their large, buggy eyes all pointed at her.

"Hihihihihihihi" She was up on her feet in a moment. Barely recognising that her hands were blue when she pushed herself up.

The laughing came back. Joined by voices she swore were pulled out of a movie about killer kids.

"What is it?"

"Looks like a sprite."

"Sprites aren't blue."

"Hate sprites. Taste like nymphs."

"Not a sprite! Maybe a gnome?"

The voices came from all around her. She turned and turned but another flash showed nothing. She slipped into a stance and started mentally going over what Jackie had taught her about fighting multiple opponents. Shifting the loose parts of the weird dress she was wearing out the way.

"Back off!" She barked into the darkness.

The chatter only increased.

"It talks?"

"That means its got good brains!"

"Talky brains taste better!"

Ok, this was seriously freaking her out.

"I'm warning you! I've got serious mojo going on. You try anything and I'll go all shadow khan on you!"

The chattering stopped. The noise in the forest went dead for a moment save for the sound of rolling thunder, and her own heartbeat.

Then, the chatter exploded

"Shadowkhan?!"

"It makes Shadowkhan!?!"

"Only oni make Shadowkhan!"

"ONI! ONI!"

"Oni not taste like sprite!"

"Oni taste good good good!"

"Tasty tasty Oni!"

"EAT NOW!"

In a chorus of agreement, they swarmed.

Dozen's upon dozens of childlike forms swarmed into the small clearing from every direction. They shot out from the tree's like wild cats. Running across the ground at breakneck speed, or lunging from treetops. She could see eyes gleaming with mad hunger, and teeth like pirahna glinting in pal light.

She punched the first one to grasp her, sending it sprawling to the ground. then kicked another who tried wrapping its long fingers around her k, however neck. One by one she was able to push then back, however evert one she pushed away was replaced by two more. The room she had to move shrank rapidly, and they grasping was growing. She managed to throw off two pulling at each of her arms but was immediately beset upon by four more. Then her legs were pulled out from under her, and even her hair was being painfully tugged on. She was trapped.

They pinned her back to the mud just as one of them pulled its face close to hers. It looked like a starving kid. Its body was thin almost to seeing its ribs. Its face however looked like an old mans with deep winkles and a bald head. It's mouth was naturally wide and showed off an array of long and thin needle like teeth. A long Aardvark like tongue reached out of it's dripping mouth an shed against her cheek.

"HEY!"

It's already wide grin puled further.

"It IS oni!"

IA joyous giggle rippled through the crowd. Those holding her gripped even tighter. The one looming over her lowered it's head, drool dripping uncaringly from its mouth as it peered into Jade's terrified red orbs. A sickly looking finger with a jagged nail raising up to her face.

"I get eye." It whispered before reaching down to claim it's prize.

"RRRRRROOOOOAAAAARRRRR!!!!!"

Four dozen head's shot up. The gnarled nail was still dangerously close to Jade's eye.

*CRASH* *FWOOM* *WHATEVER A TREE FALLING OVER SOUNDS LIKE*

Jade's eyes ficked to were the...wharvers were looking. Just barely she was able to make out the sight of tree's not to far off toppling over.

The thing hovering over her flicked it's gaze back to her, then the tree's, then back to her. It snarled and growled hatefully before darting off to the side. She found herself unceremoniously dropped back into the mud just as these things vanished back into the woods.

*CRASH* "RRAAGGHH!!"

She flipped herself over and tried running too, but in a panic she tried so hard she ended up slipping and falling in face first.

Her actions grew more frantic the louder the noise got. This wasn't Jade Chan, the smart, plucky girl who stared down Shen Du without flinching. This was Jade Chan, the girl who was freaking out about almost getting eaten alive!

She tried again and again to frantically get up. Not thinking about anything but escaping. In fact she was so focused on that, that she hard;y noticed when the sound of tree's falling stopped, and only halted herself when a very large inhuman shadow loomed over her.

Sweat ran her brow. She gulped.

'Ok Jade just, just calm down. Now get up slowly. Maybe if you don't make any sudden movement you can get away and...."

The shadow shifted, and its castor lunged down at her.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHH!!!!"

Jade was lifted up unceremoniously by her leg by something and lifted into the air. she hung upside down as she screamed and screamed until she ran out of breath, drew in another and started screaming again until she started coughing.

"Finished?" A voice asked her.

"Huh?" Slowly she opened her right eyes, then her left. Another flash of lightning struck nearby and gave her a clear view of the beast that was holding her.
133312122111.title: Jade is banished

It was...a mermaid?

A beautiful looking woman with moss green hair who was a fish from the waist down. Swimming through the air like it was water.
1333121221112.title: Caught by a mermaid?

13331212211122.content:
Odd as it was. Jade couldn't call this woman anything but a Minotaur.

She was 9 feet tall. Had large steer like horns jutting out of her head. Had hooves instead of feet, and she could see a cow tail swimming out behind her....although for some reason instead of a bulls head like in the stories, she had a human one. A massive hammer was resting over her shoulder.
13331212211122.title: Tangled by a minotaur?

133312122111221.content:
The first thing Jade noticed was how....'humanly' beautiful she was.

Jade had heard from uncle how demon's disguising themselves as human women could often be seen through by how unatturally attractive they'd make themselves. Flawless skin, perfect hair, perfect curves and a face out of your deepest fantasies. Far, far more attractive than any mortal woman, even the most famous beauties like Helen of Troy or Audrey Hepburn could ever hope to make themselves.

This one was nowhere near that beautiful. She only looked like a supermodel. Minus a few small scars across her brow and under her chin

Partially covering her steer like horns and floppy cow ears was long dirty blonde hair that looked like she'd been spending to much time near an open flame, reaching down past her - holy hell how does she stand upright with 'those' sticking out of her chest!? - breasts to brush against her hips where she spotted a holstien tail swinging back and forth behind a human rear end that tapered down into clove footed cow legs. Really her legs were the only part of her with fur aside from the fur garb she was wearing since her muck coated skin was either a light black or the worlds best tan. She stared at Jade with orange/ red eyes and a smirk on her lips that showed a few fangs poking out.

(For reference http://12-beast.wikia.com/wiki/Minotauru...)

"Um...yeah." She said meekly, looking over the giantess's shoulder and spying the tree she was hefting as a club.

"Good." Was the minotaurs curt replay before she let go and uncerimoniously dropped the girl from more than twice her height.

"Aagh!" Screamed the littlest oni as she crashed to the forest floor. Glaring up at the massive woman who had already turned around and began striding at a speed only someone who was mostly leg could acheive.

"Hey HEY where'd you think your going!?" Jade yelled after her.

"Home. Try not to let the vermin get you. I'm not likely to be around to save your tiny blue behind again." The giant called back without turning around.

Now this is the point where Jade would normally have yelled back something snarky or boasting. Right now however she was still reeling from the fact a horde of blue Gollum's had tried to eat her, so she was not feeling as brave as she normally let on. After a quick look from right to left before she jumped at the sound of troubled breathing coming from just past the visible tree line and bolted til she was in her 'saviour's' shadow, having to jog to keep up with the 9 foot tall womans lazy pace.

If the minotaur cared at all she was being followed she made no show of it.

They kept walking for what felt like forever Jade felt she had to break the silence, or keep listening to the horrible giggling following them.

"Hey uh thanks for saving me."

The woman didn't even incline her head.

"What were those things anyway?"

Not one peep.

Jade huffed and went back to silence.

"Vermin."

Her head cracked back up to the woman. "Huh?"

"They're vermin. Bottom feeders who are too weak to pose a threat to anything. Even a runt like you should have been able to take them on no trouble. 'Should' at least."

“HEY I had em!” The young oni’s pride as a warrior would not let her take that insult lying down club or no club.

The woman was unable to keep a smirk from her face before she let out a very bull like snort. “Yeah I saw. The way you were going to let that one tear off your face was you luring them into your trap no doubt.”

The girl glowered but said nothing.

The minotaur's smile dropped. "Now from those fancy clothes you got I take it you don't exactly live around here. So unless you can magic yourself up a fortress from the ground you'll be needing a place to stay."

"Tch I still say I had em." She grumbled.

her saviour shrugged and continued on. The tiny girl continued alongside the horned giant until they reached the mouth of a very deep cave.

The woman glanced over her shoulder at Jade with bored eyes.

“If you think you can handle things on your own then I wont stop ya. Those things have been following us all the way back. S’wat happens when bottomfeeders get a taste of real quality food.” She grinned. Revealing a mouth full of more canines than a someone who was half herbivore should have “And it doesn’t get much more quality than Oni.”

Despite trying to hide it. Jade shivered.

“If you change your mind about my offer there’s food inside.” And with that the taller woman walked into the……dank, cave Where Instead of slowly fading Into the Darkness It's swallowed her up immediately as though it were not the absence of light but thick black tar.

Jade hung back only for a moment before another round of all encompassing giggling jolted her forward and sent her running after the horned giantess into the darkness
