133312122112.content:
As the dark orb expand and expanded, The scientist almost wished that the dragon had told them for definite his niece was being banished to another realm, because at least them he wouldn't have to worry about why the dark mass had grown so much if she was mutating.

.
"Uncle..." He muttered, turning to the crotchety old man, who was holding his enchanted blowfish out steady at the mass.

"Nephew and apprentice must not let guard down." He snapped. "Whatever may happen to niece, we cannot let guard down. Niece may emerge as giant beast and attack. Demons could flood in from anothoooor dimension." His gaze left the dark sphere foe a moment to look at his stunned juniors. "When time comes. We must all be ready to fight. One way or other. Yes?"

The two men didn't want know what to say. Of course they wanted to argue. To tell the older man off for saying such callous things.......yet......they had just had to fight off a horde of supernatural ninjas controlled by the girl. As much as they hate to admit, t would be foolish not to...

*GGRHHGHHRLLEE*

All eyes turned to the sphere, which suddenly became less sphere like as a large bump pushed out from it, then receded. Then another jump pushed out and went back in. Then another, and another and another.

The three watched with morbid curiosity as the orb became covered with dozens of undulating lumps. Pushing out around around, which gave them all the idea that maybe dozens of hands were pushing from the inside.

*SSK--KKLTTTCCCHHHHH*

They cringed as the sphere made a sound like wet tearing filled the room. They watched as the tip-top of the orb began to separate as neatly a someone trying to rip a steak apart with their bear hands. The slow ripping left long, thin lines of sinew holding the half together before they tore with a sloppy 'snap'.

Jackie went slightly green, Tohru's cheeks bulged.

When the grizzley opening was halfway down, they were able to peer into the darkness inside....and all but the wizard took a step back unconsciously as a blue, misshapen hand reached out and grabbed the dripping darkness.

"Jaaaackieeeeeee." An all to familiar voice spoke with the sound of a hundred other voices reverberating through it.

"Jade." Her uncle whispered and took a step forward, only to be blocked by 'his' uncle. He turned to glare at the man, only to see that the chi wizards eyes were still locked on the....we'll it was clear a cocoon by this point.

Another inhuman hand reached out of the darkness and grasped the other side of the tear, and then began to push.

The disturbing noise only increased as the process was sped up. The front of the cocoon split open wider and wider. A demonic groan growing louder and louder from inside.

"UuuuuuuugghhhhhHHHHHHHHHAAAAAGGHHHH!!!!"

With one might heave, the tearing reached the bottom and the mangled sphere....exploded outwards with a wave of darkness.

The adults were all knocked off their feet. Even Uncle who had been ready for anything had not prepared for such a powerful backlash. All round them stone floor cracked. Metal walkways warped, glass shattered and doors tore from their hinges.

Jackie groaned. The blast had knocked him back but fortunately not out. He rubbed his head and pulled himself into a seated position.

"Ugh, bad day." He groaned. He looked back to see who he had to thank for bracing him. The air was thick with black smoke like shadow. He waved his hand to clear it away somewhat, only to find Tohru was quite out cold. Dread an up him spine as he looked over to Uncle and saw the senior moaning quietly. Not out but clearly disoriented.

"Very bad day." He said seriously. What would he do now if.....

"Jackie?"

Jackie paused, gulped audibly, then slowly turned to face whatever it wa that had Jade's voice.

His eyes widened. Jade!

She looked normal.

Well 'normal' as in wasn't a 30 foot fire breathing lovecraftian horror. She was still a child. Her skin was still blue and her eyes were still solid red, but he had been expecting far worse.

That is until the smoke cleared some more and much to his horror he found that she had changed more than he first thought.
133312122112.title: The new Jade emerges

1333121221122.content:
She had two sets of limbs. Human hand's and pincers. And was a vicious insect armed with a deadly stinger from the waist down.

Right?
1333121221122.title: Oni Scorpion?

choices: Later- Jade let's herself be examined
13331212211221.content:
It was one of those rare moments Jackie had come to (reluctantly) appreciate over the past few years. One of those moments where you know your screwed, but not as badly as you thought you’d be.

Jade was still blue. That was bad. Her screwed up eyes were still solid red. That was worse. However from what he could hear from her coughing, the demonic distortion in her voice was gone. That was good. Also they weren’t immediately swarming with Khan so that was a good sign that the potion had at least ‘somewhat’ worked. That was great.

“Phew” The older man beside him slouched a little in relief “Uncle was afraid something worse would happen.”

“She ‘is’ still blue sensei.”

“Tch, blue is nothing. Uncle turned every colour in rainbow when in training under master Fong, but is uncle strange colour today? No! Fixing niece will be no problem.” The old grouch ranted in response.

Jackie slowly edged towards his niece, his arms raised in submission just in case she decided to lash out.

“Jade….” He started. trying to hold down his nerves as the barely open ruby eyes turned towards him. He continued edging forward “I’m not mad at you. In fact I’m proud of what you did with the book. It looks like some lucky girl has earned a trip to Moose World.”

“Uhhhhhh shudup. Hd hrts.” The blue girl grumbled.

“Ok ok.” Her uncle said rapidly before switching to a softer tone “I know you're confused right now. But I promise…..”

“SHUT U-AAGGHH!!!”

Whatever he had been about to say trailed off into silence as the girl grabbed her temple again for a minute before lifting her throbbing head away from her hands enough to level a glare on him. It would not have been so bad…...if another smaller pair of eyes hadn't opened up where her eyebrows should be…...and a smaller pair above those.

Her body turned around to face him.

*clack, click click click click, clack*

The men in the rooms eyes widened as a large form hidden beneath the dust and smoke cleared the obscuring shroud away. Though their expressions of shocked could not hope to match Jades. Those horrified look was magnified three fold.

From the waist down, Jade was an insect. Like a centaur from someone's darkest nightmares the blue skinned girls lower body stretched out longer behind her than she was tall. A deep black segmented exoskeleton that shined with every fractal of light it managed to pull in. Two powerful looking and heavily spiked pincers clacked feverishly at her sides where her hip bone used to be. Six long, powerful quadruple jointed legs jutted from the sides and ended in thick spears sharpened to the point where you could see holes in the concrete where they had last stepped.

“Jade…...don’t panic.”

“AAAAIIYAAHHH NIECE IS GIANT BUG!!!”

The girl jumped, and a long tail tipped with a curved barb jabbed itself in the ground in front of her.

Everyone watched the concrete around the stinger melt into green sludge before she slowly retracted the barb.

Now comes the part where we would iris out after Jade makes a witty or funny retort. Making light of her situation.

That does not happen here. No snark. No jokes. Instead the girl stared up at her stinger with wide, horrified eyes as it dripped neon green venom. The drop burning a hole into the floor.
13331212211221.title: The Scorpion Queen

choices: They manages to come up with a disguise,
How is Jade dealing with this?
133312122112211.content:
“I can’t believe this. This is not possible”

“how can’t it be possible? Your the one who ran the test.”

“I. Know. But the data doesn’t make any sense.”

“What? Your doubting your own work? You? Mr always right is admitting he made a mistake?”

“Hey! Heyheyheyhey….hey. I don’t make ‘mistakes’. These readings just cannot be real.”

“See now you're just babbling.”

“Ahem!”

The two geniuses in lab coat winced and turned to the man in the trenchcoat. Beside him were the unoffical resident archaeologist and his aging uncle. They all stood in a medical observation room. In the room below doctors, very open minded doctors examined a patient who looked like a mix between bored and mortified.

Her ugly dress had been removed. Though for what they found beneath she thinks she’d rather have kept it on. The exoskeleton had not simply stopped at her waist. The ebony plating stretched up a good bit and rather than just a straight cut off, the plating grew smaller and more numerous. The plates looking more like snake scales before giving way to blue skin at her stomach.

“You two mind sharing with the class?”

The scientists shared a nervous look before the one on the right spoke up.

“Well. We’ve ran every possible test. Cross examined the results innumerable times…….it all seems pretty conclusive…...and at the same time can’t possibly be right. She both is and is not a giant scorpion.”

“Really?” Black quirked half his remaining hair and looked down into the room below were Jade’s sides were being prodded with a pen. Apparently she was still ticklish since her tail lashed out and struck the doctor!……..Or it would have if it wasn’t shackled from tip to torso by chains. They’re inquisitive not suicidal.

“Seem’s to be pretty clear she is. Or is this you ‘genius’s’ way of saying she’s turned into some sort of hybrid?”

“Sadly sir, we only ‘wish’ is was something as straightforward as hybridisation.”

“The readings keep changing from one extreme to the other captain. One minute it reads as full human. The next it’s saying she’s 100% scorpion.

“Not just any one kind of scorpion either. We've got matches for black, emperor, sand, whip. We’ve identified pretty much ‘every’ species and subspecies of scorpion D.N.A within a single host being.”

“And at the same time her ‘human’ genes, or whatever it is I’m looking at right now, is staying entirely separate from the insect genes. It’s like we took samples from two entirely different subjects.”

They all looked back in on Jade. A doctor was waving his finger in front of her eyes while all six red orbs followed the digit.

“So what does that say about turning her back?”

The scientist ‘mmmm ed “On paper it should be as easy as peeling off the exoskeleton and pulling her out. But really it really isn’t.” He pulled out several pictures from his folder and pinned them up on a wall. “These X-rays not only show that the scorpion really has replaced everything below her waist, but several organs in her ‘upper half’ have migrated from her torso. She’s grown about a dozen new ones, only a few of which we recognise from scorpion anatomy.”

The other one continued “She has a human skeleton. But only from the waist up before endo turns to exo. Everything we get from one test is invalidated by the next one. There’s no scientific reason how this is possible and if you say magic ‘one more time’ old man were gonna….”

“Lab boys are like small children. Have to explain obvious many times before they sink into thick heads!”

“Ok that is it!”

“ENOUGH!” Knowing how to keep your cool in a tense situation was a prerequisite of being a secret agent, let alone the leader of a secret agency. He had seen things over the past year that would drive other men to the point of madness and (regardless of what his superiors thought) came out sane. However there was only so far his patience would last, and the sight of two supposedly brilliant men arguing semantics while a little girl in the next room is trying to deal with being a freakish abomination wore him very thin.

He turned to Uncle

“What about magically. There anything you can do?”

The older man glared at the scientist as he snorted but sighed when he turned back to black,

“Uncle has no idea where to begin. Potion to help Jade reacted in ways as far outside what Uncle was expecting to happen as can get. Will keep looking, but will not risk further changes until certain will not affect niece worse.”

The wizard looked through the glass towards his grand niece, feeling his every years.

“Until cure is found. Niece will remain demon.”
133312122112211.title: Poking and Proding

choices: Tohru gets tossed aside and Jade makes a break for it.
133312122112212.content:
In fact Jade took it far more poorly than that. This wasn’t yet the Jade who had turned into a giant, or a frog or a cat. Monstrous Transformation thing was still new to her, especially one that turned her feet into daggers and gave vision straight out of ‘The Fly’, and so she had the right to…….

“AAAAAAAAIIIIIGGGHHHH!!!!!”

….Freak the f**k out.

Jade lost her new sense of balance and she started scrambling on the floor. Trying to turn every which way, with every one of her new legs trying to convince her to go in a totally different direction than its neighbours. Her claws snapped at the air feverishly like razor sharp maraca's. Her horrible tail was swinging around wildly, forcing the younger Chan man to duck and weave every pass. causing a very near accident with her sting.

“Jade! calm down…*WAah!!!” He managed to yell before the powerful tail slammed into his side. Pushing all the air from his gut and knocking him clear across the room where he was thankfully caught by the small sumo.

“TOHRU! Grab nieces tail and hold in place while Uncle prepares spell!”

Tohru stares at his sensei before looking up at the thrashing bug girl. Still tearing up everything around her seemingly without effort. *gulp* “Isn’t there another way?”

“NO! Uncle must have Jade still. Now pin scorpion tail so Uncle can knock her out!”

The giant turned to the still freaking out Scorpi-taur. He slumped his shoulders

‘The only difference between this and the Dark Hand is a smaller pay check and I’m not in jail.’ He thought morosely before charging in.
133312122112212.title: Never confront a crazed scorpion

13331212211222.content:
Her hands were large clawed talons like daggers. Her feet even larger ones with claws like short swords. Her whole body looked light and built for speed while two, huge black feathered raven wings jutted out her back.

Right?
13331212211222.title: Oni Harpy?

133312122112222.content:
The smoke had blurred his vision. Jade was huge! Not like a tall adult but like she was a literal giant!

She stood 7, maybe 8 feet tall. Her hands and feet had clawed nails. She had two small curled (and though he'd never say it out loud, adorable) fangs sticking out of her mouth, and a large, dark blue horn sticking out of her forehead.

Right?
133312122112222.title: Oni Ogre?

choices: Freaking out, the shadows swallow up the girl as she runs away.
1333121221122221.content:
Tohru did not consider himself tall.

Despite being just short of a quarter tonne and seven feet tall, Tohru was in fact too small to be the sumo everyone he's met outside of Japan thought he was. So he wasn’t as shocked when he found people who were taller than him……...unless of course the person taller than him was a little girl,

Jade absolutely towered over all of them. Ten, maybe even twelve feet tall yet looking like a giant kid rather than a tall woman. Her dress having ‘(fortunately) grown with her now looked like it could fit all three men at once with room to spare.

The girl looked tired. Yawning, her family backed off a step when her mouth opened wider than anything with a jawbone should be able to and revealed not one, but two rows of thick, razor sharp fangs that looked like they could easily tear apart rock like it was rock 'candy'. She reached up with her clawed hands and brushed aside part of her waist long, bedhead hair before opening one eye, then another, showing that the ruby red orbs had remained unchanged.

“Uuuggghhh s’to early.”

“J-jade!?”

The giant girl blinked away more sleep and zeroed in on her uncle. She would have asked what he was doing down there. However whatever anyone was about to say changed the moment Tohru saw a set of long slightly curved horns poking out of her black mop.

Tohru was suddenly a little boy again, whimpering under his covers on a silent night with the only sounds being the creak of the floorboards, and an inhuman growl from behind the thin paper door.

“ONI!!!”
1333121221122221.title: Elementary school ogre girl

choices: Kitsune and Jade? Sounds like a match made in evil.
1333121221122222.content:
Six dark furred, light tipped tails waved gently behind her like a demonic throne. Her ears were gone from the side of her head and replaced by two bue furred ones hiding in her longer hair.

Right?
1333121221122222.title: Oni Kitsune

choices: Jade is still evil and attacks
13331212211222221.content:
Jackie’s breath hitched in his mouth. He was almost positive he heard Tohru do the same, while Uncle sounded like someone stepped on his little toe with cleats. His eyes watered as they refused to blink before his brain could permanently etch this sight into his memory.

It was, without a doubt, the most beautiful woman he had ever seen in his life. No, beautiful couldn't even begin to describe her. A thousand poets contemplating her beauty for a thousand years could not never conceive a worthy enough description of her beauty. Any word relating to beauty in any language felt woefully inaccurate.

The sheer flawlessness of her alabaster skin. The way her lustrous veil of black hair that fell to her knees framed a face the greatest sculptors in history would weep over being unable to replicate. How it cascaded of her delicate shoulders like a gentle stream, sweeping over a perfectly formed figure covered in a beautiful and elaborate Japanese kimono that, while it hid everything from view, appeared to have been designed for a woman who wasn’t as…..naturally gifted as her.

They were so enthralled by the human beauty of the smirking woman they almost didn’t notice her very inhuman features.

Almost.

The marble like skin they had been admiring was indeed the colour of alabaster, however it was like pale ‘blue’ alabaster like someone had tried to bleach a ninja khan. The sheer volume of her flowing mane disguised two tufts atop her head that he realised were in fact a set of vulpine ears. Her eye’s which he first felt piercing his very soul were red as blood and held both warmth and a wicked amusement.

As they continued to drink in her presence, something moved behind her. Jackie’s eyes bulged as a form twice her height lifted up and, with a ‘whoosh’ sound that sounded like extra emphasis was out on the ‘whoosh’, the tips of her 9 dark furred tails lit up with ghostly blue fire.

Tohru, who moments ago had been dumbstruck by the vision in front of him was backing away from it slowly. A look of terror slowly spreading across his features.

“Kitsune.” He whispered,

“Tohru, Uncle will admit he does not know Japanese lore, but will guess that ‘Kitsune’ is like Huli Jing. A Fox spirit yes?”

His pupil nodded. “Tricksters who take the form of beautiful women, and whose power is reflected in the number of tails they have.”

“And nine is many?”

“The most they can have.” The small sumo said grimly. His eyes still utterly focused on the inhumanly beautiful woman.

“Of course.” Replied his master dryly.

The archeologist gulped audibly, never breaking his view of the woman who continued to stare at him with those inhuman, yet impossibly gorgeous eyes that stared back at him with an expression he had seen far too much of. The kind that choked the air with a sense of bemused superiority. Like she found it funny that mere humans were standing before her. The only difference was this one seemed less bemused and more mischievous than superior……...there was something disturbingly familiar about that smile.

The colour ran out of Jackie Chan’s face like someone had poked a hole in him.

“Jade?”

With that single word question. The vision of loveliness perfect lips pulled up to one side. Transforming her smile from haughty to cocky.

“Heh. Hey uncle Jackie.” She half giggled with a voice that was all at once delicate, alluring and commanding all at once. A voice that could have drawn any other men to her like a siren song

To ‘these’ men, who had now found out who the woman they had been staring at with unabashed desire was however……….

Tohru fainted. Hitting the floor with a loud ‘thud’.

Uncle turned green.

Jackie’s cheeks bulged and he started coughing.

The woman's smirk turned into a full blown grin, revealing her enlarged incisors.

“Well that’s flattering.”


------------------------
13331212211222221.title: The Jade Kitsune

13331212211222222.content:
Jackie was mistaken. It wasn't blue skin, she was covered in dark blue scales. Her eyebrows had been replaced by two spiked ridges and she had two long horns sticking out from her hair.

Her ears were sharp and pointed, and she had a lighter slit running down the middle of her solid red eyes. A long scale tail with spies at the end whipped behind her, and her hands and feet were both replaced by claws. Two large, leathery wings folded themselves behind her back.

Right?
13331212211222222.title: Oni Drake?

133312122112222222.content: Like Ariel......if Ariel was terrifying.
133312122112222222.title: Oni Mermaid

1333121221122222221.content:
Jackie did not know what to expect when Jade left the ‘cocoon’. So he tried to expect everything. From the most mundane and most hoped for, to dread images of unimaginable horrors like out of your darkest nightmares

A floating blue mermaid? Yeah no surprise he didn't expect that.

From the waist down his niece had a black scaled fish tail. A wicked looking frill of black and dark, dark blue sprung up from below her tailbone and a jagged silvery black finn waved gently back and forth as she floated in mid air.

Yes mid-air. Jackie found himself staring up at Jade as she lay in mid air half conscious. However it didn’t look like it did when she used the Rooster talisman. Her tail swished gently back and forward as though she was submerged in deep water, with the sound of water rushing over her fin echoing from nowhere with every pass. Her now waist length hair floated about like a jet black halo in a gentle unseen current. her dress once long enough to brush the floor had been reduced to a top that stretched only to her hips, with the many of the long dark strips of the cloth that made it up hanging freely, tangling and coiling around her like a school of eels.

The men flinched when the girls gazes focused on them. Looking down on them, blinking slowly and lazily as her brain came up to speed. Jackie turned a little green as he noticed the slats in either side of her neck opening and closing in the rhythm of her breath..

Jackie unconsciously took a deep breath and a surprisingly heavy step forward.

It was so strange. This was Jade. His niece. His very excitable, very talkative niece. Any second now he was expecting her to start babbling about how cool it was to be a mermaid, or complain about how her favourite sneakers won’t fit anymore. Hell he’d even settle for that demonic overlord speech she had been spewing not that long ago. The way she was just silently staring at him. Regarding him with as much interest as when she watch that dust mote in the car.

He stopped 2 feet away from her. Looking up at her nervously.

He took a calming breath…...and suddenly he was struggling to breath as he felt the rush of non existent water sweep past his lips and into his lungs.

The archaeologist's gasped and held his mouth shut as he suddenly found himself struggling to breath on dry land. His clothes began to sway in a non existent current just as he was being lifted into the air. The laws of gravity becoming a mere suggestion to the men who were being lifted up by invisible tides.

Jade continued to simply float there for a few seconds more, before with the sound of moving water she ‘swam’ past her uncle, his uncle and her friend and rushing towards the doors with the speed of a pike.

Jackie tried reaching out to her. To grab her as she passed him, but it was like trying to grab a fish underwater. His fingers didn’t come anywhere near her as she passed him like a bullet before heading out the door. Only when she was out of sight did the men suddenly drop to the floor, gasping for breath and hacking violently.

By the time the men’s brains finally registered their wasn’t actually any water in their lungs to force out, the young mermaid was long gone from section 13.
1333121221122222221.title: Under the sea.....on dry land

1333121221122222222.content: What if Jade went through a major Growth spurt and came out like her older time version or older then that?
1333121221122222222.title: Older shadowkhan queen?

13331212212.content:
Jade fell to the ground in pain as the second the good magic came in contact with her. The Tattoe of the shadow Khan symbol feeling as though it was stretching her skin to near transparency as it grew up over her leg before fading from sight.

While the Chan clan and the demon ninjas were distracted Shen Du in the body ofthe much fallen crime boss Valmont snatched up the dark tome that Jade had used to gain supernatural power. Almost instantly the Shadow Khan attacked, springing forth from every place where light does not fall to strike at him for daring to defy thier queen.

"I command you to stop!" Shen Du Sneered while holding the book right in front of him.

The army of darkness froze in place, eve those lunging in mod air.

The dragon in human skin smirked and glared over at the Chans who where helping the girl up. "Now destroy the Chans."

The ninjas about faced and attacked so quickly you'd think hey sprouted faces on the back on thier heads rather than turn around, but not fast enough for Jade not to make what should be a final order of her own.

"NO DESTROY THE BOOK!" She screamed.

More mystical ninjas spring up into the air, one pulling out a small metal sphere and throwing it at Valmont. Now I say Valmont because Shen Du would not be stupid enough to hold the object targeted for destruction up in front of him!

The explsion wasn't very big but effective, every page, evert piece of leather from cover to cover even the gold decorations were reduced to black ash holding their retangular form for but a moment longer before piling on the floor.

The ash didn't even finish falling before Jade barked again.

"HOLD HIM!"

They pulled ropes out from their clothing which was clealry not htier before and lassoed Valmont. With an amaxzing display on acrobatics they got more rope and suspended hiim near the very top of the open area of the section 13 complex.

Jackie smiled at the sight of both of his greatest enemies tied up in such a way.

"I did something bad didn't I." Jade said sadly from behind him, her voice but of regret and worry about the punishment she was sure to recievie in the near fututre.

"If you mean getting a Tattoe against my permission, yes you did."

He turned around. "If you mean detroying the demon archive then thWWWAAAGGHH!!"

"Why are you WOOOOOHHH!"

Tohru just stared.

Jade looked confused at her uncles and the sumos horrified expressions. She checked over herself. A shadowKhan appearing beside her with a mirror just to be sure. Woah she looked awesome! Her eyes made her lok like some sort of mutant bug monster, and they just popped with the contrast of the blue skin. She ran a hand through her hair which seemed to styyle itself into spikes despite the lack of gel, she tried flattening it but the cursed locks just moved back into place. She didn't like her nails either which were girlishly long even if they were sharp as knives.

'The dress has to go to.' She picked at her collar with a pointed index, which caused a ShadowKhan to rush to her side with a needle and thread, in no time restoring the damage to its previous immaculate state.

She gave it a rye look and turned back to her still horror striken elders.

"Ya know you guys will catch flys if you keep your mouths open.

Jackie was the first to recover. "Wha, how di, ubu wha!?!"

Kinda.

"JADE IS STILL BLUE!!" Uncle screamed.

She looked at her hands. "Uh yeah. So?"

"Jade. That spell was supposed to free you from the evil." Explained Tohru.

She smiled. "Right thats me. The totally not evil Jade Chan. Queen of the shadowKhan."

"Jade you should not still have that power at all!" Continued the japanese titan. "The removal of the tatooe should have severed the link to the dark power that control the ShadowKhan. Without that mark you should have turned back to normal in seconds."

It took a few seconds for her to process this. Looking about the room at the army of ninjas that she could 'feel' would obey her without question. She waved her arm and with silent subserviance they merged back with the shadows from which they came.

She looked back down at her hands, not getting any less blue, her nails no less sharp. Her massive pure red eyes no more human.

"You mean.......'that' was what was supposed to make me normal again." She said nervously.

Jackie recognised the tone and crouched to Jades level, reaching ut for her shoulder only for her to flinch away.

"I'm actually stuck like this?!" The worry in her tone increased.

The men had a fairly good idea as to why. Jade always enjoyed her transformations while they lasted. Making a fuss whenever she changed back but always knowing that she 'had' to change back if she wanted to live her life instead of holding away like a hunchback in Paris. She always knew that her crazy relatives would bail her out.

Except this was different. They had just tried to change her back and failed. It wasn't a matter of finding the right ingrediant or making the wrong potion. The cure had done exactly what it was supposed to do and get rid of the tattoe, but for some reason that didn't mean she would turn human again.

"We must do research." The old Chi wizard said without his usual emphasis on the r word. Doing quite the opposite to ease the girl from her worries.
13331212212.title: Jade reluctant Queen of the shadow Khan

133312122122.content:
Jade. Scared out of her mind at the prospect of looking like a monster for the rest of her life runs away. Into the city, to another city, another stare, country, continent, the shadow realm even!!!

She goes looking for a place to accept her or maybe even cure her....all the while forces of power both light and dark search for her?

Right?
133312122122.title: Queen Jade runs away?

1333121222.content: What about when Jade became a giant?
1333121222.title: Stuck as - Giant?

13331212222.content: How about when Jade absorbed the wind demon chi?
13331212222.title: Toad Jade

choices: Follow the night as Jade explains
Come the next day, Jade is learning to use her new powers
133312122221.content:
The wind demon-infused Jade jumped away from Drago but the son of Shendu was too quick for the unprepared Jade. His scaly hands grabbed her arm and drew her in. She could feel his magical powers growing and screamed for help

When all went white.

--------

Jade opened her eyes. She looked at the ceiling above her and lifted her hands to her face. They were hers . . . And they were human! Gasping with joy, she jumped to her feet and looked around.

"Uncle's shop!" she cried out. But something was odd. Where was Uncle or Uncle Jackie or Toru? If she just got that demon chi out of her, they would be next to her for her own protection. Were they off running after Drago because he escaped with it? Then why no note? Or even Section 13 agents?

"Very good," came a deep voice. Jade turned and saw an old man with a trimmed beard smiling at her. He leaned on a walking stick and fanned himself with a fan.

"Who are you?" Jade asked as she looked at the man in white and gold cloth. He chuckled at her words.

"Who are you?" he replied.

"I-i-I'm Jade Chan! Awesome martial artist and able to kick your butt!" Jade yelled. The man smiled.

"Ah, such energy. It is good to finally speak with you Jade Chan. We have much to discuss," he said. He stopped fanning himself and held the fan up. "Do you recognize this?" Jade looked at it and gasped.

"That's the fan used to banish Xiao Fung!" Jade yelled. The man shook his head and his fingers tapped the walking stick.

"Do you know this?" Jade looked at the walking stick.

"That's the walking stick of the Chosen One! Why do you have it?"

"I brought it with me. Much as you brought this place with you," he said. Jade shook her head.

"Who are you?" Jade asked with fear in her tone. The man smiled. Jade knew that smile. She gave it all the time. The sparkle in his brown eyes . . . was like her's. Oh no. Oh no. It couldn't be . . .

"You understand," the man said. "I am the Chosen One."

"Then why are you hear?" Jade asked in a soft voice, worried what was about to be said wouldn't be so.

"Because you are the Chosen One. You are me. You are who came before me. You will be those who come after you," the man said. "I am the image of your soul speaking to your mind."

"So . . So this is all in my head?" Jade asked. The Chosen One nodded. "Then, why are you here?"

"To talk to you about your destiny. Though fighting is disliked by my old friends, sometimes it is a necessary action. Especially when it can remove a dark stain from the world," the Chosen One said.

"What does that mean?" Jade asked. A bowl appeared by the man and a pitcher of water.

"come," he said softly. Jade moved towards him and stood on the stool to watch. He set the fan into the bowl of water and the water turned dark. The pitcher had her face on it and he poured. The bowl began to overflow and the dark water was dilluted before becoming clear once more. He pulled out the fan and it seemed cleaner, brighter than before. "Understand?"

"I . . . I think so. You're saying my super pure soul is actually purifying the demon chi?" Jade asked. The Chosen One nodded.

"The powers will become bound to you and grant you incredible abilities. Just do not give in to the darkness they hold or . . ." The basin's water turned black. Jade shuddered.

"All right . . . Hey, how come you're just telling me this and not just giving me all those memories of my past life?" The chosen one touched her face with kindness and warmth.

"You, Jade, are still growing, developing. If you were to remember everything now, yes the task of purifying the demon chi would be easy but at the cost of who you are here and now. I do not wish that, so I would be quiet about this fact and tell only a few," he said. Jade nodded.

"All right. Thank me," Jade said with a smile. The Chosen One nodded and the world turned white.

---------

Jade could feel Drago's scales once more and something hit him from behind. Jade flew forward and landed. She turned and looked at the confused demon.

"How can this be?" he asked. "Why couldn't I remove the Wind Demon Chi?"

"Hey, maybe it doesn't like you," Jade said before letting loose another belch and slamming Drago into the wall. He growled but saw Uncle and Toru coming to the school. With a scream of frustration, he stripped Fin, Chow, and Ratso of his blessing and ran off.

"Jade!" Jackie said as he came to her side. "You're still green. How? I thought-"

"Talk later! Magic now," Uncle said before he began his chant. Jade could feel his power come onto her but no change.

"Ayyaaah! What is wrong with spell?" Uncle yelled. "Toru! Did you use pickled ginger?"

"Yes Sensei," Toru said.

"Um, I know what happened. Can we talk about this back at the shop?" Jade pipped up. The adults looked at her but agreed to leave.
133312122221.title: The Choosen Destiny

choices: Skip to the next demon chi awakening.
1333121222211.content:
Jade shuddered again. The power of the wind demon was still settling within her. Her body was still changing from its dark power. The short girl now stood equal to Jackie with a bulging belly. Her clothes were tight across her larger body as she hopped into Uncle's Shop.

Tohru closed the door and locked it as the other two adults looked at the changed Jade.

"Okay Jade, what is going on?" Jackie asked with some desperation. Uncle peered at Jade with focused eyes. Tohru looked at her with concerned eyes.

"I'm . . . I'm the Chosen One of the Ben-Shui order," Jade confessed. Her uncles eyes widened with shock. Tohru, however, seemed less shocked. Jade took a moment before telling them of her vision, of the man and the walking stick, and how she purify the demon chi.

------

"Jade . . . This is crazy. We need to get the chi out of you before it's too late!" Jackie exclaimed when she was done, and had grown another foot. Before she could respond, Jade covered her mouth as her cheeks bulged. She swallowed the gale before it could blow.

"Jackie, if it could be removed, wouldn't Uncle's spell have worked?" Jade asked. Jackie looked at Uncle, who was doing research with Tohru. Degrading his work was not a wise choice.

"Jade, I saw Xiao Fung. He was huge. What are we going to do if you become that big?" Jade looked down. She didn't want to think about that.

"Ahhaaa!" Uncle said. "Uncle has found it!"

"You know how to cure Jade?" Jackie asked.

"No. Uncle find ancient prophecy. When the Dark Chi stars rise, light rises to fight it, turning the darkness into light." Uncle said.

"That's me!" Jade exclaimed happily as a strong breeze came from her mouth. Papers were ruslted and moved inches before Tohru put weights on them. "Sorry."

"So, Jade has to contain these demon chis in her?!" Jackie asked.

"Yes," Uncle said. "Now, Uncle has theory. Demons have the power to look human. If Jade has Xiao Fung's wind power, perhaps she has his shape shifting power as well." Eyes fell on Jade.

"Okay. Let me try," Jade said as she closed her eyes. "Change shape. Change shape. Change shape." She said them like a spell. Her body shuddered once more. But this time it was different. The previous changes were like dams breaking from the pressure of water being too great. Now it felt like she was rebuilding them.

To the outside, smoke enveloped her and dissipated quickly. Standing there was not the toad-Jade, but normal Jade, short and pink skinned.

"Yes!" she yelled as a gust of wind came from her mouth.

"Jackie, Jade needs training," Uncle said. "Better control her power . . . And the powers she will gain." Jackie just nodded as he wondered what Jade could be like if she learned to master the power of every demon chi.
1333121222211.title: First Night

choices: He was there to help Jade train.
A new demon power has awakened.  They need to get going.
13331212222111.content:
Jade was always one who could eat a large amount. Jackie knew this. Come the next morning when she ate twice that, he was worried but Uncle dismissed it. Jade was unskilled in magic and keeping her small form was draining. She needed the food to keep using her magic.

With that done, Jackie and Jade packed for the camping trip. From food to tarps to act as clothes if Jade's clothes didn't grow with her. All the while, Uncle was doing research on how to find the demon chi -infused items.

An hour or so drive, and the pair came to a secluded part of the woods. Jackie looked at Jade. She nodded and set her pack down and released her form. Smoke enveloped her and she was just like Xiao Fung. Her body was shaped like a squatting toad. Her front green hands were big enough for Tohru to sit in. The top of her head was over twice Jackie's height. Her mouth was much larger now. Her clothes stretched to their limits as they clung to her body.

"Wow. That felt good," Jade said as she rolled her neck. Jackie looked at her and nodded.

"Okay Jade, let's start with meditation first," Jackie said. Jade said nothing but then nodded her large head. She sat back on her hind legs and put her hands together. "Focus on your breathing. Your breath is likely to be your main weapon. Feel its power." Jade nodded before laughing. "Jade!"

"Sorry Jackie, but I just realized I could use some other form of breaking wind to attack with," Jade said. Jackie just nodded.

"You certainly have an open mind Jade," Jackie said.

"I just want to embrace my destiny," Jade said happily. She, Jade Chan, would help save the world (again).

An hour of Jade meditating happened while Jackie set up a tent for him and a tarp for both an eating area and, if Jade couldn't maintain her small form, where Jade could sleep.

It wasn't just wasted time for Jade. With each breath, she could feel the power of the wind within and around her. Short breaths. Long breaths. Breaths so long her belly swelled.

When the meditation was over, Jade smiled once more. "Okay Jackie, let's have some fun," Jade said. Jackie walked over to her.

"What did you have in mind Jade?" Jackie asked. Her large hand reached out and touched him.

"Tag!" she cried out, knocking Jackie on his but with a sudden gale and she hopped off into the woods.

Jackie was happy Jade was not there as he chuckled at her joke. It showed she was still her inside. Getting up, he turned and ran after the hopping Jade.

Jade found her body acting quickly. Her limbs seemed to know how to move without too much thought. Move left and her body shifted enough to do it. Turn right. It did the same. She stopped and looked around for Jackie. He wasn't anywhere around her. But then she felt something hit her back.

"Your it Jade!" Jackie yelled as he bolted away from the demonic girl. Jade focused and gave chase. Her powerful limbs making a straight chase easy for her. But Jackie seemed to sense this and he began zigzagging through the trees. He crossed through some too small for Jade.

As she approached the trees, she focused her mind and shrank to her human form in a flash and easily passed through. Once on the other side, she went back to Toad Jade and gave chase.

"Oh bad day," Jackie muttered as he saw Jade running. Currently, he was in a tree, looking down. Jade stopped near him and looked around. Her eyes closed her eyes. Suddenly she turned in his direction.

------

Jade focused the power in her mouth. She didn't want to make a stream. Just a single burst of wind shaped like a ball. She let it focus, and in a manner similar to spitting a loogie, she blasted the ball at Jackie. Her uncle dodged it by dropping. In midair, he was met by a leaping Jade. She held him close as she landed.

"Got you back," she said.

"Jade," Jackie said with strained breath, "What was that?"

"Hmm. I'll call it spit wind," Jade said.

"Well, it could be very dangerous. Don't use it unless you have to," Jackie said. Jade nodded and kept Jackie in one arm.

"All right," Jade said before she began moving back to camp.

"Uh, Jade, what are you doing?"

"Getting used to carrying people like this," Jade said.

13331212222111.title: Toad Training

choices: the Immortal Gourd that was used to banish Bai Tza"
133312122221111.content:
"Hey T," Jade said as she looked down at him.

"Jade. Jackie," Tohru said. "Uncle wanted me to bring a few items to help Jade maintain balance." He brought out a few glyphs and looked around the camp.

"All right. Are you staying the night?" Jade asked. Tohru nodded.

"Yes," Tohru said. Jade gave a big smile as her stomach growled.

"Oooh. I need something to eat," Jade said. Jackie slipped out of Jade's hand.

"Tohru, do you know how demons sustained themselves?" Jackie asked.

"My research told me they could eat but also draw sustenance from the area around them. I presume it would be from their element," Tohru said.

"So there's a way I can feed from wind?" Jade asked.

"I believe so. But the records were very old. I might have misread it," Tohru explained. Jade looked away , wondering if her past life could tell her.

"All right. Well, let's get cooking," Jackie said. Jade became small and helped out.

-----

Lunch was a light meal, but it satisfied Jade. The afternoon was much like the morning. Jade meditated and focused her mind. She tried to focus on the breeze passing by her. Tried to see if she could draw power from it, to no avail.

After meditating, physical training began again. Chasing Jackie and Tohru. After a few rounds, Jade worked on carrying the hefty Tohru on her shoulders. Up and down the two mile long mountain trail she went. The first two trips were easy. But by the seventh time, Jade was sweating cold and hopped slowly back to camp.

"Jade," Tohru said to the giant green hopping girl. She stopped and looked at him.

"Yeah?" she asked.

"Can you shift to your small form? I'll carry you," Jade smiled and focused her mind. It took a lot of effort but she was able to transform and welcomed Tohru's warm embrace.

Jackie was finishing up on the phone and looked at Jade. She fell near the roaring fire. "Ohh yeah. That feels good," Jade said contently. Her eyes closed and she snored softly. Tohru put a blanket over her.

"Twenty eight miles in a little over four hours," Tohru said to Jackie. He looked at the resting. She certainly was much stronger than a child should be. At that rate, she could be doing a marathon easily.

"Tohru, did your research say if Jade is still growing? I mean physically. She is still a child. If she were to grow to be over five feet tall, how would that change her demon form?" Tohru gave a soft sigh.

"I do not know Jackie," Tohru said. "Who were you on the phone with?"

"Captain Black. He told me the school would be repaired tomorrow. They have the story that Jade was attacked by some arsonist who hates public schooling," Jackie said. Tohru nodded. That makes sense. Working to keep government secrets secret made them good at covering things up.

"And her absence?"

"Trauma," Jackie said.

----------

Five days passed since that first night in the woods. Jade developed her demonic skills and control. Now with little effort, she could shift between her toad and human forms. She even could fire her wind spit even in human form. Her inhuman strength showed through in her small form too, as Jackie found in their sparing lessons.

And most importantly, she did develop the power to feed from the wind. It sustained her enough that her old meals she ate when she was a normal human.

Now, as they sat around for lunch. Jade skipped away from the camp to use the little girl's room. Jackie's cell rang. Picking it up.

"Jackie!!" came Uncle's voice. "The next chi has activated! Get home quickly! We need to move before Drago gets there first!" Jackie nodded and hung up. Jade came running back.

"We need to get to the car and get home fast," Jackie said. "Another-"

"Chi activated! I know!"

"You know? How?" Jackie asked.

"I sensed it," Jade said as she rushed to the tent and started taking it down. Thankfully her years of living with Jackie taught her how to take down a tent in quick time.

Not ten minutes later, with the fire put out, they were on their way.

"Jade, Uncle didn't tell me which power activated. Do you know?" Jackie asked. Jade nodded.

"I saw . . . ."

Billy had just been taught how to possess other living beings by Death himself, and fortunately for him it was so easy that even an empty skulled moron could do it.

Now the only question was who.

His first thought......................................................................... .............................................................................was Mandy.....................................................but he decided he probably didn't want to get her mad after he stopped being inside her head.

So his best friend was out of the question, and he didn't want to possess his cat like Grim. His dad was at work, and his mom was at the doctors getting her medication again. So he needed to find somebody else.

"Aww man. I gets an awesome new toy and I don't have anyone to play it with." He pouted and sat on his front porch.

He looked at people walking in front of his house, wondering how fun it would be to be them.

Puddin'? Nah.

Mandy's Mom and Dad? Nah.

The boogie man sneaking into his room window in order to do something horrible to Grim again? Nah.

What about.

The boys eyes lit up like a Christmas tree! There! That's the one! They would be super fun to possess!

The boy got up and ran full tilt towards his target, who had only a moment to realize the egg shaped boy was charging at them before he jumped up in the air and came down head first onto his targets skull, sinking in like so much hair gel that penetrated right into the roots and into their brain. Pushing the real mind to the back while filling it with a hundred percent grade A numbskull.

When they opened their eyes, to the rest of the world it was as if nothing had changed and giggled in their own voice. To the folks at home however the eyes were the empty black Dots of Billy.

"I did it! I turned into..."

13333121111.content:
"You want me to eat salt?" Asked the flaming headed boy.

He was johnny Test. Test by name and more often than not by occupency. He was almost always used by his two genius sisters Susan and Marie as a human lab rat. Testing experimental invention's on him that they would never think to use on themselves.

Oddly enough he never had a problem with that. Since he always tended to need something from them which they always gave him provided he test stuff for them.

Today was no exception. He had just found out that a secret underground race of mole people planning an invasion of the surface world and for some reason it was up to him and his super talking dog Dukey and not the military to save the day. He knew his sister's had a giant drilling machine that could get them to the underground kingdom and his sisters were happy to lend him it.

Provided he do them a small favour.

"It's not salt." Said marie the one with the red curl's

"Theyre specially engineered 'mega hottie' flakes deisigned to bring out the maximum amount of hotness genetically possible for the body."

"Huh?" Said their as always clueless brother.

"Uh." Went Marie annoyed. "Just eat it and you'll turn into a hunk."

"Then if it work's we can use them to become mega hottie's ourselves so we can finally get *Sigh* Gil Nexdor." Said Mary dreamily.

*Sigh Gil." Thy said at the same time.

"So I eat the salt and youll give me the drilling machine so I can save the world from the mole people.." He was cut off as Susan butted in.

"Yeahsurewhatever." She said and gave him a look showing she wanted him to start the testing.

He looked at the salt shaker then shrugged. He picked it up and tipped it over his mouth.

'It even taste's like salt' He thought. Almost instantly he felt weird. Like a tingling all over. That tingling built up into a feeling like electricity and when it reached it's peak their was a blinding flash of light which caused his sister's and dog to look away briefly.

When they looked back. Their jaws were slack with awe. Dukey was the first to speak.

"Funny. I always' thought the word 'hunk' met a hot 'guy'." Said the dog sarcastically.

"Huh. What are..." Johnny stopped as he heard himself. That wasn't his voice. It was more like the voice of a teenage g.

He looked down.

'I don't remember those being there.' He now she thought.

Standing were Jonny Test once was, was now as the genius twin's put it a 'mega hottie'. The embodiment of the absolute maximum amount of 'hotness' the young test had in his d.n.a. Of course I think they were expecting a chiseled hunk instead of the curvacous teenage babe looking herself over curiously.

"Opp's." Went Mary. "I guess we were so busy making sure it would turn us into mega hottie's that we forgot to factor in male consumption.

"Okay" Johnny said in his new soprano voice. "I ate the salt now you have to give us the drill." She paused before speaking again. "And while your at it turn me back to normal. I'm still to young to even like girl's nevermind 'be ' a girl." She said while looking down at her now shorter and seemingly younger looking sister's.

"Oh Relax. This formula was supposed to last a minute so. Now we see it work's we can make a stronger batch." Said Mary smiling.

Jonny sighed and she smiled. "Oh that's a relief."

10 minutes later

"THIS IS SO NOT A RELIEF!!!" Said the still babeified Johnny Test.

Susan looked nervous. "I guess the effect's on a male subject are mmore profound than we thought."

"So I'm stuck like this FOREVER!!!" Screamed Johny as she waved her hand's around wildly.

"Relax Johnny." Said susan in a calming tone. "It's unlikly the effect's are permanent. And even if they are I'm pretty sure we can whip up an antidote."

"Wadaya mean 'pretty sure'?" Said the super dog with an eyebrow raised

"Don't you have a mole army to stop?" Said Susan eager to get off the subject.

Johnny moaned a little but conceeded. She and Dukey cimbed up into the earth digger before it burrowed right through the house and into the earth.

"You have no idea how to make an antidote do you." Mary said while still smiling.

"Not a clue." Said Susan while ciopying her sisters action's.

They hoped the moles kept their rother/sister down their for long enough

1333312111112.content:
"....so how was everyone's day?" Said Mr Test as he plated up big servings of the horrendous meatloaf he had the audacity to call food.

"Well I managed to get the office's tax returns donew in record time."Mrs Test said with glee. "I can practically smell that promotion."

"That's great dear." He turned to face his....son. "So how was your day.....Johnny."

"Oh well you know. Nothing special." Said Johnny sarcastically. "Boreing into th center of the earth, saving Porkbelly from a moleman invasion. Ther usual." She placed her finger on her lip in a mocking gesture. "Oh wait. I also got turned into a teenage girl and *heh *heh* here's thje good part. According to my genius sister the transformation IS PERMANENT!!!" The flame headed hottie slammed her fists on the table.

Mr and Mrs Tests heads whipped to face the red haired teins.

"Girl's is this true. Did you turn your brother into a teenage girl with no way to tun him back?!" Dad said as he burned a hole into them with his eyes.

The girl's shrank back.

"Well yeah, kinda." Mary said nervously.

"We didn't think that the 'Hottie flakes' would bond so completly with Johnnys D.N.A" Susan chipped in.

Mary picked up. "They arn't all bad new's. I were not complaining about 'our' result's."

It was true. Susan and Mary no longer looked like 'non hotties' as Johnny called them. Instead of the short curveless geek girl's, they now looked like the very definition of the word 'babe'. (right along with their brother who was hardly as positive about it.)

Like Johnny they were still dressed like normal. However they had to get larger sizes to fit over their new curves, and bra's that for once didn't have the word 'training' in front of them. Their eyesight had cleared up and their complexion's were now flawless.

In fact if Johnny tamed her locks and dyed them red you'd swear they were triplet's and not twins.

"Neither am I." Came a dumbstruck voice from next to Susan. The chubby genius known as 'Bling Bling Boy' (or Eugene to his mother).

Before the change he was already love struck with Susan. Now he was seriously considering opening up a church just to worship her.

"Give it a rest Eugene." The object of his affections shot him down again.

"*Sigh* Even your rejections with that voice sound di-vine" He continued staring at her blatantly.

"So anyway long story short. We can't actually change Johhny back. We can change ourselves back to normal if we wanted but effects on the male chromosome were to damaging. Johnny's pretty much stuck like this." Said Mary

"Well what are we gonna do know." Asked Mr Test while still glaring at the two model-esque girls. "Johnny can't just be a girl."

Johnny smiled "You tell em dad."

"Not without the proper paperwork at least." Quipped his Mom.

"MOM!" cried Johnny.

"What? You heard them Johnny. Your stuck like this. That mean's your not a little boy any more your a teenage girl. I wonder if we can get you into high school at this time of year?"

"HIGH SCHOOL! I'm barel making it elementary." Johnny jumped out of her seat.

Her mother shot back a look.

"I'm not going to be the only mother in town with a 16 year old still in the fourth grade. Your sister's will just have to tutor you to high school level."

The twins looked like they were going to protest but their mother continued. "You can consider it part of your punishment for destroying your brothers whole life."

The two sank down into their chairs. Johnny continued standing. Unbelieving what was happening.

"We'll also have to go down to city hall and get your record's changed. How do you feel about being Jonni Test?" She said.

"It's easy to remember 'and' it sounds the same." Said her father.

Johnny clenched her teeth and slammed her fist on the table. "My name is Jonny!"

Her mother stood up. "I will not be talked to that way young lady!"

"I'M A BOY!"

"Not anymore Johnny." Said Susan. "Trust us we did all we could."

"You only worked for a few hour's!"

"It took us an hour to find the cure for the common cold. This was barely marginaly harder." Said Mary.

"Look we don't like you being like this anymore than you do but there's nothing we can do. Your just going to have to live with it."

"LIVE WITH IT!" Jonny/Jonni hollered befor pointing to her profound chest "How do you expect me to live like this?!"

"That is it!" Said Ms Test in a tone that demanded slience. "You are going to your room and you are not to come down until tommorow to go to city hall.

"BUT..."

"THAT IS FINAL YOUNG LADY!!!"

Johnny/ Jonni cringed back slightly beofre relenting and trudging upstair's. Stomping all the way.

*SLAM*

Everyone was silent for a minute before Mr test spoke up.

"She's a teenage girl now alright."

13333121111121.content:
Jonni Test was wearing a mouth guard.

She was wearing a mouth guard to stop her from grinding her teeth.

She was grinding her teeth because she couldn't throw a childish temper tantrum.

She wanted to throw a childish temper tantrum because her mom was forcing her to model cloths for her new hot teenage girl body.

Lila Test was wearing a smile that could not be removed by a jack hammer. She gabbed away with the crew she had charged with giving her daughter a whole new, completely feminine wardrobe. Lapping up the duel praise and jealousy of Jonni's perfect figure, lavishing in the dozens of outfits both practical and cute she and the sales assistant had picked and those they had yet to decide on, and loving the sense of pride she felt that Jonni for once in her formally his life was standing still while cloths shopping.

“It's so nice to finally have a daughter to do these things with.” She said dreamily.

As it would turn out the formula only had an irreversible effect on Johhnys pre-pubescent male D.N.A, for them the effects vanished in less than 4 hours....just enough time for them to buy themselves whole new wardrobes, get to Gil's doorstep and almost knock before they suddenly found themselves swimming in outfits they could never fill on their own. They had went home for a refill but sadly they had already developed an immunity to it, reworking the flakes formula to bypass that would take another two months at least.

Susan and Mary were wearing mouth guards as well.

133331211111211.content:
Jonni bit down on the plastic shield at the portly woman’s compliment. Not the thing that someone who til recently was only concerned with skateboarding, video games and messing with his sisters inventions wanted to hear.

Yeah she knew that the girl in the surrounding mirrors was hot, the hottest thing she'd ever seen in fact. Just because Johnny didn't put girls in his top 5 priority’s didn't mean he couldn't tell a good looking one from Susan and Mary. The problem was that this total babe happened to be him she means her.

She hadn't really noticed until now because she was either angry or in battle or angry again but Jonni had only now realised how different her form truly was. On a minor note she several feet taller than Johnny had been but he had already dealt with changes to his height in the past

(The roof exploded when a titanic boy burst through the Test house, roaring like a wild beast with psychedelic rays firing from his eyes.)

No the problem Jonni noticeable now because...

“Chest out dear.” The lady with the tape said.

The flame headed blonde moaned in annoyance and pushed her chest out, causing her to bite her lip when everything started digging into her again.

“I keep telling you it's too tight!” She snapped.

Rather than retort the woman only smiled at her.

“My goodness! Not even done growing and that big already! Oh you must be holding the boys back was a 50 foot poll.”

Susan and Mary glared death at their 'older' sister, obviously thinking about one boy in particular the perky blonde/ redhead might steal from them.

She glanced down at the primary and prominent offenders that blocked the previously A to B view of her feet. These things messed with her balance something terrible. She'd been holding onto walls at home discretely because she kept tipping over. The shifting in her rear she could handle, even after the combination of an expanded posterior and Hartman class hips had caused a complete split in her favourite pants the first time she bent down. She just couldn't take the fact she had a much higher....and much 'larger' centre of gravity that kept shifting every time she moved.

She felt....them bounce free of the torture device when the seamstress removed it after taking down her....blouse. Quickly flinging on a new and ever frillier one with record speed and pulling the....blouse back up

She looked down at what her mother was making her wear. Her favourite shirt and t-shirt were laying across a chair over in the corner. Right now she was wearing a form fitting blue blouse the same tone as her shirt with sleeves that reached her elbows and a trim that stopped only just above her bellybutton. A black *shudder* skirt in a fashion like her mom's suit covered everything til just above the knees allowing some of her ever permanently hair free legs to show until they reached her high heeled feet.

She was gorgeous.

She hated it.

“Can we please by some gunky loaf around stuff now?! I'm hardly going to need this laying around watching tv.”

“Oh don't worry Joh Jonni. Just a few dozen more and we can go to your stores.” She said without blinking or sincerity. Telling Jonni her mother was rather enjoying playing dress up with her.

She moaned again and reached her her backside, shifting uncomfortably.

“Don't fidget please.”

“Can't help it. It keeps...ya know.”

“Ladies wait til they're in private dear. Your not a boy.”

Those last four words drove into the buxom young lass like stakes
133331211111211.title: Beauty Bemoans Binding Brassieres

choices: Back home, Jonni laments while her sisters scheme
1333312111112111.content:
Finally after another two hours her mother had finally decided she had enough clothes to last her lifetime and they could leave. Jonni would have been delighted if she had not been immediately dragged into a body care store were they loaded up on acne potions and soft skin lotions and face masks and scrubs and make up.

She had barely had the stuff paid for before she found herself tied to a salon chair and a chatty woman blowing bubbles blurred her hands around Jonni's flaming locks. Causing only the front parts to remain aloft while the rest of the once proud head of hair that moved in the wind like real living fire was flowing down to just past her shoulders.

Then, finally after three hours of tortuously girly shopping Lila deemed that her beautiful girl could go to whatever stores she wanted.

She sagged in relief. “Finally! All this girl stuff you made me do is so exhausting.”

“Least...you aren’t...carrying...it.” Mary gasped out.

The two younger though technically older Test sisters had been relegated to bag duty, given that Jonni was far too attractive to be seen carrying her own purchases the two plain red heads were given the task since their father was nowhere to be seen.

Jonni chuckled cruelly “OK maybe this isn't so bad.” She said remembering all the times Johnny was left holding the bags.

She knew were she wanted to head. She really didn't want to try boarding until she got the whole balance thing down, that left...

“Video games WooHoo!” She cheered and ran to her favourite game shop. Totally ignorant of how the extra leg movement from the run tightened the skirt she was wearing against her backside which caused one unlucky/happy blader to skate straight into a wall.


The store owner, a rotund man guy the name of Lenny was quite contrary to stereotype actually doing some work behind the counter, an ever present smile on his face as he happily spoke with his customers.

Lenny tried his very best not to act like the stereotype he came across as. His store was clean and organised. He treated his customers like people not annoyances. His appearance was both casual enough to be approachable but had an air of professionalism. All in all he was not your average private game store owner.

However even someone as determined to break the stereotype as he was not prepared for was a smoking hot supermodel busting through the door....or any other of the guys in the store were for that matter.

Jonni grinned from ear to ear and blurred down the aisles, passing as little more than a gust of wind. Grabbing games even as one unlucky souls fingers had brushed against the box. Taking her choices the flaming headed blonde zoomed towards the cash desk, bumped past several love struck adolescents and dumped the boxes on the table.

“All these to go my man! I've got a LOT of anger to work off.”

“I uh ehhh. C-Can....” His glasses fogged over while he stammered his way through words he had forgotten how to speak.

“Hellooooo.” She waved a smallish hands in front of his face. “Jonni wanna buy these HEY!” She was pushed aside by her own mother who took over the purchase.

“Hi I'm her mom so let me get those for her.”

“S-S-sure.” He gasped out now no longer under the threat of a pretty girl. He started scanning the games when he noticed something weird. Call of honour: Future warfare, Deity of War 3, Grand Theft Moto 5, Older scrolls: Skyedge.

Girls that came in here, albeit most younger and the older ones being no wear near as gorgeous or well endowed always bought JRPG'S, dancing or music games. Yet besides older scrolls this one picked up every game no other would go within a country mile of.

“That is the coolest girl I've ever seen.” A scratchy voiced almost teen said behind Lila while (like every other guy in store) staring at Jonni who had taken to actually looking at the other games. Lenny breathed in relief that he wasn't the one to say that.

He rang up the games and came up with the total. “That will be 54.99”

Lila groaned a little internally but decided that the ex-boy needed this at least. She reached to put her card in the machine when she noticed the price tags on the boxes and did the maths. “Wait why only that when it should come to...”

“Just pay what I said please.” He said strained.

“But why...”

“No one will buy anything if she doesn't leave.” He said, eyes flickering to the aforementioned girl while straining to stay on Lila. Who only then noticed that every other pair of eyes in the room was focused on the girl....well parts of her anyway.

“Ahhh.” She said evenly, quietly picking up her purchases and grabbing her eldest/youngest with a squeak of complaint. Susan and Mary had just made it inside when they were shoved out again. Before they left Lila turned to Jonni.

“Jonni could you do me a teensy favour for getting these for you?”

She would have argued that paying back for something she was getting as compensation didn't make sense but she relented in fear her mother would take away the games. “Fine what?”

“I want you to look back in their, smile, and wink.”

“Say what?”

“Look back in the store. Smile and wink.”

“But wh...”

“Please.”

It was a weird thing to ask but little to do so she relented. Looking back into the store were many a pair of eyes was still on her Jonni smiled brilliantly and winked at no one.

Someone yelled when he dropped a console on his foot.

The bottom of a slurpie cup fell off when its holders arm went slack, he continued sucking on the straw like nothing had happened.

A cardboard display was knocked over when a 14 year old with bad acme developed jelly legs and fell into it.

Lenny held his gut from the cash registers drawer smacking into it.

Jonni shrugged and left the shop, ignorantly leaving a room full of love struck males in her wake as she did.

Dukey watched amazed at the warrior on screen tearing through hordes of bandits with realistically gorey ease. Then turned to his controller who was watching the actions not with the salivating excitement of a 11 year old boy being allowed to play an ultra violent game, but of a moody teenage girl too distracted by her own thoughts to pay attention to award winning mayhem.

She sat thier on the floor leaning against the foot of her bed. A pair of pyjama shorts (they used to be full length bottoms) loosely tied and being held up snugly by her behind and a puke green tank top which stretched across her chest enough that much of the junk food she was hap hazardly munching on disipeared into a place no man dareth go.

"Ya know two days ago you would have sold your kidney to play Sky edge."

"Would have if the 'doctor' hadn't 'required' a consent from my parents." She tilted the controller and killed 'another' dragon "For nigh unstoppable dragons they sure are easily to kill with third hand weaponry." She murmured.

"I'm just saying that you were obsessed with it. I've seen you with games you want Joh...nie..." Man that felt weird. "...But this isn't how you normally act."

Dukey spat out his soda "JUST A GAME! Johnny..."

"Jonnie." She corrected.

"WHATEVER!" He got up and stood on the bed in leu of a soap box. "Last game you got you spent the whole weekend with your eyes pressing against the TV. Your sisters had to tranq you to go to sleep and tie you down like that Chuck Jones Cartoon about force feeding pigs to get you to eat! This isn't the Johnny Test I know! The Johnny Test I know is the hyperactive, scheming embodiment of a boy! He wears his cloths til they disintegrate and had to be carted around like Hannibal Lecter to get new ones. He's a thoughtless, destructive, manipulative genius, the best friend I've ever had and the embodiment of fun!"

"While all I've seen you do is mope and whine about the house, even after your mom caved and got you every, and I do mean 'every' thing you wanted that you used to have to beg for without complaint yet still aren't happy. You smell of soeap and exspensive shampoo, you spent an hour in the bathroom this morning getting ready to go nowhere. This room is spotless because you have the energy of a sloth. You threw out all the red gush. Your not fighting this! Your talking like a girl, your acting like a girl, and judging from the way your hips swing like a pendulum...."

She went a little pink.

"...Your moving like a girl! The Johnny Test I know....

"Jonnie." She corrected again.

"....MOST CERTAINLY WOULDN'T JUST LET HIMSELF BE CALLED JONNI!!!"

"WELL I'M NOT JOHNNY TEST ANYMORE AM I !?!" She threw the remote on the floor and glared at her dog, who matched her until he saw the pinpricks of tears in her eyes. Crying, yet another thing Johnny never did (without faking) Her attempt to look angry and menacing only making her look adorable.

"I'm not Johnny Test anymore am I?! I'm not a little boy anymore am I?! This change is 100% permanent remember? Thanks to my sisters I lost nearly all of the best years of my life! I'll never be eleven again! I'll never be Johnny Test again!"

She panted and straightened herself up. Going to reach up and fix her hair like her Mom showed her but stopped herself letting it go back to it's natural gravity defying flame look.

"Every thing is different now. The dorks said that even my brain is wired like a girls." She looked down. "They said the longer I'm like this the more I'm gonna be a regular girl. All that sugar energy I had before is gone and the parts of me that said ignoring warnings and doing dangerous stuff is fun aren't as loud anymore. The way scariest thing though the longer I'm like it feels less and less weird and more normal. Like someones dumping in all the 'growing up' teens are supposed to do in the 5 years I missed."

She sighed deeply "The girls said it themselves, I'm Jonni for good. If I think about it all I was or could have been I'm gonna end up depressing myself. And I can't pretend like nothings different." She held up her impressive chest and letting them drop for emphasis. "So right now its all about trying to keep things as normal as I can, and deal with the new stuff as it comes instead of sweating it. Otherwise I'll never get anything done."

Dukey looked at his old pal for a while before answering. "Wow, that's surprisingly mature of you...Jonni."

"Like I said it's like all the stuff I missed is coming at the same time. I zoomed right past the 'awkward' part of the teenage years and into the 'young adult' which believe it or not Mom and Dad are actually helping, they're treating me like more of a grown up than Susan or Mary. I heard them talking about driving lessons the other day and my own house keys." She picked the controller again.

"Don't you already know how to drive?"

"Please. A space ship, motorboat, mechanical sea monster, moon buggy, plane and high tech go cart....and an actual car are two different things dog." She said in a 'for sure' manner.

"O...k....so they either they're trying to make you feel good about your situation...or more realistically bribe you into staying a more mature and responsible girl so you won't 'want' to turn back into the 11 year old who destroys the town on a daily basis should a cure ever turn up."

"Dunno. Probably the latter." She mumbled before handing the dog another controller. "Now play dog. The Drake Child needs someone to carry his burdens."

=========================

Meanwhile deep in the lab to much more intelligent but less physically (and as of now, perhaps even mentally) mature tweenage girls worked feverishly over beakers of bubbling chemicals.

"Testing of variation 57 is will be ready in 10, 9, 8,."

The girls observed a hamster in its cage. It's fur unnaturally silky and its eyes more adorable than even a normal hamster.

"7, 6..."

The animal shuddered and morphed. Shrinking in size Its fur lost its shine and it's eyes no longer lighting up the room.

"AAGGHH!" Susan screamed and snapped the board over her knee.

Mary jotted the results down. "Original female pre-pubescent subject reverts to original state after 45 minutes and 27 seconds. Approximatly 5 seconds faster than with flake variation 56. And approximetly 7 minutes and 2 seconds quicker than in fully grown adult subject of same gender. As well as 4 minutes and 13 seconds quicker than adult male subject"

" All while The non fully grown male subject once again remains altered." Mary growled at another Hamster in a nearby cage. It's fur still shiny and its eyes deep as oceon's of huggability.

"At our current rate of progress we'll have working hottie flakes that work permanently on us iiiiiiiiiiin negative three hundred years." Mary said annoyed.

"We don't have three hundred years ago. We don't have even a week before GIL SEES OUR LITTLE BROTHER!!!"

"Older Sister." Mary corrected with a bitter taste in her mouth.

"Whatever. The second Gil see's Jonni we might as well pack up the lab and open a froghurt shop." She snarled. "I refuse to lose *SIGH* Gil Nexdor to a girl who still chews like a chipmunk and laughs at fart jokes just because she finds it hard to breath in a D-cup bra!"

"Double D." Her sister corrected again.

"WHATEVER!!!" She screamed and swept her arms across the table throwing chemical to the floor causing a toxic mixture to form. "IT'S NOT FAIR!!! WERE SUPPOSED TO HAVE GIL FAWNING OVER 'US' BY NOW!!!! WERE SUPPOSED TO BE MEGA HOTTIES THAT MAKES HELEN OF TROY LOOK UGLY!!! NOT 'JONNI' TESTS NERDY SERVENT SISTERS!!!"

Mary gasped and ran to the wall hitting the 'emergency clean up' button' which caused several robots to rush out of their storage room and scrub up to spill at the sub atomic level.

"Careful." The more stylishly haired twin warned. "Those were mutagens remember? The last thing we want is getting a of bunch of flesh bending toxins in our systems right."

"Right." Susan rolled her eyes and went to get more chemicals for variation 58. Snorting a little as she did so when something irritated her nose.
