13413121222121221.content:
Hercules circled his creation with a critical eye. Looking up and down the barely humanoid claay form of what was supposed to be his dream girl, but due to not yet downing anything more complex than bowls and pots in class at the moment she wouldn't give one of Hades living skeletons the proverbial boner.

"Don't know what I was thinking when I did this. Guess it's true sometimes you need a second opinion right." He asked himself....who was standing tweo feet away from him admiring his masterpiece with Icarus.

It had been all two easy for Hercules to walk back through time once he'd awakened his infinite powers. Time was like a moving wall you could never move by that ever pushed you foward, for Hercules the wall didn't just reverse it formed an archway for him to step through comfertably.

With all at his disposal he could do whatever he wanted, have anything he wanted, whoever he wanted......except.

He could totally have made her love him again. Heck he could have turned the female population of Greece into a harem of vivacious vixens with beauty that surpassed even the love goddess herself, but it wasn't worth it. He might have been a hormonal teenage boy with the power to literally 'get all the girls' but the hero inside him nagged at him telling him something over and over that prevented him from acting like Adonis.

'Earn it.'

Now she'd made it clear she wasn't interested in him after the whole 'crazy about me' debaucle so a second chance was out of it.

If so then he'd just have to make a better first impression.

He watched Aphrodite arrive and shape the sculture with her own power, turning it from a lump two few milleenia early to be called 'modern' instead of 'ugly' and into a vision of feminine beauty. Of course he couldn't help but assist in the changes. The pink skinned blonde deity raised an eyebrow slightly when the statues bust was noticably curvier than she intended when the embarressed boy asked, the chest easily bigger than she'd thought it would be or the hips so wide.

Hercules grimanced when his past suplicate just said to make the girl crazy about him. Aphrodite rolled her eyes but complied and breath life into her. Giving birth to Hercules's perfect girl.

Time slowed down as Galatea opened her eyes for the first time, freezing before she could take in the world around her. The unfrozen version of the son of Zeus floated up behind the pedastal she was on brushing some of her chocolate brown and velvet soft hair from her ear and whispered into it like an old lover.

"I lost the chance at perfection once and I 'm not losing you again so listen carefully." He took her frozen hand, still cold as clay under his touch. "You are flesh and blood."

The porcelian skin under his hand changed as she became more than a semblance of life. The coolness of her skin faded to be replaced by the warmth of a limb with blood pumping through it, he felt her fingers ill with bone and muscle where there had only been painted earth. He even felt the warmth from her face as his intoxicating voice sent a spark of pleasure racing down her spine despite being frozen in place.

"Your not crazy about Hercules. He is not the end all and be all of your existance. You have a life, you have free will. You have a choice." He whispered to her seductivly.

He speed up time around her and only her just enough to feel her reaction to him and could immediatly see the tell tale signs of arousal. Heightened breath, a spreading blush.

"Galatea you may not be crazy about him but you can't say you don't have feeling for him. He's a great guy and did just have you brought to life. You could definetly see yourself going out with him, loving him, marrying and raising a family with him."

A warm smile spread across her face ever so slowly. The words forming images of just as the almighty Hercules described.

"You will give him a chance to prove that he's a man worthy of his dream woman. And if he isn't...we'll it's his lose....."

She nodded slowly.

"Now leap of this stand and give him a kiss so strong he won't think twice about toppling the gods themselves to prove himself to you."

She made to leap but froze back into her original position when he took his hand from her. Touching the ground again he moved behind his weaker past self and whispered into his ear with far less seductive tact.

"LOVE HER! Prove yourself to this woman. Prove that you deserve the girl of your dreams. She's the best thing that could ever happen to you so don't blow it!"

His doubles expression slowly morphed from obvious lust to deeper adoration for the vison lunging as slowly as a slug at him.

Almighty Herc smirked and backed away before letting time resume. Enjoying the scene as himself as Galatea knocked him onto his back and gave him the deepest and most senous kiss he'd ever remember having. Calling it a present for having her brought to life.

Ultimate Herc turned around and walked back through the veils of time to the present day. Eager to see how this change effected his future

Aphrodite smirked from seat on the lap of her love. Idly drawing circles on his chest with her finger while the boy leaned back, his eyes half open and a dopey grin on his lips. His sight registering only her, his nose filled with the scent of lilacs and roses and his mind full of hearts and pink fog, none of which were caused by magic either mortal or divine. If someone looked at the two you'd be hard to guess who was controlling who. Hercules may have gained the unwavering love of the most beautiful goddess on olympus, but she had gained the unthinking love of the most powerful being in existance who was quite willing to rip the universe to pieces and stict it back together into any shape she wanted.

A power she was willing to take advantage of.

A power she 'had' taken advantage of.

The seat Hercules sat upon wasn't just a seat. It was a throne that the people had constructed for him to fit into his city sized palace. They needed a place to rule the now united Greece from after all. So much easier for her to do her job when she didn't have to remember what culture sacrifices what or what passes for divine miracles or apocyliptic signs since they all had the same culture and worsipped the same two beings.


She sighed contentedly and lay her head on his shoulder as a royal messanger entered the throne room. Bowing at the base of the hundred steps that raised the all powerful couple above all others.

"My king." He said in a deep barintone voice that sent shivers up and down the blonde deitys spine, making her glad she had Hercules give it to every man in Greece. "I bring word from the battle at the Spartan borders."

"This had 'better' be good news" She said impatiently. Sitting up and reluctantly taking her hand away from her kings chest and putting it on her hip. Her eyes narrowed promising punishment.

The messenger gulped. "They are.....pushing us back my liege. Your armys are not enough to enter the war gods land."

That didn't sit to well with the love goddess "Ares!" She growled. She turned back to the omnipotent teen, still in a dreamy gaze.

"Hercules." She said in a pitiful voice, her eyes brimming with crocodile tears.

"Whasthmttr? (Whats the matter?)" He sounded worried, the kind of worried that you get at 3am when you've got school in the morning and your trying to finish a paper your not even half way done writing.

"Ares won't let our love into Sparta." She pressed herself against him, he moaned predictably while she whispered in a seductive low voice into his ear. "Our armies need for power, much, much more power."

"Mrpwr. (More power)" He whispered. His eyes glowed for a moment and with power beyond any gods his loves wish became reality.

----------------------

At the borders of Sparta, soldiers battling the massivly muscled warriors suddenly felt a great warmth wash over them, and before the eys of the warriors born and breed the smaller men grew to massive proportions. Each and every man on the field a hulking 15 foot giant with a muscular build rivaling Atlas, theyre armour as thick as a wall as stone and their swords now massive sabres as wide as an oak trees and as sharp as a crack of lightning.

The Spatrans looked up, and up at the now hulking army. One particular soldier summing up his situation rather nicely.

"Crap."

-----------------------

Aphrodite was pleased as she saw the battle turn to her lopves favour, now it was only a matter of time before Sparta was theirs.

"Good job sweety." She said while planting light kisses across his cheek while twirling his hair in her fingers. "And thanks for the puppy...." The eternally infatile canine on her own lap powerless as she scratched behind it's ears. "...Hopefully she'll be a better pet than he was a messenger."

The girl stared straight ahead. Never touching her dinner, talking to her parents, and barely remembering to breath. Not that the two happy go lucky Greeks really minded, just so long as their far seeing princess wasn't all moppy.

What they didn't realise was that she wasn't just staying still for no reason. Right now her entire focus was being directed into one point, and could not afford to drop her guard one iota.

"Cassandra dear...."

One slip up could cause her to fall into madness.

"Honey, Cassy sweey...."

The slightest faulter and she'd fall into a pit so deep she'd never escape.

"Cassy.....Cassandra!"

"She spared what little brain power she wasn't concentrating ont her task to ponder how she would sleep toni.....

"CASSANDRA!!!" Her mother yelled in a rare loss of compusure and shook her daughter shoulder and breaking her concentration.

"What is it moooooooo........!!!" By the time she realised she'd let her guard down it was to late, and by the swirling green of her eyes her parents could tell she was having a vision.

Although they didn't realise it was less 'having' and more 'being dragged into one'.

==================
Cassandra's vison
==================

The woman one the massive silk laden bed was stunning beyond belief. As though the goddess of love had a long lost mortal twin. She was naked bar the opulant sheets she was just barely holding over her near godly figure, her irresistable eyes drawn to the rooms entrance as an adonis that made Adonis look like Icarus walked in. She drank every inch of this perfect specimen in from the tips of his toes to a face even an amazon would turn to jelly upon seeing.

She grew warmer and warmer, her breath growing more lustful as this perfect man reached the bed and started crawling up it. She lowered herself down onto it and nearly moaned when she felt the man who she knew was her husband crawling up her her sides, pinning her in place until his face was level with her own. Her long beautiful purple hair lay in all directions framing her heart shaped face adorably.

They gazed adoringly into each others eyes for who knows how long before she reached up with perfect hands and drew his head in for a love filled kiss.

"Ah...*hufff* Hercules. I love you so much" She started to moan as hi hands were no longer just a her sides but tracing them, slowly removing the covers.

"I love you two Cassandra." He said with full sincerity before flinging the cover from the bed and......

=================================

.....Picking up a large fruit dessert and hitting herself in the face with it.

Her parents stared for a moment before her father spoke up. "You know Cassy in this house we have dinner first, then dessert."

The girl didn't respond to the question. Instead she stood up and with a quite 'I'm going to my room' she hurried off.

The two stared at the doorway for a second before sighing.

Oracles.

=================================

Casandra rubbed her temples in sheer frustration. None of this made any sense.

Every day she had the same vision. Each and every time she had a vison it was always to do with this. They were dating, they were married, they were in love. She'd seen this 'other' version of herself being won over by this godlike being as he woe'd her in every way possible. She'd seen him take her on dozens of dates and commit hundreds of unbelievably romantic acts which left the normally dark girl feeling as light as a feather. However when she thought about them she knew it didn't make any sense.

She wasn't in love with Hercules.

Hercules wasn't in love with her.

She had no intention of marrying him.

He had no intention of marrying her

Hercules while strong was scrawny and underdeveloped. Not some physcially perfect he-man.

She most certainly did not look like a mortal verson of Aphrodite with a better figure

All of these things were true and self evident.....but so was something else.

"My visions are never wrong." She said in grim defeat.

Which meant in what looked o be the near future given how young the two in her vision looked she would become fantastically hot, and she and Hercules would marry and be extremlu happy.

She would have contemplated more.......but her eyes began to swirl and once more she fell into a trance. She fell back into her bed and her body began to sleep while she was fed tales of the future. This time of her in a spacious country mansion, reading to an adorable infant with blue eyes and purple hair while her husband played with their other children.

================

Not that far from the home.....right outside it in fact Hercules watched the girl 'dream', then with a twitch of his fingers sent a tiny spark racing towards her were a light blue form enveloped her form and then vanished, leaving behind nothing more than a tiny fraction of a percent of growth on the girls figure. Her hips not even marginally wider and her bust only a 20th on a centimetre bigger.

"She'll grow into it." He muttered before lowering himself away from the window and with speed beyond flight was back on Phils island without the merest hint of detection.

He didn't understand quite why he'd decided he wanted Cassandra to be his future wife, or why he felt the need to make the girl look like the inside on an adult scroll (or himself if you could tell he was alightly more muscular than before.) but he guessed that whoever granted him these above god-like powers was responsible. .

He shrugged. It wasn't like he was forcing it upon her. The visions would only come true if she believed she couldn't change her fate, and he'd undo the babeificaion if she made attempts to undo ir stop it.......for now though.

The air shimmered in front of him for a second as he lay down and tarted to watch the girls dreams, continuing where it had been left of before she'd snapped out of it with that pie t the face.

a week of thinking if she even should fight this future.

Hercules drummed his fingers on the table. Chin in his other hand with a bored expression on his face as he stared at the girl in front of him.

"So." He said in the tone that's generally reserved for talking about the weather. "You feeling alright Cassandra?"

"Yeah."

"You sure? Your a lot figitier than normal."

"I have an itch."

"That's probably from the fur's."

Greece was not known for being a particularly cold part of the world. Especially during the height of summer, and especially especially in the middle of the afternoon when Apollo had the sun hanging directly overhead. So not only would it be odd for someone to wrap themselves in enough animal furs to hide everything from their soles to their scalp from view, it would also be extremely uncomfortable.

The all powerful demi god watched another pitcher of ice water disipear into wear the oracle in trainings mouth would be. Several empty ones scattered around her.

"I have a cold. I'm dehydrated." Was her unusually swift reply.

"Once again that's probably from the furs. I think your hands leaving more sweat on......did you do something to your fingers?"

Her hands shot back into the furs. Hiding them from the demi gods view. Just like the rest of her was.

Not that he needed to see. Hercules knew exactly what was happening under those skins and he couldn't say he wasn't pleased with the results. While it was far to soon to say the oracle perspiring to death in front of him was a beauty beyond Aphrodite or even Helen yet, she would definetly get a second glance when she walked down the street. Her figure was already noticabley fuller than it had been. Her face was no longer as long and had filled out more along with her lips. Her hair was growing faster than normal and had already started to develop a curl that would one day transform itself into the pinnacle of style and lustrous perfection that girls from all over Greece would try to copy.

Really he had half expected her to just give in and jump into his arms by now. By now besides the occasional vision of diaster Cassandra should have been seeing visions of how happy they'd be together almost constantly. This girl had insane willpower.

Still it was only a matter of time.

"H...Hercules. I need....need..." Said the beautifying girl, her voice cracking a little.

'There we go.' "Need what Cass?" He asked, having to use his powers to keep from giving anything anyway.

"Need...your help."

"Ah Say no more Cassandra. As a hero in......"

"I need a ride to see the Oracle of Delphi."

"...It is my duty to you want to do what?"

She walked towards their usual lunch table. Her cheeks burned when she knew boys were staring at her backside, which had been steadily growing larger and fuller for the past seven days, shift from side to side in an enticing manner she could not stop moving in.

It certainly wasn't the fastest transformation in the history of ever but it was steady and quite unstoppable. She'd went to every temple, mystic, soothsayer and more experienced oracle she could, but they all said the exact same thing, that she was going to become the most beautiful woman in tall of history. THat got her withering looks from a few of the seers who'd lost their looks for their powers. Why couldn't she be ugly or crippled like the rest of them?

She went to healers, alchemists and even doctor Hypocrites. However none of them could stop her cheeks from getting fuller, her legs longer or her bust bigger. She wasn't the most attractive girl in the world...yet, but given what she saw in her visions that was only a matter of time.

She found the table quickly. The area oddly empty of others, even Icarus who she was amazed hadn't been seen for the same amount of time as she'd been changing. The twerp probably had something to do with this, like a love potion that got her to feel for the wrong person.

No the only person she could actually see was Hercules.

She sighed involentarily, licking her lips without thinking.

"Hey Hercules." She called to him while walking towards the table.

He turned round, her mouth went dry.

Just like her the red head was undergoing his own change. His toga was tighter since new muscle mass stretched the material further, his arms were thicker and no longer stick like. His dreamy eyes deeper and she could feel his lips draw her....NO!

'I am NOT turning into some vapid BIMBO!'

"Hey Cassy." He greeted, and she noted his voice was a touch deeper and more manly "You seen Icarus around anywhere? I haven't seen him all day."

'The creep is probably watching from afar.' She thought bitterly. Sitting down she took a deep breath "Hercules. I....I need to talk to you about something."

"Sure Cassy. You can tell me anything." He smiled and moved closer to her. Heat started to rise from her but she suppressed it.

"Well...that is...I've sort of been getting these visions...."

"Uh, huh." She motioned for her to go on, even though she was feeling increasingly more agitated.

"Well. It's sort of about you....and me." She whispered the last part.

"Right I understand!"

"You do?" at was a relief.

"Yeah. It's some monster coming to get you for your powers and you need me to stop it!"

Knew it couldn't be easy "No Hercules I..."

"Don't worry Cassandra. With the hero son of Zeus protecting you nothing bad is going to happen to you." He pushed his chest out more and took her by the hand. Her heart felt like butterflies.

"N-no Hercules I don't." Whatever she wanted to say died on her lips from what he did next. Caught in his own heroic fantasy Hercules pulled her closer to him, draping her over his arm while holding her protectively to his iron hard chest.

"Though monsters and demons and the whims of the gods themselves nothing will stand in the way of keeping you safe!"

This was it. Her nerves were shot. She couldn't form a sentence to save herself, and the heat that was building up inside her had all but exploded. "Ah to Hades with it." She said flatly before reaching up to his face.

"Through fire and thunder and...Cassy what are you MMPH!" He would have kept going but the plumping feminine lips sealed over his own prevented that.

Cassandra circled her arms around the back of Hercules head to deepen their intimacy. The boy only took a few second to realise what was going on before lowering his arms to the base of her back and pulling her even closer to him. He sat on on the table were she pulled him down on top of it. Never stopping their make out session at all.

Cassandra was lost in a haze of pure delight. Her guard lower than it had ever been but the visions did not come, they left her to feel consumed the the explosion of pleasurable heat that came the second she touched her lips to his.

Hercules gazed down at the girl who couldn't meet his gaze since either eyes were rolled back into her skull and mentally smiled. She lasted longer than he thought she would. Slowly he lowerd his hands down onto her rear where he could definetely feel it growing beneath his palms

She didn't know what it was. Every time her thoughts strayed they became about him. Every time her eys would wonder in boredom they'd stick to him.

The other day she'd accidently bumped into him and she could swear it was only years of practice being the most popular girl in school that stopped her from blushing and stammering like a tween with a crush.

It had started with her dreams about a month ago. Gradually she'd found Hercules invading her nght time fantasies more and more. After a month of increasingly intense dreams of Hercules on the other hand.....

Oh Hera he was looking at her.

"Mr Hercules. Do you think you could stop staring at girls for a moment to write down the answer on the black board?"

"Huh sure." He said and got up. His every movement followed by a certain blonde.

She imagined him getting up, not to walk over the the board but to her. Of him sweeping her up in his godly endowed muscles and pressing her chest into his perfect pecs and kissing her deeply enough that her toes curled. Then he'd lowered her onto her desk, reaching under her dress and....

"Helen. Your staring again." Her freind whispered.

"Right." She straightened up and stopped staring....but that didn't mean she stopped looking.

Up at the boar Hercules smiled.

============
A month ago
============

The nigh all powerful teenager dusted off his hands as he stood outside Helens family house. A dust similiar to the stuff Morpheus would spread over the sleeping to induce dreams falling from his mitts.

"Take one hottest girl in school. Add enough dream dust for her to dream of a certain son of Zeus romantically all night, every night.Slowly add supreme powers til is strong enough to effect her while awake. Bake for about a month or until the girl can't tell dreams from reality and either tries asking you to be her boyfriend....or tries dragging you somewhere private."

He didn't put much stock in the last part, but that wasn't really that big a deal.

True he could have just used his beyond divine powers to surcumvent Cupids powers and 'made' her love him. His inner hero though took over and wouldn't let him just take the easy way to get what he wants.....cheating a little.

"Hey nobody's 'making' her act on those dreams. Now that just leaves the voting or the prom king..." He reasoned before sending himself back home, looking foward the the days and weeks ahead.

1341312122212122222212.content:
Helen gave her friend a small smile. It would be bigger, but she was afraid that if she flashed her pearly whites someone might see that she'd been grinding them into dust.

The dreams came harder and faster as time went on. The visions became stronger as time went on. Images of doing increasingly more romantic and.......'arousing' things with Hercules assaulted so frequently that it was starting to give her waking dreams. She saw him everywhere. Like someone had tattoed an image on the inside of her eyelids like it was straight out of a top shelf scroll.

Dreams that 'weren't' of the son of candlelit dinners or Pegasus rides under the stars or tearing off each o.......dreams that weren't of that were of a future were they were happily married with a family. Dreams of a full life well lived. Of watching her handsome boys and beautiful girls grow up to be artists and philoshphers, heros and heroines and royalty! She could feel all the joy and pride she had from the dream as clearly as if she'd done i in real life. At first she thought it was just her mind telling her she was crushing on the half god, now she suspected she was some sort or oracle. Though any oracle she asked dismissed that since 'real' oracles don't just she 'good' things and don't only see their 'own' timeline. They dismissed her as just a 'teen girl with an obsessive crush' and turned her away without even bothering to see if this 'fututre' had any merit.

It had been a week since then and her nerves were frayed to a point. Her breath was ragged, she'd inspired Hypocrites to invent dentistry and try as she might to suppress it she was .................really, really horny.

Like seriousy...................yeah.

Still she managed to carry on. Barely. Her willpower was holding on my a thread and held down only by the fact she had been avoiding Hercules all this time. Making sure to that he wasn't even in the same area as her or at their closest on the other side of the hall and surrounded by at least half a dozen friends to act as a barrier. Fearing just one encounter with the demi-hun urk, demi-god would put her over the edge. Anything at all.

Then it happened.

She'd been running late for History. She'd dropped her scrolls and had sent the friends she'd been walking with ahead of her. The stern Mr Herodotus would be more forgiving if only she turned up late after all. Leaving her all by her lonesome in the emptying halls.

He came running around the corner, like her being afraid he'd be late for class and...

He bumped into her.

He stumbled for a step and turned around.

"......" He apologized.

Or at least thats what she thought he did. She didn't actually hear what ever it was he said. The snaping of her last restraint was too loud.

He never finished the sentence before she'd jumped him. A flying tackle that ended up with the hottest girl in school's face attached to his like a limpet while her legs wrapped around his abs refusing to let go. Unable to remove her and his more sensible brain funtions halting for the moment Hercules stumbled into a nearby janitors closet with the girl still attached. It was fortunate this tiny room was here or Helen might have been desperate enough to make this Disney adaptation more like classic myth.

Pulling one hand free for a moment she reached up and pulled a single pin from her tighly styled hair. Letting it fall down and a wave of brilliant blonde spill across her back. Practically covering the couple in a golden sheet as Helen of troy claimed the lips of the demi gods over and over and over. Each kiss more hungry and passionate than the last. Her perfect legs wrapping around his middle as slim fingers pulled his face as tightly against hers as possible.

"Marry me." She said between kisses.

"Sorry?" He said with the typical cracking voice of a gangly teenage boy who had the prettiest girl in school trying to suck his tonsils out.

"Marry me!" She kissed him harder. He could feel her robes starting to slip as she pushed herself against him like a cat. No, like a lion in heat. Her honey locks whipping around. "Marry me! Love me! Kiss me! Touch me! Fill me with our kids! F**KING F**K ME!"

Yeah he wasn't really expecting her to act on those visions so fast or so hard. Not really ready for it either. So despite the frantic lips smacking against his own or the frenzied hands running the gambit between trying to find somewhere to latch onto and where to pull open his toga he was actually far to nervous to feel what other men would be feeling right now..

"Helen I'm flattered but don't you think you're going to fast? I mean shouldn't we at least date fiMMPHH!!!" He was of course silenced by a pair of lips pushing hard enough against his own to cut them against his teeth. Seems like his little stunt worked too well.

"NO! NO DATING! NO WAITING! I NEED YOU NOW! RIGHT NOW!" He gasped when when she tried reaching under his clothes, forcing him to grip the bottom of his modesty only for her to use that opening to shot up and tear the straps over his shoulder leaving him bare chested. He groaned deeply as he felt her fingers draw over his muscles and circle around his man-nipples.

"I can't stop thinking about you! Your in my every dream, my every waking fantasy. Now I can't even blink without seeing us together. I see us being together like it's out of the most romantic fables. Spending each day pushing oue love for each other to new heights. And each night rutting like filthy animals!"

It was weird to hear the sweetest and most polite girl in school speak like this. If Tempest spoke like this it'd be hot. Kind of off putting from the blonde.

"I've seen visions of us married. Married! Can you picture it? Because I've had the image burned into my mind for weeks! Wed in the temple of Zeus. Your father performing the ceremony himself with all the gods of Olympus as guests. We'll live in a house bigger than any palace were we will never want for anything. We'll have scores of servants, and maids, and cooks enough to feed a village. Great pools and huge garden for our kids to play in!" She tears up a little between now gentle kisses and looks up into his eyes with unparalleled affection.

"Our kids Hercules. Our beautiful litle girls and handsome little men. I can remember all of their names and faces well enough I could paint them. Their likes and dislikes. Hopes and dreams, and-and-and how much they love each other and us! Their mommy and daddy." She pulled herself as tight as possible to the beyond godly demi-god. Pushing her bosom hard enough into his chest that he could feel every inch of the inviting flesh through the loosening fabric, and her smooth bare legs close tighter around his middle.

"They're waiting Hercules. Waiting to be born. For us to bring them into the world. Their mother and father."

She kissed him again. Despite the sheer difference in strength Hercules felt the power in his legs give out and Helen pushing him up against the wall. Her kiss was no longer starving and desperate but hungry and gentle. His nerves only grew as she guided his hands to rest on her leg and waist.

"Help them, my sweet hero."

She started guiding his hand she placed at her waist up. Her voice filled with desire.

"Right now."

13413121222121222222121.content:
He stared at her for a second before speaking.

"I'm sorry."

Helen had a moment to look confused, before she vanished. Back in class as if she'd been their from the start. Answering questions like she hadn't just shoved her tongue down the son of Zeus's throat. Which as far as anyone's memories including her own, she hadn't.

Hercules looked at the ceiling before letting out a cross between a sigh and a groan. Backing up against the wall and lowering himself to the floor.

That was nothing like what he expected. He thought he was steering things so she'd develop feeling for him. Slowly getting more forward as they developed a relationship over months and years until they could say they were in love. Instead what he got was an obsessed love freak who was demanding a boy she'd never been more than a casual friend with to make a baby with her right now. He just meant to nudge her so it happened naturally. Not...not...'order' her to love him!

If he weren't a hero in training he wasn't sure he'd be able to or even want to resist her demands. However he 'was' a hero in training so all it made him do was feel guilty for essentially brainwashing her. What in the underworld had he been thinking?

He'd been thinking he'd get the prettiest mortal girl in all of Greece to be his girlfriend. That's what he'd been thinking.

He sighed again and kept staring at the ceiling. Fingers on his lips as he went over the kiss.

The kiss had been great. Fantastic. As far as physical reactions go he loved every part of having Helen in his arms. As far as his conscience went however he just felt dirty. The bad kind of dirty.

He just wanted a girlfriend.................

"Phil was right." He groaned "Just because I can do anything.....doesn't mean I can do anything."

His trainer had warned him about being reckless with his power. He'd trained his fair share of hero's who thought they could just solve all the problems of the world by hitting them hard enough, only to get taken down by some shmuck who hit even harder than them. Or wave a sword. Or shoot enough arrows. Or through enough men at it. A guy whose only solution to a problem is to attack without a strategy is a guy who wanted to board Charon's boat ASAP.

He wasn't really thinking about the nuances of what he wanted with Helen. He just wanted her to want him more and more as time went on. Clearly he'd been to general.

He still wanted Helen. He was still a boy who knew she existed after all just like any other teenage boy in Greece. He just wanted a girlfriend first, and he wanted it to be 'real'.

"OK so....what do I do?"

What if...he....?

What actually happened was that she smiled at the puppy dog look in his eyes, before darting forward and pressing her lips against his.

Hercules's eyes doubled in size inside his skull as the hottest girl in school did not vanish back to class like he'd willed her two. He tried again. Picturing in his mind time doubling back on itself. Helen reappearing in class not remembering being in a closet with him. Forgetting all the......the brainwashing. Forgeting the love he'd pushed onto her.

He was brought out of his intense focus by the sound of metal hitting the floor and realised Helen had removed the symbol of Zeus that Hercules used to keep his Toga up.

Helen looked surprised, but only for a second before smiling that.....that half smile again with the half lidded eyes.

"Ohhhh." She cooed much to his discomfort. "Hercules. I didn't know you liked that.

His hands jumped open in shock. She thought he was.....she was.....well he kind of NO!

He looked at her and concentrated.

Her brilliant golden hair turned into a fiery red. Then black at midnight. Then back to gold.

He poured more will into her. Fat enough to fill the room. Thin as a rail. More curvy than Aphro ok that wouldn't help so skip that one.

He turned her into a lamia. A gorgon. A cyclops. A guy. Triplets. Triplet snaked male centaur gorgon cylop's (Cyclopi?) while altering the room around them to fit them all. Then back again. Then just to make sure he added another layer to her robes and fastened them tighter.

Nothing wrong with his powers.

Alright then.

'Helen. Stop. Loving. Me!'

His will grabbed reality by the balls and twisted. Reshaping all that was into his grand design.

The girl blinked. Looking around confused and slightly worried before locking onto Hercules again.

He sighed in relief "Yeah."

"Did something just happen?"

With an almost casual shrug her robes loosened leaving her shoulders bare and the rest held up only by the fact she'd have to pull away from him for them to fall off. With a flick of her perfect finger the fastens on his toga came undone yet again.

"Oh yeah. Here."

1341321222212.content:
They don't even try to reclaim the Prideland because their new home unknown to Simba is so much better. They have everything they need. The water never purer, the air sweeter, the land never more beautiful.

The land is more abundant with prey than anywhere else they could ever find in their lifetimes, all of it so easy to catch that the beats are only a hairs breasth from simply walking into the lions mouths. All of this has had a profound effect of the cats builds.

All of them had grown quite fat, ranging from the merely overweight to so fat that they'd never be able to catch a two legged gazelle if they went anywhere else. Zira herself had engorged so much that her gigantic stomach would rest against the cool stone of her cave even when she deluded herself into standing, and would press against her legs preventing more than the slightest of steps http://www.furaffinity.net/view/7868170/... Her only source of food as with several of the other otcasts being whatever the....not thinner....but 'less obese' lionesses brought her...and her children.

Vitani was shaping up to match her mothers figure. Already the self appointed princess found difficulty in mere walking, her stomach brushing against the cave floor with every step.

Kovu, her son by adoption and at one time the integral part of her revenge against Simba was so roly poly that he couldn't fend of his sister's playful teasing when she grew bored, and had to be picked up by the scruff by 'two' lioness if he wanted to go anywhere with any measure of speed.

Nuka, her 'dear' firstborn was one of the few who did not seem to share in the wealth of the land. His food slipping off his frame like water from a birds back. His body still scrawny and weak despite eating just as much if not more than his barely mobile siblings, still mangy and sickly looking against all odds which left him embittered and angry that his mothers once fanatical plans had long since slipped from her gorged and happy mind.

Everyday the outcasts were almost grateful to their hated enemy for banishing them, though this gratitude was more of a taunting "thank you" to him. In trying to punish them for siding with his evil uncle he had sent them to a place he thought was almost bare of food and termites would bite at them forever, but instead led them to a paradise.

13413212222121.content:
"Mother...."

*CHOMP, NOM, NOM, MUNCH*

"Mother we need to..."

*SCARF, CRUNCH, GULP*

"Mother we ha..."

*CHEW, DEVOUR, ALL OTHER EATING NOISES THAT CAN ACTUALLY BE CONSIDERED WORDS*

"MOTHER!!! WE NEED TO GO OVER THE PLAN!!!" The sickly young lion screamed in his mothers stuffed face.

The monsterously massive mass of feline fatness looked up at her son along with most of the other adult females who had been 'snacking' on their 3rd or 4th (6th in her case) servings of zebra meat . Her eyes, bore a lazy and half hearted glare at her son which told all she was more angry with him for interupting her eating than speaking to her in such a rude manner.

"*chew, chew* What plan?" She asked and stripped another piece of flesh from the buttock of what had been a very well fed undulate.

Nuka snorted at his parents attitude. "The revenge plan mother. You remember? The one to kill Mufasa's offspring and make me the king of the pridelands!"

"Oh...that..." Behind her several of her 'minions' rolled their eyes and chuckled under their breath. "...We're no longer going through with that."

"I know that..." He seethed. "...Because for that plan to work we need to be strong, we need to be fierce, we need power.....WE NEED TO HAVE STOMACHS THAT DON'T DRAG AGAINST THE GROUND WHEN WALKING AND A SECRET WEAPON THAT DOESN'T LOOK LIKE AN OVERFED WARTHOG!!!" He screamed and jabbed his paw to the space two feet to the left of Zira's enormous belly.

Her youngest Vitani and Kovu were happily digging into their own excessive servings of meat. Vitani like her mother, almost completly helpless and was just managing to hold onto the cave floor with her paws despite her stomach's constant attempts to lift them into the air, dragging in food with her claws and happily scarfing on more food in a single meal than a cub her size would normally eat in a day.

Kovu on the other hand was by no means 'almost' in anything except maybe an 'almost perfect sphere'. Kovu's paw pads were almost as soft as the day he was born and he could barely remember a time when he hadn't needed to be carried around by a pair of adults to go anywhere faster than rolling would get him. Using what little mobility his form allowed to inch himself closer to the food everytime the space he was chewing on had vanished down his throat.

Zira watched her son struggle to get to get at his meal before grunting and sticking a blubberous back leg out out and nudging him into the shank were he gorged happily.

"Its hardly an issue anymore Nuka."

"HE. CAN'T. MOVE. IN. ANY. WAY!!!"

"Like your sister will be soon enough, and I will be, and nearly all our pride mates couldn't catch a three legged warthog nowadays. If this 'forbidden land' that brat banished us to wasn't so full of waddling prey easier to catch than illness we'd all be near skeletal and boiling with rage...."

'Instead your all engorged like mini hippos. Eating yourselves to helplessness while leaving me to do all the dirty work.'

That was hardly true. Nuka was too stupid to do the dirty work, the messy work or the slightly stained work. The only reason he was so emanciated was because the weight that stuck to them like glue just slid off him like water.

The truth was that the day they had been banished from pride rock for siding with Scar during Simba's usurping of his uncles throne Zira had planned to one day return an avenge her mate.

The entire pride seethed with rage as the lands of the king and marched towards unknown territory. Towards a land beyond the elephant graveyard that no one in the savannah would dare go, a place said to be bare of all but a few scraps of life, were vultures wouldnt even eat the dead and termites and insects plagued the land, ensuring that the lionesses would suffer for their choice.

They forgot their revenge almost immediatly at seeing the land.

The land was more rich with life than any other place they'd ever seen. Herd's of zebra that looked more like seas of black and white, warthogs and antelopes in their dozens, meerkats, birds! There was more life here per mile than Zira had ever seen from the top of pride rock......and all of it so very, very plump.

It may have something to do with the sweetness of the water, of the taste of the air or even the especially green nutrient rich grass beneath their feet but not a one of the creatures that swelled here looked any lighter than three back 'home'. The zebra's were a herd all to themselves and their fastest sprint could only just exceed her slowest walk, Birds could only glide for seconds at a time before tumbling back to earth, most animals could be tracked even without scents with the long streaking trails of their stomach brushing the soil, many of the older ones simply lay in the shade on guts they would sink into as their mobile offspring brought them food. Every last beast in this land was in some form of obesity from merely large to truely defensless. It was as if predators did not exist in this place.

That would soon change.

Within the days, weeks and months the pride and made their mark in this new paradise. Staking out a new cave to call their home, were it was cool in the day and warm during the night, the sweet water flowed through without them needing to leave to drink and the ocassional day time snack would wander in not knowing of the dangers inside

they'd started making a dent into the overwhelming population of prey animals who until recently had never had to worry about being eaten rather than eating, their adipose bodies had made them easy pickings in their numbers, numbers which swelled back up shortly after due to a combination of the area inducing high fertility and the fact the lions were soon blending in with the population quite nicely.

They all ballooned to mammoth sizes at a pace like you would never believe, Zira was the first to feel her stomach brush the floor and it was not long before it was trying to lift her legs up off the ground and she was relying on her thinner underlings to hunt for her, who then had to rely on the thinner again once they had difficulty hunting, then again and again until only four out of the nine not including Zira and the cubs were still fit enough to chase down food.......no group there in of which included the blood son or Scar.

For whatever reason that eluded them Nuka only grew thinner as he aged. He ate far more than either his sister and brother and for all reasons should be big enough that Kovu was more mobile than him. Instead he was the outsider among outsiders, bitter and hungry and angry. Angry at Simba for killing his father, his father for losing him his future as king and his family for being to absorbed in their own gluttony and satisfation to care about revenge.

His mother had tried to get him to take joy in the irony of it all. Simba had made for them to suffer and instead by his own actions sent them to a paradise superior to the pride lands in every way.

From his vantage point he couldnt even see her re-assuring smile past her tire thick neck rolls. He yelled at her and stalked outside, by this point a brisk pace easily outmatching his mother who was struggling to keep the last few vestments of mobility. Vowing that he'd get them to remember the plan then he'd just have to take over pride rock himself.

If he had actually inherited his fathers cunning mind then he might have actually thought of a plan other than 'convince mother to come up with a plan.'

He snorted, still out of breath "Uh huh. Like you.....animal eaters..."

"Ooooh fancy." His glare was diminished by the way his flabby neck pushed up into his cheeks and his cheeks into his eyes making him squint "Like you 'carnivores' can pretend you'd let all of this..." He shook his gigantic flank "...juicy meat get away."

She had to admit if a backside that massive was placed in front of her without her having to talk to it she would have went crazy. However the pride has a rule not to eat meat they've had a friendly conversation with.

"I promise. Believe me I'm way too small to take you on you myself. Not that I have to get much bigger with how easy you'd be. How'd you get so fat anyway?" She giggled at the site of him trying to get up. Watching his teeth grit with strain.

He looked at her for a moment. The word 'fat' appearing to be strange to him as well. Such words as skinny and fat did not exist in a place were bulk was the way of life.

"Well. You don't 'look' as fierce as those monsters." He relented "And I'm assuming that word, 'fat' means not being small then? Well I've have you know I'm hardly the biggest in my herd."

Her eyes widened and she stepped back "No way. Your bigger than two Gazelles put together from back home."

"For real? So it's not just lions who come from the food-less lands."

"Food-less lands?"

He shivered "A story we scare young ones with. A horrible, evil place where the grass isn't sweet. The water tastes like nothing. And were a meal for a single Gazelle has to do for a whole herd of Zebras all day."

She would have enquired more but noth they're ears flitted back when they heard the gentle brush of the tall and thick green gras behind them. She crouched low and was ready to bolt but the un-named antelope just sighed and lowered his head. Knowing full well what was to come.

13413222222111.content:
As much as Tarzan loved his ape-family and friends, he was even very proud of himself for overcoming such handicaps as a child such as being small, weak and hairless. But everyone knew it wasn't right.

So in the year 1912, a new Lord Graystoke stepped out of his parents jungle home one last time, wearing a suit twenty-years out of date he stood as professionally as a man raised mainly by slumping apes, and party by pictures and books of other men could have.

He stood on deck against the railing of the ship, until his jungle home faded from his eyes into mist. The crew was respectful of this strangely, the leading being an old sliverback- er, old graying man, who had known his parents Micheal who once fancied himslef a pirate and may have set a ship on fire when he accidently fired into some gunpowder about twenty years ago. Micheal took him aside a few nights and would explain things Jane had not, or could not.

By the time the ship landed in England, Tarzan knew what his place was to be in this world. As Micheal said, his parents were Lord John Clayton, and Lady Alice. They were a viscount and viscountess, which was somewhat important people, they'd been trusted with going to a place called Afirca (Micheal showed him it on the map, it wasn't far from the massive island Tarzan grew up on) and were expected to return to England when Tarzan was five. Of course they never made it. Tarzan also took up a new name, like his father and a distant cousin, he took up the name John, but refused the surname Clayton as he refused relations to the horried man who nearly killed all he loved, his own cousin as he found out.

When docking he was in wonder and to behold at all of the sunlight, and brick and people, though land was little harder walk on for a moment. He was even more surpised there were people not only to greet Jane, but himslef as well, a pointy, serious man in a very nice suit approached. He took one look at this unmannered, fighting stance, the long savage locks, and those curious and confused childish eyes and knew exactly who it was.
"Lord Graystoke, sire its wonder to finally see you." And he showed proper respect with a small bow. Tarzan stared a bit confused, glanced sideways at Jane whom was chatting with her friends excitedly and returned. Slowly and carefully he extended his hand.
"Uh-John..." and waited for a handshake that would never come. The man simply rose and politely returned it back to Tarzan very carefully.
"My Lord, I am the caretaker of your parents estate, Mr. Hobkins." He chuckled politely as he added this next part "and it seems like we have a lot to do, my Lord. Would you be coming with me to return home now, sire?" He spoke as if speaking to someone who was at least a decade younger than a man in his twenties.

"Ah yes, young Ms.Porter, of course." Mr.Hobkins nodded with a small chuckle to humor his young Lord. "How could we forget her? After all she was the one who wrote of you."
"Yes, though I wrote one or two letters myself." The former Lord of the apes nodded.
"And they were very well done, sire. Given your..circumstances."
"'Curcomstances'?" Tarzan asked with a raised brow that was once so like his father.

134132222222.title: Alice in Wonderland (Animated)

1341322222221.content:
Well, now that we have established the where, it is time to establish the possible whats that this story is so fondly put through.

What if....
The smoking catapiller decided Alice was too confused and unknowledgeable to possibly continue her little journey.
1341322222221.title: Drink me!

choices: She accepts the hookah and starts smoking
She refuses, not wishing to disobey her elders
13413222222211.content:
"You? Who are you?"

The blue catipiller huffed out smoke as he asked the question once more, sending letters of smoke into Alice's face. The girl coughed blue and red r and u mixed together to create a purple haze around her. Her arms waved about to fan the smoke away as she spoke up.

"Well, I told you. I do not entirely know anymore. Everything here is so confusing to me. And..."

"Why?" The blue catipiller layed across his mushroom as he spoke, blowing out another y in a green color.

Alice opened her mouth as if to speak, but said nothing. She had been running her mouth with this insect for who knew how long and everytime he just kept bringing her in circles. Defeated she plopped onto the dirt once more, her dress bunching up.

"Oh...I just don't know anymore. I know I should know these things by myself but I've just become so confused lately." As Alice spoke thought aloud, the blue catipiller faced her once more, the same uninterested expression on his face as he drew another breath from his hookah. "I just need something to help me relax so I can think again." The glade was in silence for a moment, the two figures not saying another word until the catipiller exhaled.

"Come closer my dear. I believe I can help you with that at the very least." Alice looked up from her pity to see a blue finger amongst the multi-colored R's waving her forward. It's blower was sitting up straight and holding his pipe out in one of his many hands.

"Oh no, I have heard many things about those device from my sister and my mother and father. I do appreciate the offer but I can't."

"Why not? You said you wanted help and I am giving it to you girl. It would only be prudent for you to at least try."

Alice stepped closer, her curiosity beginning to drag her towards the unknown once more. Every step or two, her shoes lay still in the dirt however, reminded of every time in her journey being curious had led her to trouble.
13413222222211.title: Y not?

choices: She wakes up in his home
She wakes up in the patch, but now she's changed
134132222222111.content:
Slowly reaching her hand out, Alice grasped the hookah pipe. The caterpiller smiled as the girl slowly brought the pipe to her face.

"For saying you were against it, you do seem to have adequate form." The blue insect folded his top set of arms as the young girl before him continued to bring the hookah closer. The poor fool. Her curiosity is something to shake one's head at.

Taking one more glance to the caterpiller, Alice placed the pipe on her lips. A taste similar to peaches entered her mouth, enticing her to keep it in. Alice closed her eyes and drew in a breath, the smoke filling her mouth almost instantly. It quickly became too much for the young girl as she coughed out billows of rainbow smoke.

"Wrong." The caterpiller said, hiding a smirk as he inched towards the coughing girl. "You must learn control girl. Just as your temper and now with this." Taking the pipe from the girl's hands, the caterpiller put it back to his mouth. "Watch." He said through his teeth as he puffed once more.

Though Alice knew what she was doing was wrong, she couldn't help but feel intrigued by the caterpiller's motions as he blew out ring after ring of smoke into her face. Even through the strange, fuzzy feeling beginning to form in her head, she kept her eyes on her...new friend. After puffing one more ring which Alice breathed in with a smile, she found the pipe being brought back to her hands.

"Now girl, try again" Alice nodded at the Caterpiller's harsh tone and guided the hookah pipe into her mouth. The fuzz in her head only grew as she took in the smoke once more, at a much slower rate of course. She closed her eyes, enjoying the taste of apples that had now mixed with the peaches.

"Good, now exhale." The caterpiller called from the mushroom where the hookah sat. He covered his mouth, hiding a chuckle as he reached into his 2nd left shoe and brought out a small vial of blue substance. With a twist of the cap, he put one drop onto the hookah's exhaust and heard the girl coughing immediately. "No, no girl." Changing his expression to annoyed, he crawled over to Alice and took the hookah as coughed out blue lines. "Well, it is no wonder you don't even know who you are. You can't even hold a hookah right." Taking a breath himself, the caterpiller blew towards Alice's face, letting little blue spirals swarm about her.

The girl's head was slightly bobbing up and down and her eyes seemed to fluxuating with dilation. Excellent. "Girl, it would seem, in my own opinion, that you do have a problem." Exhaling out more spirals, the caterpiller began to circle the dazed girl as she stared into the cloudy swirls. "You see, it appears you are simply too dull and plain for even this world. And even for wherever you came from no doubt."

"Too...dull?"

"Not just dull girl, but so absent headed that you can't even remember who you are. And that is a very dangerous thing to be in this place. Unless that is..." Now staring into Alice's face as he blew a particularly large spirl at her. "...you have someone to tell you who you are. And it seems I am the one to tell you what some you are. Doesn't that make sense?" Alice, clearly enraptured by the spirals and empty in the mind, could only nod. "Good, now why don't you rest for a moment? I just need to prepare something and I can take you someplace a little safer." Without warning, Alice fell to the ground, sleeping by the command of the caterpiller.

1351122221.content:
This....this was a smile. His cheeks were pulled upwards and stretching his face to induce a positive expression. Just like he'd read about.

Frank Grimes knew that for the first time in his life, he was happy. Well and truly happy.

His Mahogany desk was big and ornamental, His state of the art computer occupied one corner of it and a stack of His paperwork in another. His office had an old charm to it, nowhere near as big as Mr Burns but still pretty damn impressive. Mr Burns had a belief that he could hire any Joe punch clock to replace another who complained about safety or not getting paid real money, but a man in management was a gem he needed to give incentive to stay.

He'd even provided a suit. A black number with a blood red shirt and tie. Which for once made Frank feel like a man in control.

For 31 years he'd struggled. For more than 3 decades Frank Grimes had to endure one hardship after the other by pushing on with hard work and determination, every obstacle in his way had to be torn away with his bare hands, even when 10 more replaced it he pushed on with an iron resolve that should he loss he would not be alive today. Finally after a literal life time of doing everything the hard way the fates decided to reward his 31 years of hard work and had an old eccentric billionaire see his story on a TV special.

Frank sighed as he sank a little into the second plushest chair in the plant. Going over department reports and various other forms of paperwork when his speakerphone lit up.

"Mr Grimes..." The voice on the other end said his name like he was swallowing a lemon. He knew Burns assistant Smithers resented him for taking a job he clearly felt he deserved. He felt sorry for the fellow given what he had to put up with caring for the super senior, but he too felt like he deserved this after his own long struggles "...We need you at a staff meeting. Some boob from 7G has caused a riot."

Damn first day on the job and he couldn't relax. Ah well.

Whistling to himself Grimes reluctantly got out of his chair and headed for the door, taking one last look at the spacious office and thinking 'mine' he knew nothing could spoil his mood.

At least for the next 5 minutes, when he met the over-rewarded boob from 7G

(I've decided to implement 'real world physiques' for this branch of the story. From now on cartoon logic is taking a back seat. Hard work and intelligence will be rewarded while incompetence and laziness will be punished. That's right, instead of a look at how a real person would handle living in the Simpsons worlds, lets flip the mirror and see how the Simpsons handle living with real world rules.)

Fry was pulling his t shirt back down over himself after picking it up from the floor. Beside him still sleeping in the bed was the purple haired object of his affections wearing a very satisfied smile and what remained of her lingerie.

“Where do you think your going. The party's not over yet.” She said in a desperate attempt to sound seductive with a raspy and tired voice. Moving into an alluring pose despite aching all over.

13512222221.content:
==New York first national bank 1998==

"I'd like to open an account please." Said the red haired hero of our story, take a guess who it is.

The teller dragged her gaze away from the screen to the man who 'dared' to get her to work. Grunting under her breath she closed her solitaire program she put on the banks manditory smile and addressed the man with as much kindness and sarcasm as she could muster.

"Hello sir welcome to the first national bank, how can I help you?" She said, deliberaty ignored his request in the minuet chance that he wouldn't repeat himself and just go away.

No chance of that.

"I said I'd like to open an account please." Said the obliveous flame haired man.

The banker clenched her teeth hard enough to bite through granite but complied. She hit the keys in front of her hard enough to push through the board but brought the proper window up.

"And how much will you be opening your account with?" She said trough the forced smile.

"Well let's see." He went rummanging through all his pocket's. Scrounging up quarters and nickel's in his jacket then a few penny's in his jean's. He presented his findings to her. "93 cent's."

She looked at the handful of change with disdain. Almost like it was laughing at her. To have her time wasted for 'pocket change'. This just had to be the only bank in the whole 'damn' city that you could open an account with for much a tiny amount.

She wasn't going to let him get away with wasting her time.

"I'm sorry sir." She said while trying not to grin maniacally. "But it's a hundred dollar's minimum investment for adult customer's." 'take that jackass.'

She cheered in her mind when he sighed and slumped over. Then watched in horror as he pulled out his wallet. Franklin's face pressed under her nose as he passed her the 100 dollar bill.

"Well dad did say not to come home until I did this. I guess me and my girl will just have to bum pizza off mister pinnuchi for a while." He said dejectedly.

She delicatly pulled the beaten note from Fry's finger's and jammed it in a drawer like it was diseased. A few more key stroke's and a letter of notice for his cash card and it was done.

"Your card and pin will arrive within the week sir. Thank you for using the first national and come back soon."

He nodded and left with an idiotic smile on his face.

She sighed in relief and reopened solitaire. Hopefully she'd never have to see that idiot ever again.

Sadly this was not the case. Fry made sure to come back every so often, under the suggestions of his parents and handing money over the counter into the savings account. By december he had a good amount in. Not enough to call a fortune but enough to survive for a month or two with on its own.

It wouldn not be tounched for a thousand yeras.

==New New York, First national bank, 3000==

"Okay sir let me just bring up your account. It might take a minute because of the age." Said the annoyingly familiar cashier.

Why was he back at this place. Well long story short Fry needed money and he remembered that he had the account for just such an occasion. He just hoped their was enough in it to get him through to payday.

"Let's see....Initial deposit a 100 dollar. Plus you paid into it right up to december 1999."

"Yeah my dad thought the economy would go bust soon and we'd all be put out of the job." Fry said jokingly.

"Oh yes I heard about that. The recession of 2009. A lot of people lost thier job's back then including my ancestor who used to work at this same bank."

"I thought you looked familiar. She was the one who helped me set it up. What happened to her?"

"She ended up working the street at three bucks a pop." The cashier said flatly.

"Oh." Went the red head who'd been put on the spot. The cashier turned back to the screen.

"As I was saying. You kept paying into it til late ninety nine. Bringing you up to 3230 dollar's paid in...."

"Plenty of money til payday." Fry said pleased. He was about to ask for some money out when the woman continued.

"...At our monthly interest rate and over the period of a thousand year's that amounts to.....$123,000,000,000,000 (a hundred and twenty three trillion dollars.)

Fry continued to stare at her for a moment.

"Congratulation's sir. I believe that now make's you the single richest person in the galaxy." She looked up from the screen to look at him but her eyes widened when she saw noone. Looking oer her station she saw him lying on the ground, breathing hard and foaming at the mouth.

She'd say he took the news rather well.

"Peter....what the hell are you doing?" The mans red head wife asks with a tone that suggests she's asked that more in her lifetime than she would like.

Peter Griffin, local jackass and classified by medical science as borderline mentally handicap, was standing in front of a cartoonishly big firework. A tiny little wick barely a few inches long seconds away from being lit.

"Well Lois..." His mocking tone aggrevating her since it made him sound like he knew what he was doing at all. "...This is a jackass sized firework. And over there is Quagmires filming stuff...."

Quagmire sat several feet away in a directors chair in puffy pants, several highly exspensive pieces of recording equipment around him including an old fashioned super 8 recording camera.

"It's for exactly what you think it is. Giggity."

"...I intend to take this over sized novelty explosive device....and comically injure for my amusement."

"Didn't you learn your lesson from all those other stunts you pulled?"

""Uh yeah Lois...." He reaches out of view and pulls out Meg tied up and covered in glue "Which is why I'm not using myself." he says before he tosses the sticky girl onto the firework.

"PETER FOR GOD SAKE NO!!!!"

He was already running before she could finish. With a fwoosh the rocket sped of into the sky.

========================

"...Burns over 90% of her body, most of her bones, nose cartlidge destroyed, hair folicals incinerated....aaaand damage to several organs. She's alive but without exspensive surgery she be lucky to ever leave hospital care."

Lois, cheeks black with tears ad mascara sighed in relief "Thats....."

"How much?" A bored looking Peter asked.

"Well as I've said its a necessary surgery an..."

"How much?" He aske in the exact same tone once more.

"$50,000."

Three seconds later two giant orderlies dragged him back to the room kicking and screaming. The doctor turned to Lois.

"Now I know you can't afford it. So I'll accept it if your family would like to work off the debt."

She clasped here hands in front of herself "That would be very good thank you."

"Great. Now lets talk cosmetic surgery here. I mean I know it's a horrible thing that happened but what we have here is an oopertunity to imprive on what nature smacked her with. Ok so when we reset the legs theres a good chance she'll get taller by...."

She was looking forward to be able to relax a little, Adam's job did very well for them (better than Peter's), and their three adopted little bundles of joy while coming with their own challenges (their eldest was a little dyslexia and they were sure little Andy was a bit slow on the uptake, nothing a little extra time and care couldn't help), but they were god-sent angels. The worst problem they had was when their youngest, Hannah accidently stole a candy bar. Or their new neighbors were a little too loud while adjusting to suburban life.

13523211.title: Only dessert?

135232111.content:
"Hurry before I run out of energy." Said the pink haired blob with the wand.

"I wish all food wasn't dessert. AND THE EARTH WASN'T ABOUT TO CRASH INTO THE SUN!!!"

*SAFE*

With that magical word from issued from the magic wand the earth returned to it's orifinal orbit. The pink hatted boy who wished it sifghed in relief.

"Phew, I'm glad that's.....over." He said as he looked down. The enormous gut he'd come to hate over the past few weeks still staring back at him.

"Huh Wanda." Timmy addressed his pink haired fairy. He saw her lying face first on the floor clearly out of breath and sweating from what she just did.

"*HUFF* *HUFF* Yeah sweetie?" She said trying to catch her breath.

"Shouldn't we be, I don't know, less......HUGE now." He said trying to keep the panic out of his voice.

"*huff* Sorry sport. I only had enough energy to take care of part of the wish, and the whole spiraling to our doom was kinda a no brainer."

Timmy grit his teeth. Thinking desperatly what to do. Before a smile broke over his face.

"I'll just go ask mark for more spinich cobbler. That'll sort this mess out." He said heaving himself up to go to the door.

"Didn't you say that mark said it was his last can?" The green haired fairy said while searching through his many folds for his wand.

Timmy stopped in his tracks and his eyes widened in horror.

That was the last healthy food on earth, and Wanda just ate it.

What was he going to do now.

A voice called up from downstairs.

"Timmy! It's time for pre-dessert dessert."

The three stomachs in the room gave a collective growl at the prospect of dessert.

He'd have to sort out this mess......after dessert.
